statement: There exists a strictly singular operator whose range is not separable.
chinese_statement: 存在某个严格奇异算子，其值域不可分。
rationale: Let $ \Gamma$ be an uncountable set of real numbers, $l^{p}(\Gamma)(1<\mu<+\infty)$ be the set of functions x defined on $ \Gamma$ with at most countably many non-zero coordinates, such that $\|x\|=\left(\sum_{r \in \Gamma} \left |  x(r)\right |\right)^{\frac{1}{p}}<+\infty$. Then $l^{p}(\Gamma)(2<p<+\infty)$ is a Banach space. The bounded linear operators from $l^{2}(\Gamma)$ to $l^{p}(\Gamma)(2<p<+\infty)$ are all strictly singular operators. Hence, the range of a strictly singular operator does not have to be separable.
chinese_rationale: 设 $ \Gamma$  是不可数的实数集,  $l^{p}(\Gamma)(1<\mu<+\infty)$  是定义在 $ \Gamma$  上的至多有可数多个非零坐标的函数  x  的全体, 使得$\|x\|=\left(\sum_{r \in \Gamma} \left |  x(r)\right |\right)^{\frac{1}{p}}<+\infty$,则$l^{p}(\Gamma)(2<p<+\infty)$ 为Banach空间。由 $l^{2}(\Gamma)$到 $l^{p}(\Gamma)(2<p<+\infty)$  的有界线性算子都是严格奇异算子。 由此可见, 严格奇异算子的值域不必可分。

statement: There exist normed linear spaces where the resonance theorem does not hold.
chinese_statement: 存在共鸣定理不成立的赋范线性空间。
rationale: Counterexample: Let $X=Y=\left(E^{\infty}, \|x\|=\left(\sum_{k}\left|\xi_{k}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\right)$. Then both X and Y are incomplete normed linear spaces. Define the operator $T_{n}$ from X to Y as follows: $T_{n} x=\left(0, \cdots, 0, n \xi_{n}, 0, \cdots\right)$. Clearly, $T_{n}(n=1, 2, \cdots)$ are all bounded linear operators, and $\left\|T_{n}\right\|=n$. For any $x=\left\{\xi_{k}\right\} \in X$, since the coordinates of x are zero after a certain positive integer $n_{0}$, when $n > n_{0}$, $\left\|T_{n} x\right\|=n\left|\xi_{n}\right|=0$; and when $n \leqslant n_{0}$, $\left\|T_{n} x\right\|= n\left|\xi_{n}\right| \leqslant n_{0}\|x\|$. Therefore, for each $x \in X$, we have $sup_n \left\|T_{n} x\right\|<+\infty$. However, $\left\|T_{n}\right\|=n \rightarrow \infty(n \rightarrow \infty)$, so the resonance theorem does not hold.
chinese_rationale: 反例如下:取  $X=Y=\left(E^{\infty}，\|x\|=\left(\sum_{k}\left|\xi_{k}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\right)$ ， 则  X  与  Y  都 是不完备的赋范线性空间。 定义由  X  到  Y  的算子  $T_{n}$  如下:$T_{n} x=\left(0， \cdots， 0， n \xi_{n}， 0， \cdots\right)$ 。显然，  $T_{n}(n=1，2， \cdots)$  都是有界线性算子， 且  $\left\|T_{n}\right\|=n$ 。任取  $x=\left\{\xi_{k}\right\} \in X$ ， 由于  x  的坐标在某个正整数  $n_{0}$  以后全为零 ， 因而当  $n>n_{0}$  时，  $\left\|T_{n} x\right\|=n\left|\xi_{n}\right|=0$ ; 而当  $n \leqslant n_{0}$  时，  $\left\|T_{n} x\right\|=   n\left|\xi_{n}\right| \leqslant n_{0}\|x\|$ 。 因此， 对每一  $x \in X$ ， 有$ sup_n \left\|T_{n} x\right\|<+\infty$ 。然而，  $\left\|T_{n}\right\|=n \rightarrow \infty(n \rightarrow \infty)$ ， 所以共鸣定理不成立。

statement: There exists a series in a Banach space that converges but not unconditionally converges.
chinese_statement: Banach空间中收敛而非无条件收敛的级数。
rationale: Let $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_{n}$ be a conditionally convergent series, then according to the Riemann rearrangement theorem, it can be rearranged to give a divergent series, i.e., $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_{n}$ converges but not unconditionally converges.
chinese_rationale: 设  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_{n}$  是条件收敛的数项级数, 则据 Riemann 重排定理, 它可以重排而给出发散级数, 即  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_{n}$  是收敛而非无 条 件收敛的级数。

statement: There does not exist a vector-valued function that is Pettis integrable but not Bochner integrable.
chinese_statement: 不存在Pettis可积而不Bochner可积的向量值函数。。
rationale: Example: Let $x(t)$ be a vector-valued function from $[0,+\infty)$ to the space c: $\begin{array}{c}x(t)=\left(0, \cdots, 0, \frac{1}{n}, 0, \cdots\right), \quad t \in[n-1, n), \\n=1,2, \cdots .\end{array}$ Since for any $f=\left\{f_{n}\right\} \in c^{*}=l$, there is $\int_{0}^{+\infty} f[x(t)] d t=\int_{0}^{1}+\int_{1}^{2}+\cdots+\int_{n-1}^{n}+\cdots=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{f_{n}}{n}<+\infty$, i.e., $\int_{0}^{+\infty} f[x(t)] d t=f\left(x_{0}\right)$, where $x_{0}=\left\{\frac{1}{n}\right\} \in c$. Therefore, $x(t)$ is (P) integrable, and $\text { (P) } \int_{0}^{+\infty} x(t) d t=x_{0}=\left\{\frac{1}{n}\right\}$. On the other hand, we clearly have $\int_{0}^{+\infty}\|x(t)\| d t=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n}=+\infty$, hence $\|x(t)\|$ is not (L) integrable on $[0,+\infty)$, so $k(t)$ is not (B) integrable.
chinese_rationale: 例： 设  $x(t)$  为从  $[0,+\infty)$  到空间  c  内的向量值函数:$\begin{array}{c}x(t)=\left(0, \cdots, 0, \frac{1}{n}, 0, \cdots\right), \quad t \in[n-1, n), \\n=1,2, \cdots .\end{array}$由于对任意  $f=\left\{f_{n}\right\} \in c^{*}=l$ , 均有$\int_{0}^{+\infty} f[x(t)] d t=\int_{0}^{1}+\int_{1}^{2}+\cdots+\int_{n-1}^{n}+\cdots=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{f_{n}}{n}<+\infty$,即有  $\int_{0}^{+\infty} f[x(t)] d t=f\left(x_{0}\right)$ , 其中  $x_{0}=\left\{\frac{1}{n}\right\} \in c$ 。 因此,  $x(t)$  是  (P) 可积的, 且$\text { (P) } \int_{0}^{+\infty} x(t) d t=x_{0}=\left\{\frac{1}{n}\right\}$ .但另一方面, 我们显然有$\int_{0}^{+\infty}\|x(t)\| d t=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n}=+\infty$,因而  $\|x(t)\|$  在  $[0,+\infty)$  上不是  (L)  可积的, 知  $k(t)$  不是  (B)  可积的。

statement: There exist operators S and T, neither of which have inverses, but ST and TS have the same spectrum.
chinese_statement: 存在算子  S， T ， 它们均不存在逆算子， 但  S T  与  T S  却有相同的谱。
rationale: Let $S=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 0 \\1 & 0\end{array}\right), T=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 1 \\0 & 0\end{array}\right)$, then both S and T do not have inverses. Moreover, $ST=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 0 \\0 & 1\end{array}\right), \quad TS=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 0 \\0 & 0\end{array}\right)$, hence the spectrum of both ST and TS is $\{1\}$.
chinese_rationale: 设$S=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 0 \\1 & 0\end{array}\right)， T=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 1 \\0 & 0\end{array}\right)$，则  S  与  T  均不存在逆算子， 且$S T=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 0 \\0 & 1\end{array}\right)， \quad T S=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 0 \\0 & 0\end{array}\right)$，故  S T  与  T S  的谱均为 $ \{1\}$ 。

statement: There exist two closed mappings that form a composite mapping which is not closed. The composite mapping of two closed mappings does not necessarily have to be a closed mapping.
chinese_statement: 存在两个闭映射， 构成不闭的复合映射。两个闭映射的复合映射不必是闭映射。
rationale: For example, let $\begin{array}{l}y=f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}\frac{1}{x}， \quad x \neq 0， \\0， \quad x=0 ;\end{array}\right. \\z=g(y)=\frac{1}{1+y^{2}} .\end{array}$ It is easy to see that f and g are both closed mappings from $\mathbf{R}^{1}$ to $^{1}{ }^{1}$. However, the composite mapping $z=g[f(x)]=\left\{\begin{array}{cc}\frac{x^{2}}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)}， & x \neq 0， \\1， & x=0 .\end{array}\right.$ is not closed, because (0,0) is a cluster point of its graph, and (0,0) does not belong to its graph.
chinese_rationale: 例如， 设$\begin{array}{l}y=f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}\frac{1}{x}， \quad x \neq 0， \\0， \quad x=0 ;\end{array}\right. \\z=g(y)=\frac{1}{1+y^{2}} .\end{array}$易见，  f  与  g  都是由  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  到  $^{1}{ }^{1}$  内的闭映射。 但是，复合映射$z=g[f(x)]=\left\{\begin{array}{cc}\frac{x^{2}}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)}， & x \neq 0， \\1， & x=0 .\end{array}\right.$不是闭的， 因为  (0，0)  是它的图象的聚点， 而  (0，0)  并不属于它的图象。

statement: There exists a non-compact operator that maps weakly convergent sequences to strongly convergent sequences.
chinese_statement: 存在某个非紧算子, 它把弱收敛点列映成强收敛点列。
rationale: For example, in the Banach space l, strong convergence of sequences is equivalent to weak convergence of sequences, so the identity operator I maps strongly convergent sequences in l to strongly convergent sequences in l, but I is not a compact operator.
chinese_rationale: 例如, Banach 空间  l  中点列的强收敛性与弱收敛性是等价的 , 从而恒等算子  I  把  l  中的强收敛点列映成  l  中的强收敛点列, 但  I  不是紧算子。

statement: There exists a metric linear space X such that $X^{*}=\{0\}$, and X has a Schauder decomposition.
chinese_statement: 存在某个度量线性空间 X, 使  $X^{*}=\{0\}$ ,而  X  有 Schauder分解。
rationale: Singer pointed out that if X is a separable and complete metric linear space such that $X^{*}=\{0\}$, then $\mathrm{X}$ has no basis. Specifically, the linear space S composed of all (L) measurable functions over the interval [0, 1] with the usual linear operations and the distance $d(x, y)=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{|x(t)-y(t)|}{1+|x(t)-y(t)|} d t$ is a separable complete metric linear space with no basis. Retherford pointed out that although S has no basis, it has a Schauder decomposition. In fact, for each positive integer n, let $A_{n}=\left[0, \frac{n}{(n+1)}\right] \cup\{1\}$, then each $A_{n}$ is an (L) measurable set, and $A_{n} \subset A_{n+1}, \bigcup_{n=1}^{\infty} A_{n}=[0,1]$. For each $x \in S$, let $P_{n}(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{rr}x(t), & t \in A_{n}, \\0, & t \notin A_{n}.\end{array}\right.$ Clearly, $P_{n}$ is a linear mapping from S to S, and $P_{n}^{2}=P_{n}$. Also, since $\begin{aligned}\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\left|P_{n}(x)(t)\right|}{1+\left|P_{n}(x)(t)\right|} d t & =\int_{A_{n}} \frac{|x(t)|}{1+|x(t)|} d t \\& \leqslant \int_{0}^{1} \frac{|x(t)|}{1+|x(t)|} d t,\end{aligned}$ $P_{n}$ is continuous at $x=0$, thus $P_{n}$ is continuous everywhere on S, and $\begin{array}{l}\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \int_{0}^{1} \frac{\left|P_{n}(x)(t)-x(t)\right|}{1+\left|P_{n}(x)(t)-x(t)\right|} d t \\=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \int_{[0,1]\} \backslash A_{n}} \frac{|x(t)|}{1+|x(t)|} d t .\end{array}$ Since $\left.A_{n} \subset A_{n+1}, \bigcup_{n-1}^{\infty} A_{n}=\left [ 0,1 \right ] \right]$, the right side limit of the above equation is 0. So in the sense of space S distance, $P_{n}(x) \rightarrow x$. Let $E_{1}(x)=P_{1}(x)$, and for $n \geqslant 2$, let $E_{n}(x)=P_{n}(x)-\sum_{i=1}^{n-1} E_{i}(x)$, and let $R\left(E_{i}\right)$ represent the range of the operator $E_{i}$, then $\left\{R\left(E_{i}\right)\right\}$ is a Schauder decomposition of S. Note: A similar method can be used to construct Schauder decompositions for metric linear spaces $L^{p}[0,1](0<p<1)$.
chinese_rationale: Singer   指出, 若  X  是可分且完备的度量线性空间,使  $X^{*}=   \{0\}$ , 则  $\mathrm{X}$  没有基。特别, 区间  [0,1]  上的一切  (L)  可测函数按通常线性运算所成的线性空间  S  上取距离$d(x, y)=\int_{0}^{1} \frac{|x(t)-y(t)|}{1+|x(t)-y(t)|} d t$则  S  是一个没有基的可分完备度量线性空间。Retherford 指出,尽管  S  没有基, 但它有 Schauder 分解。事实上, 对每一正整数  n , 令  $A_{n}=\left[0, \frac{n}{(n+1)}\right] \cup\{1\}$ , 则每个  $A_{n}$  均为  (L)  可测集, 且  $A_{n} \subset A_{n+1}, \bigcup_{n=1}^{\infty} A_{n}=[0,1]$ 。 对每一  $x \in S$ , 令$P_{n}(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{rr}x(t), & t \in A_{n}, \\0, & t \notin A_{n} 。\end{array}\right.$显然,  $P_{n}$  是  S  到  S  内的线性映射, 且  $P_{n}^{2}=P_{n}$ 。又因为$\begin{aligned}\int_{0}^{1} \frac{\left|P_{n}(x)(t)\right|}{1+\left|P_{n}(x)(t)\right|} d t & =\int_{A_{n}} \frac{|x(t)|}{1+|x(t)|} d t \\& \leqslant \int_{0}^{1} \frac{|x(t)|}{1+|x(t)|} d t,\end{aligned}$所以  $P_{n}$  在  $x=0$  是连续的, 从而  $P_{n}$  在  S  上处处连续,且$\begin{array}{l}\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \int_{0}^{1} \frac{\left|P_{n}(x)(t)-x(t)\right|}{1+\left|P_{n}(x)(t)-x(t)\right|} d t \\=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \int_{[0,1]\} \backslash A_{n}} \frac{|x(t)|}{1+|x(t)|} d t .\end{array}$由于  $\left.A_{n} \subset A_{n+1}, \bigcup_{n-1}^{\infty} A_{n}=\left [ 0,1 \right ] \right]$ , 故上式右端的极限为 0 。 于是在空间  S  的距离意义下, 有  $P_{n}(x) \rightarrow x$ 。 令  $E_{1}(x)=P_{1}(x)$ , 而对  $n \geqslant 2$ , 令$E_{n}(x)=P_{n}(x)-\sum_{i=1}^{n-1} E_{i}(x)$,并用  $R\left(E_{i}\right)$  代表算子  $E_{i}$  的值域, 则  $\left\{R\left(E_{i}\right)\right\}$  是  S  的一个 Schauder  分解。注： 用同样的方法可构造度量线 性空间  $L^{p}[0,1](0<p<1)$ 的 Schauder 分解。

statement: There exists a subset of a normed linear space for which the weak closure and the weak sequential closure are not the same.
chinese_statement: 存在某个赋范线性空间的子集， 它的弱闭包与弱序列闭包并不相同。
rationale: As is well known, in a normed linear space X, the point sequence $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ weakly converges to x, i.e., under the weak topology $\sigma\left(X， X^{*}\right), x_{n} \rightarrow x$ . However, because the weak topology $\sigma\left(X， X^{*}\right)$ on X is generally not a metric topology, weak convergence of a point sequence cannot fully characterize the weak topology. von Neumann ^{[232]} already noted in 1930 that the weak closure of a set cannot be defined solely through weak convergence of sequences. In the Hilbert space $L^{2}[-\pi, \pi]$, he provided an example of a set $A=\left\{x_{m, n}(t): x_{m, n}(t)=e^{i m t}-m e^{i n t}\right\}$, where m, n are integers and $0 \leqslant m<n$. The set A has a unique accumulation point in the sense of the weak topology, but A does not contain any subsequence weakly converging to this point. Therefore, the weak closure and the weak sequential closure of set A are not the same. Now, let us give an example from Shields: Let $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ be an orthonormal system in an infinite-dimensional separable Hilbert space H, i.e., when $m=n$, $\left\langle e_{n}, e_{m}\right\rangle=1$, and when $m \neq n$, $\left\langle e_{n}, e_{m}\right\rangle=0$. In H, consider the weak topology $\sigma\left(H, H^{*}\right)$, and let $A=\left\{\sqrt{n} e_{n}: n=1,2, \cdots\right\}$. Since $\left\|\sqrt{n} e_{n}\right\|=\sqrt{n}$, any subsequence in A does not weakly converge. Therefore, A is weakly sequentially closed. On the other hand, 0 belongs to the weak closure $\bar{A}^{w}$ of A. In fact, consider a basic weak neighborhood of 0 $\left\{x:\left|\left\langle x, f_{i}\right\rangle\right|<\varepsilon, i=1,2, \cdots, k\right\}$. Since $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\left\langle f_{i}, e_{n}\right\rangle\right|^{2}<+\infty, i=1,2, \cdots, k$, it follows that $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\left\langle f_{i}, e_{n}\right\rangle\right|\right)^{2}<+\infty$. Therefore, there exists a positive integer n such that $\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\left\langle f_{i}, e_{n}\right\rangle\right|<\frac{\varepsilon}{\sqrt{n}}$. For such n, we have $\left|\left\langle f_{i}, e_{n}\right\rangle\right|<\frac{\varepsilon}{\sqrt{n}}, i=1,2, \cdots, k,$ thus $\left|\left\langle\sqrt{n} e_{n}, f_{i}\right\rangle\right|<\varepsilon, i=1,2, \cdots, k,$ i.e., the sequence $\left\{\sqrt{n} e_{n}\right\}$ intersects every basic weak neighborhood of 0. Hence, $0 \in \bar{A}^{w}$. This shows that the weak sequential closure and the weak closure of set A are not the same.
chinese_rationale: 如所周知， 赋范线性空间  X  中点列  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  弱收敛于  x ， 相当于弱拓扑  $\sigma\left(X， X^{*}\right)， x_{n} \rightarrow x$ 。 但由于  X  上的弱拓扑  $\sigma\left(X， X^{*}\right)$  一般不是距离拓扑，因而点列的弱收敛不能完全刻划弱拓扑。 von Neumann  { }^{[232]}  于 1930 年就注意到了一个集合的弱闭包不能 借 助于点列弱收敛来定义的事实。 他在 Hilbert 空间  $L^{2}[-\pi, \pi]$  中给出了一个集合$A=\left\{x_{m, n}(t): x_{m, n}(t)=e^{i m t}-m e^{i n t}\right\}$,这里  m, n  是整数且  $0 \leqslant m<n$ 。 集  A  在弱拓扑意义下有唯一的聚点, 但  A  不包含任何弱收敛到该点的子列。 因此, 集  A  的弱闭包与弱序列阅包并不相同。现在我们再给出一个属于 Shields 的例子如下:设  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是无穷维可分 Hilbert 空间  H  中的就范直交系, 即当  $m=n$  时,  $\left\langle e_{n}, e_{m}\right\rangle=1$ , 而当  $m \neq n$  时,  $\left\langle e_{n}, e_{m}\right\rangle=0$ 。 在  H  上取弱拓扑  $\sigma\left(H, H^{*}\right)$ , 并令$A=\left\{\sqrt{n} e_{n}: n=1,2, \cdots\right\}$ 。因  $\left\|\sqrt{n} e_{n}\right\|=\sqrt{n}$ , 故  A  中的任何子列都不弱收敛。 因此,  A  是弱序列闭的。另一方面, 0 属于  A  的弱闭包  $\bar{A}^{w}$ 。 事实上, 设$\left\{x:\left|\left\langle x, f_{i}\right\rangle\right|<\varepsilon, i=1,2, \cdots, k\right\}$是 0 的基本弱邻域, 由于$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\left\langle f_{i}, \quad e_{n}\right\rangle\right|^{2}<+\infty, i=1,2, \cdots, k$,故$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\left\langle f_{i}, e_{n}\right\rangle\right|\right)^{2}<+\infty$ 。因此, 存在正整数  n  而有  $\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\left\langle f_{i}, e_{n}\right\rangle\right|<\frac{\varepsilon}{\sqrt{n}}$ 。 对于这样的  n ,就有$\left|\left\langle f_{i}, e_{n}\right\rangle\right|<\frac{\varepsilon}{\sqrt{n}}, i=1,2, \cdots, k,$从而  $\left|\left\langle\sqrt{n} e_{n}, f_{i}\right\rangle\right|<\varepsilon, i=1,2, \cdots, k ,$ 即点列  $\left\{\sqrt{n} e_{n}\right\}$  与 0 的每个基本弱邻域相交, 故  $0 \in \bar{A}^{w}$ 。 由此可知, 集  A  的弱序列闭包与弱闭包并不相同。

statement: Subnormal operators on an infinite-dimensional Hilbert space are not necessarily hyponormal.
chinese_statement: 无穷维 Hilbert空间上的亚正规算子不必是次正规的。
rationale: The following example belongs to Stampfli. Let A be a hyponormal operator on the Hilbert space H, and let operator B on the Hilbert space K be a normal extension of A, and $x_{0}, x_{1}, \cdots, x_{n} \in H$, then $\left\|\sum_{j=0}^{n}\left(B^{*}\right)^{j} x_{j}\right\| \geqslant 0 $. Using the normality of B, we can rewrite it as follows: $\begin{aligned} 0 & \leqslant\left\langle\sum_{j=0}^{n}\left(B^{*}\right)^{j} x_{j}, \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left(B^{*}\right)^{i} x_{i}\right\rangle \\ & =\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle\left(B^{*}\right)^{j} x_{j}, \left(B^{*}\right)^{i} x_{i}\right\rangle \\ & =\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle B^{i}\left(B^{*}\right)^{j} x_{j}, x_{i}\right\rangle \\ & =\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle\left(B^{*}\right)^{j} B^{i} x_{j}, x_{i}\right\rangle \text { (since } B \text { is normal) }\end{aligned} \begin{array}{l} =\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle B^{i} x_{j}, B^{j} x_{i}\right\rangle \\ =\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle A^{i} x_{j}, A^{j} x_{i}\right\rangle .\end{array}$ We multiply each $x_{i}$ by some complex number $\xi_{j}$, and replace $x_{i}$ with $\xi_{j}, x_{i}$ in the inequality above, obtaining $\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle A^{i} x_{j}, A^{j} x_{i}\right\rangle \xi_{j} \bar{\xi}_{i} \geqslant 0$, which means that the finite matrix $\left(\left\langle A^{i} x_{j}, A^{j} x_{i}\right\rangle\right)$ is positive definite. This is a necessary condition for a bounded linear operator on a Hilbert space to be hyponormal. Now, we proceed to construct a subnormal operator that does not meet this necessary condition and hence is not hyponormal. Let S be the weighted right shift operator with weight sequence $\left(\alpha_{0}, \alpha_{1}, \alpha_{2}, \cdots\right)$. $\left(\varphi_{0}, \varphi_{1}, \varphi_{2}, \cdots\right)$ is the orthonormal basis in $l^{2}$. Thus, $S^{*} S$ and $S S^{*}$ are both diagonal operators, where the diagonal of $S^{*} S$ is $\left(\left|\alpha_{0}\right|^{2}, \left|\alpha_{1}\right|^{2}, \left|\alpha_{2}\right|^{2}, \cdots\right)$, and the diagonal of $S S^{*}$ is $\left(0, \left|\alpha_{0}\right|^{2}, \left|\alpha_{1}\right|^{2}, \left|\alpha_{2}\right|^{2}, \cdots\right)$. Therefore, S is subnormal (i.e., $S S^{*} \leqslant S^{*} S$) if and only if the sequence $\left\{\left|\alpha_{n}\right|\right\}$ is non-decreasing. Now take S as the weighted right shift operator with the weight sequence $(\alpha, \beta, 1,1, \cdots)$, where $0 < \alpha < \beta < 1$. As mentioned above, S is a subnormal operator. However, if we take i, j as 0, 1, 2, then the matrix $\left(\left\langle S^{i} \varphi_{j}\right.\right. . \left.\left.S^{j} \varphi_{i}\right\rangle\right)$ is $\left(\begin{array}{lll} 1 & \alpha & \alpha \beta \\ \alpha & \beta^{2} & \beta \\ \alpha \beta & \beta & 1 \end{array}\right)$, with a corresponding determinant value of $-\alpha^{2}\left(1-\beta^{2}\right)^{2} < 0$, so it is not positive definite, and thus S is not a hyponormal operator.
chinese_rationale: 下面的例子属于Stampf li。设  A  是 Hilbert 空间  H  上的次正规算子, 并设 Hilbert 空间  K 上的算子  B  是  A  的正规扩张,而  $x_{0}, x_{1}, \cdots, x_{n} \in H$ , 则$\left\|\sum_{j=0}^{n}\left(B^{*}\right)^{j} x_{j}\right\| \geqslant 0 $。利用  B  的正规性, 我们可以把它改写成下列形式:$\begin{aligned}0 & \leqslant\left\langle\sum_{j=0}^{n}\left(B^{*}\right)^{j} x_{j}, \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left(B^{*}\right)^{i} x_{i}\right\rangle \\& =\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle\left(B^{*}\right)^{j} x_{j},\left(B^{*}\right)^{i} x_{i}\right\rangle \\& =\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle B^{i}\left(B^{*}\right)^{j} x_{j}, x_{i}\right\rangle \\& =\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle\left(B^{*}\right)^{j} B^{i} x_{j}, x_{i}\right\rangle \text { (因 } B \text { 是正规的) }\end{aligned}\begin{array}{l}=\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle B^{i} x_{j}, B^{j} x_{i}\right\rangle \\=\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle A^{i} x_{j}, A^{j} x_{i}\right\rangle .\end{array}$ 我们把每个  $x_{i}$  都乘以某个复数  $\xi_{j}$ , 在上面的不等式中用  $\xi_{j}, x_{i}$ , 代替  $x_{i}$ , 就得到$\sum_{j=0}^{n} \sum_{i=0}^{n}\left\langle A^{i} x_{j}, A^{j} x_{i}\right\rangle \xi_{j} \bar{\xi}_{i} \geqslant 0$,也就是说, 有限矩阵  $\left(\left\langle A^{i} x_{j}, A^{j} x_{i}\right\rangle\right)$  是正定的。 这是 Hilbert 空间上有界线性算子为次正规算子的一个必要条件。 现在找们着手构造一个亚正规算子, 它不满足这个必要条件, 从而它不是次正规算子。 设 S 是带权数序列 $\left(\alpha_{0}, \alpha_{1}, \alpha_{2}, \cdots\right)$  的加权右移算子,$\left(\varphi_{0}, \varphi_{1}\right. \text {, } \left.\varphi_{2}, \cdots\right)$  是  $l^{2}$  中的就范完全直交系。 于是,  $S^{*} S$  和  $S S^{*}$  都是对角算子，其中  $S^{*} S$  的对角线是  $\left(\left|\alpha_{0}\right|^{2},\left|\alpha_{1}\right|^{2},\left|\alpha_{2}\right|^{2}, \cdots\right)$ , 而  $S S^{*}$  的对角线是  $\left(0,\left|\alpha_{0}\right|^{2},\left|\alpha_{1}\right|^{2},\left|\alpha_{2}\right|^{2}, \cdots\right)$ 。 由此可知,  S  是亚正规的 (即  $S S^{*} \leqslant S^{*} S $ ) 当且仅当数列  $\left\{\left|\alpha_{n}\right|\right\}$  递增。 现取  S  为带权数序列  $(\alpha, \beta, 1,1, \cdots)$  的加权右移算子,其中  $0<\alpha<\beta<1$ 。 据上所述，  S  是亚正规算子。然而，我们取  i, j  为  0,1,2 , 则矩阵  $\left(\left\langle S^{i} \varphi_{j}\right.\right. .  \left.\left.S^{j} \varphi_{i}\right\rangle\right)$  是$\left(\begin{array}{lll}1 & \alpha & \alpha \beta \\\alpha & \beta^{2} & \beta \\\alpha \beta & \beta & 1\end{array}\right)$,它所对应的行列式的值是  $-\alpha^{2}\left(1-\beta^{2}\right)^{2}<0$ , 所以它不是正定的,从而  S  不是次正规算子。

statement: There exist nowhere continuous, weakly bounded variation functions defined on [0,1] and taking values in c.
chinese_statement: 存在定义在  [0,1]  上而取值于  c  中的弱有界变差的无处连续函数。
rationale: Example: Take all rational numbers $\left\{r_{n}\right\}$ in [0,1] and define the function $\xi_{n}(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1,& t=r_{n},\\0,& t\neq r_{n},\end{array}\right.$ then $x(t)=\left\{\xi_{n}(t)\right\}$ is a vector-valued function defined on [0,1] and taking values in space \boldsymbol{c}, and $\bigvee_{0}^{1}\left(\xi_{n}\right)\leqslant 2$, therefore $x(t)$ is a weakly bounded variation function. Here we prove that $x(t)$ is nowhere continuous on [0,1]. In fact, for any $t_{0}\in[0,1]$, $\left\|x(t)-x\left(t_{0}\right)\right\|=\sup_{n}\left|\xi_{n}(t)-\xi_{n}\left(t_{0}\right)\right|,\quad 0\leqslant t\leqslant1$. If $t_{0}$ is a rational point, $t_{0}=r_{k}$, then $\left\|x(t)-x\left(t_{0}\right)\right\|=\left|\xi_{k}(t)-\xi_{k}\left(r_{k}\right)\right|=1, t\in[0,1], \quad t\neq r_{k}$, hence $\lim_{t\rightarrow t_{0}}\left\|x(t)-x\left(t_{0}\right)\right\|=0$ does not hold. If $t_{0}$ is an irrational point, there exists a sequence of rational points $\left\{r_{k}\right\}, r_{k}\rightarrow t_{0}$, and $\begin{aligned}\| x\left(r_{k}\right)-x\left(t_{0}\right) \mathbb{\|} &=\sup_{n}\left|\xi_{n}\left(r_{k}\right)-\xi_{n}\left(t_{0}\right)\right| \\&=\left|\xi_{k}\left(r_{k}\right)-\xi_{k}\left(t_{0}\right)\right|=1,\end{aligned}$ so $\lim\left\|x(t)-x\left(t_{0}\right)\right\|=0$ does not hold either. Thus, we have proven that $x(t)$ is discontinuous at every point on [0,1].
chinese_rationale: 例： 取  [0,1]  中的一切有理数  $\left\{r_{n}\right\}$ , 作函数$\xi_{n}(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1, & t=r_{n}, \\0, & t \neq r_{n},\end{array}\right.$则  $x(t)=\left\{\xi_{n}(t)\right\}$  是定义在  [0,1]  上而取值于空间  \boldsymbol{c}  中的向量值函数, 且  $\bigvee_{0}^{1}\left(\xi_{n}\right) \leqslant 2$ , 因而  $x(t)$  是弱有界变差函数。兹证  $x(t)$  在  [0,1]  上无处连续。 事实上, 任取  $t_{0} \in[0,1]$ , 则$\left\|x(t)-x\left(t_{0}\right)\right\|=\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}(t)-\xi_{n}\left(t_{0}\right)\right|, \quad 0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1$ 。倘若  $t_{0}$  是有理点, $ t_{0}=r_{k}$ , 则$\left\|x(t)-x\left(t_{0}\right)\right\|=\left|\xi_{k}(t)-\xi_{k}\left(r_{k}\right)\right|=1, t \in[0,1], \quad t \neq r_{k}$,故  $\lim _{t \rightarrow t_{0}}\left\|x(t)-x\left(t_{0}\right)\right\|=0$  不成立。倘若  $t_{0}$  是无理点,则有一列有理点  $\left\{r_{k}\right\}, r_{k} \rightarrow t_{0}$ , 而$\begin{aligned}\| x\left(r_{k}\right)-x\left(t_{0}\right) \mathbb{\|} & =\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}\left(r_{k}\right)-\xi_{n}\left(t_{0}\right)\right| \\& =\left|\xi_{k}\left(r_{k}\right)-\xi_{k}\left(t_{0}\right)\right|=1,\end{aligned}$所以  $\lim \left\|x(t)-x\left(t_{0}\right)\right\|=0$  也不成立。这样我们便证明了  $x(t)$  在  [0,1]  上每一点都不连续。

statement: A $weak^{*}$ separable conjugate space, which contains a non-$weak^{*}$ separable closed subspace.
chinese_statement: 一个弱$^{*}$可分的共轭空间, 其中存在不弱$^{*}$可分的闭子空间。
rationale: For example: Let X be the conjugate space of the Banach space $l^{\infty}$, and consider the $weak^{*}$ topology on X, then X is $weak^{*}$ separable.  X contains a copy of an inseparable Hilbert space H, denoted as Y. Since Y is self-adjoint, hence Y is a $weak^{*}$ closed subspace of X. Because Y is reflexive and Y is inseparable, it follows that Y is also non-$weak^{*}$ separable.
chinese_rationale: 例如:设  X  是 Banach 空间  $l^{\infty}$  的共轭空间,并在  X  上取弱$^{*}$ 拓扑, 则  X 是弱$^{*}$ 可分的。 据  [270]  的命题  3.4, X  包含一个不可分 Hilbert 空间  H  的副本  Y 。 因  Y  是自区的, 故由 [270]的命题 1.2 知,  Y  是  X  的一个弱$^{*}$ 闭子空间。 由于  Y  自反且  Y  不可分, 故  Y  也不弱$^{*}$可分。

statement: There exists a normal operator T and an orthogonal projection operator P such that PTP is not a normal operator.
chinese_statement: 存在某个正规算子  T  与直交射影算子  P , 使  P T P  不是正规算子。
rationale: For example, let H be the three-dimensional complex Euclidean space, and let $T=\left(\begin{array}{lll}0 & 0 & 1 \\1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 1 & 0\end{array}\right), \quad P=\left(\begin{array}{lll}0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 1 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 1\end{array}\right)$. Then T is a unitary operator and thus a normal operator. P is the orthogonal projection operator from H onto $\operatorname{span}\left\{e_{2}, e_{3}\right\}$. It is easily verified that $(PTP)^{*}(PTP) \neq (PTP)(PTP)^{*}$, so PTP is not a normal operator.
chinese_rationale: 例如：设  H  是复三维欧氏空间，又设$T=\left(\begin{array}{lll}0 & 0 & 1 \\1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 1 & 0\end{array}\right), \quad P=\left(\begin{array}{lll}0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 1 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 1\end{array}\right)$,则  T  是酉算子, 从而也是正规算子。  P  是  H  到  $\operatorname{span}\left\{e_{2}, e_{3}\right\}$  上的直交射影算子。 容易验证,  $(P T P)^{*}(P T P) \neq(P T P)(P T P)^{*}$ , 故  P T P  不是正规算子。

statement: There exists an operator T with norm 1 on some non-separable Banach space, such that T has uncountably many eigenvalues with modulus 1.
chinese_statement: 存在某个不可分 Banach 空间上的范数为 1 的算子  T ， 使  T  有不可数个模数为 1 的特征值。
rationale: Let C be the set of all complex numbers with modulus 1, endowed with the usual topology. Let $X= C^{c}$, and endow X with the product topology; elements of X are denoted by $\left\{x_{\lambda}\right\}_{\lambda \in C}$. Let g be a mapping from X to itself, which scales the $\lambda$-th coordinate by $\lambda$, i.e., $g\left\{x_{\lambda}\right\}_{\lambda \in c}= \left\{\lambda x_{\lambda}\right\}_{\lambda \in C}$. Define B as the complex Banach space C(X), and let $T f=f \circ g$, where $f \in C(X)$, then $\|T\|=1$, hence $\left\|T^{x}\right\| \leqslant 1$. If f is an element in C(X) such that it takes the $\lambda$-th coordinate value $x_{\lambda}$ at the point $\left\{x_{\lambda}\right\}_{\lambda \in c}$, then f is an eigenvector with respect to $\lambda$. Consequently, every point in C is an eigenvalue of T. Of course, the Banach space B=C(X) is non-separable.
chinese_rationale: 设  C  为模数为 1 的全体复数， 在  C  上取通常的拓扑。 令  $X=   C^{c}$ ，并在  X  上取乘积拓扑，  X  中的代表元素记作  $\left\{x_{\lambda}\right\}_{\lambda \in C}$ 。 设  g 是  X  到自身的映射， 它把第$  \lambda$  个坐标 扩大 $ \lambda $ 倍， 即  $g\left\{x_{\lambda}\right\}_{\lambda \in c}=   \left\{\lambda x_{\lambda}\right\}_{\lambda \in C}$ 。 又设  B  为复 Banach 空间  C(X) ， 令  $T f=f \circ g$ ， 其中 $ f \in C(X) $， 则  $\|T\|=1$ ， 从而 $ \left\|T^{x}\right\| \leqslant 1 $。若  f  是  C(X)  中这样的元素， 它在点  $\left\{x_{\lambda}\right\}_{\lambda \in c}$  取值为第 $ \lambda  $个坐标$  x_{\lambda} $， 则  f  是关于  $\lambda$  的特征向量。 于是，  C  中每一点都是  T  的特征值。 当然， Banach 空间  B=C(X)  是不可分的。

statement: There exists an unbounded linear operator whose inverse is bounded.
chinese_statement: 一个无界线性算子，其逆算子有界。
rationale: Let $X=\left(l,\|x\|=\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right|\right)$, $Y=\left(l,\|x\|=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|\right)$, where $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l$. Define $T x=x$, then T is a one-to-one linear operator from X to Y. Its inverse operator $T^{-1}$ satisfies the inequality $\left\|T^{-1} x\right\|=\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right| \leqslant\|x\|$. Therefore, $T^{-1}$ is bounded. On the other hand, we take $x_{n}=(1,1, \cdots, 1,0,0, \cdots) \in X$, then $\left\|x_{n}\right\|=1$, while $\left\|T x_{n}\right\|=n$, showing that T is unbounded.
chinese_rationale: 设  $X=\left(l，\|x\|=\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right|\right)， Y=\left(l，\|x\|=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|\right)$ ， 其中  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l$ 。 令  $T x=x$ ， 则  T  是由  X  到  Y  上的一对一的线性算子。其逆算子  $T^{-1}$  满足不等式$\left\|T^{-1} x\right\|=\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right| \leqslant\|x\|$ 。因此，  $T^{-1}$  是有界的。 另一方面，我们取  $x_{n}=(1，1， \cdots， 1，0，0， \cdots)   \in X$ ， 则  $\left\|x_{n}\right\|=1$ ， 而  $\left\|T x_{n}\right\|=n$ ， 可见T是无界的。

statement: There exists an indivisible Banach space that can be endowed with an equivalent smooth norm.
chinese_statement: 存在某个不可分的 Banach 空间， 而能赋予等价的光滑范数。
rationale: The Banach space $c_{0}(\Gamma)$ has the desired properties. It has been proven that $c_{0}(\Gamma)$ can be re-normed such that it is locally uniformly convex under the new norm, F is differentiable, and under the new norm, the corresponding conjugate space is also locally uniformly convex. Note: Klee proved that every separable Banach space can be endowed with an equivalent smooth strictly convex norm, and the corresponding conjugate space is also strictly convex.
chinese_rationale: Banach 空间  $c_{0}(\Gamma)$  具有所需的性质，现已证明  $c_{0}(\Gamma)$  可再赋范使它在新范数下是局部一致凸的， 且  F  可微， 及在新范数下相应的共轭空间也是局部一致凸的。注： $Klee$  证明了每个可分的 Banach 空间皆可赋予一个等价的光滑的严格凸范数，且相应的共轭空间也是严格凸的。

statement: The convex hull of a bounded set in a linear metric space is necessarily bounded
chinese_statement: 度量线性空间中的有界集的凸包一定是有界的
rationale: Example: Let $l^{p}(0<p<1)$ be the set formed by sequences $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}$ satisfying the condition $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{p}<+\infty$. For $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}, y=\left\{\eta_{n}\right\} \in l^{p}$, define $d(x, y)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}-\eta_{n}\right|^{p}$, then $l^{p}$ with the usual linear operations forms a linear metric space. We use B[0,1] to represent the closed ball in $l^{p}$ centered at 0 with radius 1. B[0,1] is metrically bounded, so according to the proposition, it is also bounded. Now, take $e_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0 ,  \left.1,0, \cdots) \in B_{-}^{-} 0,1\right]$, and let $a_{n}=\frac{\sum_{k=1}^{n} \dot{e}_{k}}{n}=\left(\frac{1}{n}, \cdots, \frac{1}{n}, 0, \cdots\right)$, then $a_{n}$ belongs to the convex hull of B[0,1]. But $d\left(0, a_{n}\right)=n^{1-p} \rightarrow+\infty (n \rightarrow \infty)$, so the convex hull of B[0,1] is not metrically bounded, and according to this proposition, it is not bounded.
chinese_rationale: 例：设  $l^{p}(0<p<1)$  为满足条件$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{p}<+\infty$的数列  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}$  所成之集, 对  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}, y=\left\{\eta_{n}\right\} \in l^{p}$ , 令$d(x, y)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}-\eta_{n}\right|^{p}$,则  $l^{p}$ 按通常的线性运算为一度量线性空间。 我们用  B[0,1]  代表  $l^{p}$  中以 0为球心, 1 为半径的闭球,则  B[0,1] 是度量有界的, 据上述命题, 它也是有界的。 现取  $e_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0 ,  \left.1,0, \cdots) \in B_{-}^{-} 0,1\right]$ , 并令$a_{n}=\frac{\sum_{k=1}^{n} \dot{e}_{k}}{n}=\left(\frac{1}{n}, \cdots, \frac{1}{n}, 0, \cdots\right)$,则  $a_{n}$  属于  B[0,1]  的 凸包。 但$d\left(0, a_{n}\right)=n^{1-p} \rightarrow+\infty(n \rightarrow \infty)$,所以  B[0,1]  的凸包不是度量有界的, 据此命题, 它也不是有界的。

statement: There exists a Banach space with a basis but without a monotone basis.
chinese_statement: 一个有基的 Banach 空间， 它没有单调基。
rationale: Consider the Banach space $C[0, 1]$. Let $\boldsymbol{x}_{\mathbf{n}}(t)=t^{n}, \quad t \in[0,1], \quad n=1,2, \cdots$. We can select such a subsequence of $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ that $\left\{x_{n_{k}}\right\}$, which is a basis sequence of X, and the closed subspace $X_{0}$ generated by $\left\{x_{\left.n_{k}\right\}}\right\}$ has no monotone basis.
chinese_rationale: 考虑 Banach 空间  C[0，1] 。 令$\boldsymbol{x}_{\mathbf{n}}(t)=t^{n}， \quad t \in[0，1]， \quad n=1，2， \cdots$ 。我们可以选取  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  的一个这样的子列  $\left\{x_{n_{k}}\right\}$ ， 它是  X  的一个 基序列， 而由  $\left\{x_{\left.n_{k}\right\}}\right\}$  张成的闭子空间  $X_{0}$  没有单调基 。

statement: There exist two metric spaces X and Y, such that $X^{2}$ and $Y^{2}$ are isometric, but X and Y are not isometric.
chinese_statement: 存在两个度量空间  X  与  Y ， 使  $X^{2}$  与  $Y^{2}$  等距而  X  与  Y  并不等距。
rationale: An example is as follows: Let $\mathrm{Q}$ be the set of rational numbers, $\mathrm{X}=\mathbf{Q} \subset \mathbf{R}^{1}, \mathrm{Y}=\{p \sqrt{2}: p \in \mathrm{Q}\} \subset \mathbf{R}^{1}$. It can be proven that X and Y, as metric subspaces of $\mathbf{R}^{1}$, are not isometric. In fact, if X and Y are isometric and let f be an isometric mapping from X to Y, then we should have $\begin{aligned}1 & =d(0,1)=d(f(0), f(1)) \\& =d(p \sqrt{2}, q \sqrt{2})=\sqrt{2}|p-q|.\end{aligned}$ Thus, we get $\sqrt{2}=|p-q|^{-1} \in \mathbf{Q}$, which is a contradiction. Next, we prove that $X^{2}$ and $Y^{2}$ are isometric. To do this, we consider $X^{2}$ and $Y^{2}$ as metric subspaces of $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ and study the mapping $\theta: \mathbf{R}^{2} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}^{2}$, where $\theta(x, y)=((x-y) \sqrt{2} / 2, (x+y) \sqrt{2} / 2)$. Clearly, $\theta$ is an isometric mapping from $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ to $\mathbf{R}^{2}$. Now, for any $(p, q) \in X^{2}$, both $(p-q)/2$ and $(p+q)/2$ are rational numbers, so $\theta(p, q)=((p-q) \sqrt{2} / 2, (p+q) \sqrt{2} / 2) \in Y^{2}$, i.e., $\theta\left(X^{2}\right) \subset Y^{2}$. On the other hand, for any $(p \sqrt{2}, q \sqrt{2}) \in Y^{2}$, $(p \sqrt{2}, q \sqrt{2})$ is the image of $(p+q, q-p) \in X^{2}$; hence, $\theta\left(X^{2}\right) \supset Y^{2}$. Therefore, $\theta\left(X^{2}\right)=Y^{2}$. Therefore, if g is the restriction of $\theta$ on $X^{2}$, then $g: X^{2} \rightarrow Y^{2}$ is an isometric surjection, where $(p, q) \in X^{2}, g(p, q)=\theta(p, q)$. Thus, $X^{2}$ and $Y^{2}$ are isometric.
chinese_rationale: 例子如下: 设$\mathrm{Q}$是有理数集，$\mathrm{X}=\mathbf{Q} \subset \mathbf{R}^{1}， \mathrm{Y}=\{p \sqrt{2}: p \in \mathrm{Q}\} \subset \mathbf{R}^{1}$ 。 可以证明，  X  与  Y  作为  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  的度量子空间， 它们并不等距。 事实上，如果  X  与  Y  等距， 并设  f  是  X  到  Y  上的等距映射， 那么应有 $\begin{aligned}1 & =d(0，1)=d(f(0)， f(1)) \\& =d(p \sqrt{2}， q \sqrt{2})=\sqrt{2}|p-q|.\end{aligned}$于是得到  $\sqrt{2}=|p-q|^{-1} \in \mathbf{Q}$ ， 矛盾。兹证  $X^{2}$  与  $Y^{2}$  等距。 为此， 我们把  $X^{2}， Y^{2}$  作为  $\mathbf{R}^{2} $ 的度量子空间，并研究映射  $\theta: \mathbf{R}^{2} \rightarrow \mathbf{R}^{2}$ ， 这里$\theta(x， y)=((x-y) \sqrt{2} / 2，(x+y) \sqrt{2} / 2)$ 。显然，  $\theta$  是  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  到  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  上的一个等距映射。 今任取  $(p， q) \in X^{2}$ ， 则 $(p-q) / 2$  与  $(p+q) / 2$  都是有理数， 故$\theta(p， q)=((p-q) \sqrt{2} / 2，(p+q) \sqrt{2} / 2) \in Y^{2}$，即$\theta\left(X^{2}\right) \subset Y^{2}$ 。 另一方面， 对任意  $(p \sqrt{2}， q \sqrt{2}) \in Y^{2}，(p \sqrt{2}， q \sqrt{2})$  是  $(p+q， q-p) \in X^{2}$  的象; 故  $\theta\left(X^{2}\right) \supset Y^{2}$ 。 因此，  $\theta\left(X^{2}\right)=Y^{2}$ 。 于是，如果令  $g$  是  $\theta$  在  $X^{2}$  上的限制， 那么，  $g: X^{2} \rightarrow Y^{2}$  是一个等距满射，这里  $(p， q) \in X^{2}， g(p， q)=\theta(p， q)$ 。 因此，  $X^{2}$  与  $Y^{2}$  是等距的。

statement: There exist Banach spaces with a basis but without an unconditional basis.
chinese_statement: 有基而没有无条件基的 Banach 空间。
rationale:
First example: James' space has a basis but no unconditional basis.
Second example: The Banach spaces $C[0,1]$ and $L[0,1]$ have a basis but no unconditional basis. Furthermore, it has been pointed out that $L[0,1]$ cannot be embedded into a Banach space with an unconditional basis, that is, $L[0,1]$ cannot be isometrically isomorphic to any subspace of a Banach space with an unconditional basis. For the proof, interested readers may refer to the original text by the author.
chinese_rationale:
第一例: James 空间有基而没有无条件基。
第二例: Banach 空间  C[0,1]  和  L[0,1]  有基而没有无条件基。进一步的，还有人指出：L[0,1]  不能嵌入到具有无条件基的 Banach 空间,即  L[0,1]  不能等距同构于具有无 条件 基的 Banach 空间 的某个子空间。 有关证明, 读者如有兴趣, 可参看作者原文。

statement: There does not exist an inseparable Hilbert space.
chinese_statement: 不存在不可分的Hilbert 空间。
rationale: Let $\Gamma$ be an uncountable set of real numbers, $l^{2}(\Gamma)$ represents the set of real-valued functions $x(\gamma)$ defined on $\Gamma$ with the following property: the set $\{\gamma \in \Gamma: x(\gamma) \neq 0\}$ is at most countable, and satisfies $\sum_{\gamma \in \Gamma}|x(\gamma)|^{2}< + \infty$. We define the usual linear operations on $l^{2}(\Gamma)$, and define the inner product as $\langle\boldsymbol{x}, y\rangle=\sum_{\gamma \in \Gamma} x(\gamma) y(\gamma)$, then $l^{2}(\Gamma)$ is a Hilbert space, but it is not separable.
chinese_rationale: 设  $\Gamma$  为一不可数的实数集,  $l^{2}(\Gamma)$  代表 定义在  $\Gamma$  上的具有如下性质的实值函数  $x(\gamma)$  的全体, 使得  $\{\gamma \in \Gamma: x(\gamma) \neq 0\}$  至多为一可数集,且满足$\sum_{\gamma \in \Gamma}|x(\gamma)|^{2}<+\infty$我们在  $l^{2}(\Gamma)$  上定义通常的线性运算, 并定义内积为$\langle\boldsymbol{x}, y\rangle=\sum_{\gamma \in \Gamma} x(\gamma) y(\gamma)$,则  $l^{2}(\Gamma)$  为Hilbert 空间, 但它并不可分。

statement: In a normed linear space, there exist sequences that converge weakly but not strongly.
chinese_statement: 赋范线性空间中存在弱收敛而不强收敛的点列。
rationale: For example, consider the sequence $e_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0, 1, 0, \cdots)$ in the space $l^{2}$. Since $\left\|e_{n}\right\|=1 (n=1, 2, \ldots)$, it follows that $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ does not converge strongly to 0. However, from the general form of bounded linear functionals on the space $l^{2}$, for any $f=\left\{f_{n}\right\} \in \left(l^{2}\right)^{*}=l^{2}$, we have $f(x)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} f_{n} \xi_{n}, x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}$. Therefore, $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} f\left(e_{n}\right)=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} f_{n}=0$, meaning that $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ converges weakly to 0.
chinese_rationale: 例如， 在空间  $l^{2}$  中取  $e_{n}=(0， \cdots， 0，1，0， \cdots)$ ， 那么， 由  $\left\|e_{n}\right\|=1(n=1，2 ，  \ldots)$  可知  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  不强收敛于 0 。 然而， 由空间  $l^{2}$  上有界线性泛函的一般形式可知， 对任一  $f=\left\{f_{n}\right\} \in\left(l^{2}\right)^{*}=l^{2}$ ， 都有$f(x)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} f_{n} \xi_{n}， x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}$ 。因而可得  $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} f\left(e_{n}\right)=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} f_{n}=0$ ， 即  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  弱收敛于 0 。

statement: There exists an infinite set in a normed linear space whose linear closure is not equal to the linear subspace formed by the infinite linear combinations of its elements.
chinese_statement: 存在某个赋范线性空间中的无限集，它的线性闭包不等于它的元素的无限线性组合所成的线性子空间。
rationale: Let A be a subset of the normed linear space X. $S_{1}$ is the linear closure of A, and $S_{2}$ is the linear subspace formed by the infinite linear combinations of the elements of A, that is, $S_{2}=\left\{\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_{n} x_{n}: a_{n} \text { are all numbers, } x_{n} \in A\right\}$. It is easy to prove that $S_{2} \subset S_{1}$. In fact, for any $x \in S_{2}$, there exist a sequence $\left\{a_{n}\right\}$ and a sequence of points $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset A$ such that $y_{n}=\sum_{k=1}^{n} a_{k} x_{k} \rightarrow x(n \rightarrow \infty)$. Since $S_{1}$ is a closed linear subspace containing A, $x \in S_{1}$. It should be noted that the inclusion $S_{2} \subset S_{1}$ is generally strict. For example, consider the real Banach space C[0,1] and let $A=\left\{t^{n}: n=0,1,2, \cdots\right\}$. Then A is a subset of C[0,1]. According to the Weierstrass approximation theorem, $S_{1}=C[0,1]$. On the other hand, for the function $\left|t-\frac{1}{2}\right| \in C[0,1]$, it cannot be represented as an infinite linear combination of the elements $t^{n}$ in A. This is because the convergence of the power series $\sum_{n=0}^{\infty} a_{n} t^{n}$ in C[0,1] is equivalent to its uniform convergence on the interval [0,1] and its sum function should be differentiable. However, the function $\left|t-\frac{1}{2}\right|$ is not differentiable at $t=\frac{1}{2}$, so $\left|t-\frac{1}{2}\right| \notin S_{2}$, thus $S_{1} \neq S_{2}$.
chinese_rationale: 设  A  是赋范线性空间  X  的子集，  $S_{1}$  是  A  的线性闭包，  $S_{2}$  是  A  中的元素的无限线性组合所成的线性子空间， 即$S_{2}=\left\{\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_{n} x_{n}: a_{n} \text { 均为数， } x_{n} \in A\right\}$ 。容易证明，  $S_{2} \subset S_{1}$  ，事实上， 任取  $x \in S_{2}$ ， 则存在数列  $\left\{a_{n}\right\}$  及点列  $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset A$ ， 使$y_{n}=\sum_{k=1}^{n} a_{k} x_{k} \rightarrow x(n \rightarrow \infty)$ 。因  $S_{1}$  是包含  A  的闭线性子空间， 故  $x \in S_{1}$ 。应当注意， 包含关系  $S_{2} \subset S_{1}$  一般说来是严格的。 例如， 我们考虑实 Banach 空间  C[0，1] ， 并令$A=\left\{t^{n}: n=0，1，2， \cdots\right\}$则  A  是  C[0，1]  的子集。 据Weierstrass 逼近定理，  $S_{1}=C[0，1]$ 。 另一方面， 对于函数  $\left|t-\frac{1}{2}\right| \in C[0，1]$  而言， 它不能表成  A  中的元素  $t^{n}$  的无限线性组合， 这是因为幂级数  $\sum_{n=0}^{\infty} a_{n} t^{n}$  在  C[0，1]  中的收敛性等价于它在区间  [0，1]  上的一致收敛性， 其和函数应当可微， 然而函数  $\left|t-\frac{1}{2}\right|$  在  $t=\frac{1}{2}$  处并不可微， 所以  $\left|t-\frac{1}{2}\right| \notin S_{2}$ ， 从而  $S_{1} \neq   S_{2}$ 。

statement: There exists an infinite-dimensional reflexive Banach space that is not linearly homeomorphic to its Cartesian product.
chinese_statement: 存在某个无穷维自反Banach空间，它不线性同胚于它的Cartesian 积。
rationale: In 1972, Figiel further constructed an infinite-dimensional reflexive Banach space that is not linearly homeomorphic to its Cartesian product. Here, we briefly introduce his example as follows: Let $l_{n}^{p}$ represent an n-tuple $a=\left(a_{1}, \cdots, a_{n}\right)$ with the norm $\left \| a \right \|=\left\{\begin{array}{l}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{n}\left|a_{i}\right|^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}}, 1 \leqslant p<+\infty \\\max _{1<i \leqslant n}\left|a_{i}\right|, \quad p=+\infty\end{array}\right.$, which is a Banach space. Let $\left\{\left(X_{k},\|\cdot\|_{k}\right)\right\}_{k=1}^{\infty}$ be a sequence of Banach spaces. The space of sequences $x=\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{k}\right\}_{k-1}^{\infty}$, where $x_{k} \in X_{k}$ and $\|x\|=\left(\sum_{k=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{k}\right\|_{k}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}}<+\infty(1 \leqslant p<+\infty)$, is denoted as $\left(\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \Theta X_{k}\right)_{p}$. Thus, $\left(\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \oplus X_{k}\right)_{p}$, with the norm defined by (1), is a Banach space. It can be proved that for $p>1$ and for any decreasing sequence of real numbers $\left\{p_{i}\right\}_{i=1}^{\infty}$ satisfying $\lim _{i \rightarrow \infty} p_{i} \geqslant \max \{2, p\}$, there exists a sequence of positive integers $\left\{n_{i}\right\}_{i=1}^{\infty}$ such that the reflexive Banach space $X=\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \oplus l_{n_{i}}^{p_{i}}\right)_{p_{i}}$ is not linearly homeomorphic to $X^{2}$. For proof details, refer to the original text by the author.
chinese_rationale: 1972 年, Figiel进一步作出了一个无穷维自反Banach 空间, 它不线性同还于它的 Cartesian 积。 这里, 我们简要地介绍他的例子如下:用  $l_{n}^{p}$  代表  n  有序数组  $a=\left(a_{1}, \cdots, a_{n}\right)$  且具有范数$\left \| a \right \|=\left\{\begin{array}{l}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{n}\left|a_{i}\right|^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}}, 1 \leqslant p<+\infty \\\max _{1<i \leqslant n}\left|a_{i}\right|, \quad p=+\infty\end{array}\right.$的 Banach 空间, 设  $\left\{\left(X_{k},\|\cdot\|_{k}\right)\right\}_{k=1}^{\infty}$  为Banach 空间列, 命所有使  $x_{k} \in X_{k}$  且$\|x\|=\left(\sum_{k=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{k}\right\|_{k}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}}<+\infty(1 \leqslant p<+\infty)$的点列  $x=\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{k}\right\}_{k-1}^{\infty}$  所组成的空间记作  $\left(\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \Theta X_{k}\right)_{p}$ , 则 $\left(\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \oplus X_{k}\right)_{p}$  按 (1) 式定义的范数为Banach 空间。 可以证明对  $p>1$ 及每个适合  $\lim _{i \rightarrow \infty} p_{i} \geqslant \max \{2, p\}$  的递减的实数列  $\left\{p_{i}\right\}_{i=1}^{\infty}$ , 存在正整数列  $\left\{n_{i}\right\}_{i=1}^{\infty}$ , 使自反 Banach 空间  $X=\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \oplus l_{n_{i}}^{p_{i}}\right)_{p_{i}}$  不线性同胚于  $X^{2}$ 。 证明细节可参看作者原文。

statement: There exist lower semi-continuous but not continuous functionals.
chinese_statement: 存在下半连续而不连续的泛函。
rationale: A real-valued functional f defined on a normed linear space is called lower semi-continuous if for any real number $a$, the set ${x: f(x) ≤ a}$ is a closed set. If $-f$ is lower semi-continuous, then $f$ is called upper semi-continuous. A lower semi-continuous linear functional is necessarily continuous. However, a lower semi-continuous functional need not be continuous. For example, consider the norm $||x|| = sup_n |\xi_n|$ on the linear space $E^\infty$, where ${\xi_n} ∈ E^\infty$. Let $f(x) = \sum_n |\xi_n|$, then $f$ is a functional on $E^\infty$. For any real number a, the set $\{x = \{\xi_n\} \in E^\infty: \sum_n |\xi_n| \le a\}$ is obviously a closed set, hence $f$ is lower semi-continuous. To prove that $f$ is not continuous, take $x_n = (0, ..., 0, 1/n, ..., 1/2n, 0, ...)$, then $\lim_{n \to \infty} ||x_n|| = 0$, while $\lim_{n \to \infty} f(x_n) = \lim_{n \to \infty} \sum_{k=n}^{2n} 1/k = +\infty$. Thus, $f$ is not continuous at $x=0$.
chinese_rationale: 定义在赋范线性空间上的实值泛函  f  称为下半连续的， 是指对任意实数  $a，\{x: f(x) \leqslant a\}$  是闭集。 如果  -f  是下半连续的， 就称  f  是上半连续的。下半连续的线性泛函必定是连续的。 然而， 下半连续的泛函不必是连续的。例如， 在线性空间  $E^{\infty}$  上取范数  $\|x\|=\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right|$ ， 其中  $\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in E^{\infty}$ 。 令$f(x)=\sum_{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right|$则  f  是  $E^{\infty}$  上的泛函。 对任意实数  $a，\left\{x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in E^{\infty}: \sum_{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right| \leqslant a\right\}$ 显然是闭集， 故  f  是下半连续的。兹证  f  不连续。 为此， 取  $x_{n}=\left(0， \cdots， 0， \frac{1}{n}， \cdots， \frac{1}{2 n}， 0， \cdots\right)$ ，则  $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left\|x_{n}\right\|=0$  ，而$\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} f\left(x_{n}\right)=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \sum_{k=n}^{2 n} \frac{1}{k}=+\infty$，故  f  在  x=0  不连续。

statement: There exists a convex balanced absorbing set without interior points in some normed linear space.
chinese_statement: 存在某个赋范线性空间中没有内点的凸的均衡吸收集。
rationale: Let f be a discontinuous linear functional on an infinite-dimensional normed linear space X. Let $B=\{x: x \in X, |f(x)| \leqslant 1\}$. It is easy to see that B is a convex balanced absorbing set in X. We claim that B has no interior points. Suppose B has an interior point b, then there exists a positive number r such that $S(b, r)=\{x: x \in X, \|x-b\|<r\} \subset B$. Thus, for any point a that satisfies the inequality $\|a\|<1$, $a \in X$, we have $b+r a \in S(b, r)$, hence $|f(b+r a)| \leqslant 1$. Therefore, $|f(a)| \leqslant \frac{(1+|f(b)|)}{r}$ (1). Let $x \in X$, and set $a=\frac{x}{2\|x\|}$, $x \neq 0$. Then $\|a\|<1$, so by (1) we obtain $\left|f\left(\frac{x}{2\|x\|}\right)\right| \leqslant \frac{1+|f(b)|}{r}$. That is, $|f(x)| \leqslant \frac{2(1+|f(b)|)\|x\|}{r}$, hence $\|f\|<+\infty$, which contradicts the assumption that f is a discontinuous linear functional on X. Therefore, B has no interior points.
chinese_rationale: 设  f  是无穷维赋范线性空间  X  上的不连续的线性泛函， 令$B=\{x: x \in X，|f(x)| \leqslant 1\}$ 。易见，  B  是  X  中的凸的均衡吸收集。兹证  B  没有内点。 假若  B  有内点  b ， 则存在正数  r ， 使$S(b， r)=\{x: x \in X，\|x-b\|<r\} \subset B$ 。于是对任何满足不等式  $\|a\|<1$  的点  $a \in X$ ， 都有  $b+r a \in S(b， r)$ ，从而  $|f(b+r a)| \leqslant 1$ ， 因此$|f(a)| \leqslant \frac{(1+|f(b)|)}{r}$                  (1)。现任就  $x \in X$ ， 并令  $a=\frac{x}{2\|x\|}， x \neq 0$ ， 则  $\|a\|<1$ ， 故由(1)式得到$\left|f\left(\frac{x}{2\|x\|}\right)\right| \leqslant \frac{1+|f(b)|}{r}$ 。即  $|f(x)| \leqslant \frac{2(1+|f(b)|)\|x\|}{r}$ ， 故  $\|f\|<+\infty$ ， 这与  f  是  X  上的不连续的线性泛函发生矛盾。 因此，  B  没有内点。

statement: A $weak^{*}$ basis in the conjugate space of a Banach space, it is not necessarily a $weak^{*}$ Schauder basis.
chinese_statement: 一个 Sanach 空间的共轭空间中的弱$^{*}$基， 它不是弱$^{*}$Schauder基。
rationale: It can be proven that every basis in a Banach space must be a Schauder basis. Also, every weak basis in a Banach space must be a weak Schauder basis. However, a $weak^{*}$ basis in its conjugate space does not necessarily have to be a $weak^{*}$ Schauder basis. Singer ${ }^{[286]}$ provides an example: Let $X= c_{0}$, and $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ be the natural basis of $X^{*}=l$. Define $f_{1}=e_{1}$, $f_{n}=(-1)^{n+1} e_{1}+e_{n}$, $n=2,3, \cdots$. It can be proven that $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is a basis of $X^{*}$ in the norm topology. Thus, by the completeness of $X^{*}$, we know that $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is a Schauder basis of $X^{*}$. In fact, let $\left\{g_{n}\right\} \subset X^{**}$ be a biorthogonal sequence to the basis $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ of $X^{*}$, and set $h_1(f)=g_1(f)+\sum_{j=2}^{\infty}(-1)^{j} g_{j}(f)$ for $f \in X^{*}$, $h_{n}=g_{n}$ for $n=2,3, \cdots$. Then $\left\{h_{n}\right\}$ is biorthogonal to $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ and we have $\begin{aligned}\sum_{i=1}^{n} h_{i}(f) f_{i}= & {\left[g_{1}(f)+\sum_{j=2}^{\infty}(-1)^{j} g_{j}(f)\right] e_{1}+} \\& +\sum_{j=2}^{n} g_{j}(f)\left[(-1)^{j+1} e_{1}+e_{j}\right] \\= & \sum_{j=1}^{n} g_{j}(f) e_{j}+\left[\sum_{j=n+1}^{\infty}(-1)^{j} g_{j}(f)\right] e_{1} \\& \left(f \in X^{*}, n=1,2, \cdots\right).\end{aligned}$ Since $f=\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} g_{j}(f) e_{j}$, we have $\sum_{j=1}^{\infty}\left|g_{j}(f)\right|<+\infty, f \in X^{*}=l$. Thus, for any $\varepsilon>0$ and $f \in X^{*}$, there exists a positive integer $n_{0}=n_{0}(\varepsilon, f)$ such that when $n>n_{0}$, $\left|\sum_{j=1}^{n} h_{j}(f) f_{i}-\sum_{j=1}^{n} g_{j}(f) e_{j}\right|<\varepsilon$. Therefore, for any $f \in X^{*}$, we have $f=\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} h_{j}(f) f_{j}$. Hence, $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is a basis of $X^{*}$. We will now prove that $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is a $weak^{*}$ basis of $X^{*}$. As proven earlier, for any $f \in X^{*}$, we have $f=\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} h_{j}(f) f_{j}$. Therefore, for each $f \in X^{*}$, we also have the $weak^{*}$ expression $f(x)=\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} h_{j}(f) f_{j}(x), x \in X$. It is easy to prove that this expression is unique. Indeed, suppose for a sequence $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$, we have $\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{j} f_{j}(x)=0, x \in X$. Let $\left\{b_{n}\right\}$ be the natural basis of $X=c_{0}$. If we set $x=b_{n}, n=1,2, \cdots$, then from (1) we get $\begin{aligned} f_{j}\left(b_{1}\right) & =(-1)^{j+1}, \\f_{j}\left(b_{n}\right) & =\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1, & j=n, \\0, & j \neq n,\end{array}, n=2,3, \cdots, j=1,2, \cdots .\right.\end{aligned}$ From (3), when $x=b_{n}, n=1,2, \cdots$, we have $\sum_{j=1}^{\infty}(-1)^{j+1} \alpha_{j}=0, \alpha_{2}=\alpha_{3}=\cdots=0$. Therefore, $a_{n}=0, n=1,2, \cdots$. Hence, $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is a $weak^{*}$ basis of $X^{*}$. Let $\pi$ represent the canonical mapping of $X$ into $X^{**}$. According to (2), $h_{1} \notin \pi(X)$. Hence, $h_{1}$ is not $weak^{*}$ continuous, and thus $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is not a $weak^{*}$ Schauder basis of $X^{*}$.
chinese_rationale: 可以证明， Banach 空间中的每个 基必是 Schauder 基. 又，Banach 空间中的每个弱基必是弱 Schauder 基。 然而， 其共轨空间中的弱 $^{*}$基不必是弱 $^{*}$Schauder 基。 Singer  ${ }^{[286]}$  有例如下: 设  $X=   c_{0}，\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}=l$  的自然基。 令$f_{1}=e_{1}， f_{n}=(-1)^{n+1} e_{1}+e_{n}， n=2，3， \cdots$可以证明，  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}$  在范数拓扑下的基。 于是， 由  $X^{*}$  的完备性可知，  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}$  的 Schauder
