g_{j}(f)\left[(-1)^{j+1} e_{1}+e_{j}\right] \\= & \sum_{j=1}^{n} g_{j}(f) e_{j}+\left[\sum_{j=n+1}^{\infty}(-1)^{j} g_{j}(f)\right] e_{1} \\& \left(f \in X^{*}， n=1，2， \cdots\right) .\end{aligned}$由于  $f=\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} g_{j}(f) e_{j}$ ， 因而$\sum_{j=1}^{\infty}\left|g_{j}(f)\right|<+\infty， f \in X^{*}=l$ .于是对任给的  $\varepsilon>0  及  f \in X^{*}$ ， 存在正整数  $n_{0}=n_{0}(\varepsilon， f)$ ， 当  $n>n_{0}$  时就有$\left|\sum_{j=1}^{n} h_{j}(f) f_{i}-\sum_{j=1}^{n} g_{j}(f) e_{j}\right|<\varepsilon$ 。因此， 对任意  $f \in X^{*}$ ， 都有$f=\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} h_{j}(f) f_{j}$ .故  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}$  的基.兹证  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}$  的弱  ${ }^{*}$  基。 前面已证对任意  $f \in X^{*}$ ， 都有$f=\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} h_{j}(f) f_{j}$ .因此， 对每一  $f \in X^{*}$ ， 也有弱*表达式$f(x)=\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} h_{j}(f) f_{j}(x)， x \in X$ 。容易证明， 这个表达式是唯一的。 其实， 假定对于数列  $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$  而有$\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{j} f_{j}(x)=0， x \in X$设  $\left\{b_{n}\right\}$  是  $X=c_{0}$  的自然基。 若取  $x=b_{n}， n=1，2， \cdots$ ， 则由 (1) 式得到$\begin{aligned}f_{j}\left(b_{1}\right) & =(-1)^{j+1}， \\f_{j}\left(b_{n}\right) & =\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1， & j=n， \\0， & j \neq n，\end{array}， n=2，3， \cdots， j=1，2， \cdots .\right.\end{aligned}$再由 (3). 对  $x=b_{n}， n=1，2， \cdots$ ， 有$\sum_{j=1}^{\infty}(-1)^{j+1} \alpha_{j}=0， \alpha_{2}=\alpha_{3}=\cdots=0$ 。所以  $a_{n}=0， n=1，2， \cdots$ . 因此，  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}$  的弱 $^{*}$基。用  $\pi$  代表出  X  到  $X^{* *}$  内的典则映射. 据  (2)， $h_{1} \notin \pi(X)$ 。 因此，  $h_{1}$  不是弱  ${ }^{*}$  连续的， 从而  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  不是  $X^{*}$  的弱 {*}Schauder 基。

statement: There exists an infinite sequence that is both a Hamel basis and a Schauder basis.
chinese_statement: 既是 Hamel 基又是 Schauder 基的无穷点列。
rationale: It is easy to prove that for finite-dimensional normed linear spaces, the concepts of Schauder basis and Hamel basis are equivalent. For infinite-dimensional normed linear spaces, however, these two concepts are different. Nevertheless, there exist infinite sequences that are both Hamel and Schauder bases. For example, take the norm $\| x\left|=\sup _{k>1}\right| \xi_{k} \mid$ on the linear space $E^{*}$, where $x=\left\{\xi_{k}\right\} \in E^{\infty}$, then $E^{\infty}$ is a normed linear space. It is easy to see that the infinite sequence $\left\{e_{k}\right\}$ is both a Hamel basis and a Schauder basis for $E^{\infty}$. Note that any infinite-dimensional Banach space does not have a countable Hamel basis, while the Hamel basis in the linear space $E^{\infty}$ is countable, so there is no complete norm on $E^{\infty}$.
chinese_rationale: 容易证明， 对于有限维度量线性空间而言， Schauder 基与$Ha \mathrm{mel}$  基的概念是等价的。对于无穷维度量 线性 空间而言， 这两个概念是不同的。然而， 也存在既是 Hamel 基 又 是 Schauder 基的无穷点列。例如， 在线性空间  $E^{*}$  上取范数$\| x\left|=\sup _{k>1}\right| \xi_{k} \mid$其中  $x=\left\{\xi_{k}\right\} \in E^{\infty}$ ， 则  $E^{\infty}$  为一赋范线 性 空间。易 见， 无穷点列  $\left\{e_{k}\right\}$  既是  $E^{\infty}$  的 Hamel 基， 又是  $E^{\infty}$  的 Schauder 基。注 因为任何一个无穷维 Banach 空间 中 都 不 存在可数的 Hamel 基， 而线性空间  $E^{\infty}$  中的 Hamel 基是可数的， 所以  $E^{\infty}$ 上不存在完备范数。

statement: There exist two homeomorphic subsets A and B in $\mathbf{R}^{1}$, but there does not exist a homeomorphic mapping f from $\mathbf{R}^{1}$ to $\mathbf{R}^{1}$ such that $f(A)=B$.
chinese_statement: $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  中存在两个同胚的子集  A  与  B ， 而不存在  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  到  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  上的同胚映射  f ， 使  $f(A)=B$ 。
rationale: Let $A=\{0\} \cup[1,2] \cup\{3\}$ and $B=[0,1] \cup\{2\} \cup\{3\}$, then A and B are two homeomorphic subsets in $\mathbf{R}^{1}$, but there does not exist a homeomorphic mapping f from $\mathbf{R}^{1}$ to $\mathbf{R}^{1}$ such that $f(A)=B$.
chinese_rationale: 令  $A=\{0\} \cup[1，2] \cup\{3\}， B=[0，1] \cup\{2\} \cup\{3\}$ ， 则  A  与  B  是  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  中的两个同胚的子集， 但不存在  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  到  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  上的同胚映射  f ， 使$f(A)=B$。

statement: There exists a Schauder basis in the conjugate space of a certain Banach space, which is not a $weak^{*}$ basis.
chinese_statement: 某个 Banach 空间的共轭空间中的 Schauder 基， 它不是$弱^{*}$基。
rationale: For example: Let $X = c_{0}, \left\{e_{n}\right\}$ be the natural basis of $X^{*} = l$. Define $h_{1} = e_{1}, h_{n} = e_{n} - e_{n-1}, n = 2, 3, \cdots$. Then $\left\{h_{n}\right\} \subset X^{*}$, and $\left\{h_{n}\right\}$ is a basis of $X^{*}$ under the norm topology, therefore it is a Schauder basis of $X^{*}$. Here we prove that $\left\{h_{n}\right\}$ is not a $weak^{*}$ basis of $X^{*}$. Suppose $\left\{h_{n}\right\}$ were a $weak^{*}$ basis of $X^{*}$, then for every $f \in X^{*}$, there exists a $weak^{*}$ representation $f(x) = \sum_{i = 1}^{\infty} \alpha_{i} h_{i}(x)$, (1) where $x = \left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in X = c_{0}$ is arbitrary. According to the definition of $h_{i}$, we have $\sum_{i = 1}^{n} h_{i}(x) = e_{n}(x)$ thus for any $x \in X$, we have $\sum_{i = 1}^{\infty} h_{i}(x) = 0$, which indicates that the $weak^{*}$ representation (1) is not unique. Hence, $\left\{h_{n}\right\}$ is not a $weak^{*}$ basis of $\mathrm{X}^{*}$.
chinese_rationale: 例如：设  $X=c_{0}，\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}=l$  的自然基。 令$h_{1}=e_{1}， h_{n}=e_{n}-e_{n-1}， n=2，3， \cdots$ 。则  $\left\{h_{n}\right\} \subset X^{*}$ ， 且  $\left\{h_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}$  在范数拓扑下的基 ， 从 而它是  $X^{*}$  的 Schauder 基。兹证  $\left\{h_{n}\right\}$  不是  $X^{*}$  的$弱^{*}基$。 反设  $\left\{h_{n}\right\}$  是  $X ^{*}$  的弱$^{*}$基， 那么对每一  $f \in X^{*}$ ， 都有$弱^{*}$表达式$f(x)=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{i} h_{i}(x)$，  （1） 其中  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in X=c_{0}$  是任意的。 据  $h_{i}$  的定义， 我们有$\sum_{i=1}^{n} h_{i}(x)=e_{n}(x)$从而对任意  $x \in X$ ， 都有  $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} h_{i}(x)=0$ ， 这就说明了$弱^{*}$表达式 (1)不是唯一的。 因此，  $\left\{h_{n}\right\}$  不是  $\mathrm{X} ^{*}$  的$弱^{*}$基。

statement: There exists a Banach space with a basis, whose conjugate space has no basis.
chinese_statement: 存在一个有基的 Banach 空间，其共轭空间没有基。
rationale: The sequence $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is the basis of the Banach space $l$, where $e_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots)$. In fact, for $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l$, we have $\left|x-\sum_{i=1}^{n} \xi_{i} e_{i}\right|=\sum_{i=n+1}^{\infty}| \xi_{i} | \rightarrow 0$ $(n \rightarrow \infty)$, hence $x=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \xi_{i} e_{i}$. Furthermore, if $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \xi_{i} e_{i}=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \eta_{i} e_{i}$, then $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \sum_{i=1}^{n}|\xi_{i}-\eta_{i}|=0$, therefore, $\xi_{i}=\eta_{i}, i=1,2, \cdots$. That is, for any $x \in l$, the representation $x=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \xi_{i} e_{i}$ is unique, so $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is the basis of $l$. However, since $l^{*}=l^{*}$ is not separable, $l^{*}$ has no basis.
chinese_rationale: 点列  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是 Banach 空间  l  的基，其中$e_{n}=(0， \cdots， 0，1，0， \cdots)$ 。事实上， 对  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l$ ， 有$\left|x-\sum_{i=1}^{n} \xi_{i} e_{i}\right|\left|=\sum_{i=n+1}^{\infty}\right| \xi_{i} \mid \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$，故  $x=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \xi_{i} e_{i}$ 。又若  $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \xi_{i} e_{i}=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \eta_{i} e_{i}$ ， 则有$\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \sum_{i=1}^{n}\left|\xi_{i}-\eta_{i}\right|=0$因此，  $\xi_{i}=\eta_{i}， i=1，2， \cdots$ 。即对任一  $x \in l$ ， 表示式  $x=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \xi_{i} e_{i}$  是唯一的， 所以  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是  l  的基。然而， 由于  $l^{*}=l^{*}$  不可分， 因而  $l^{*}$  没有基.

statement: There exist a homeomorphic mapping that maps a Cauchy sequence to a non-Cauchy sequence.
chinese_statement: 把 Cauchy 点列映成非 Cauchy 点列的同胚映射。
rationale: Let $X=(-1, 1)$, and use the usual distance on X. Define $y=f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\frac{x}{1+x}, & -1 < x < 0, \\\frac{x}{1-x}, & 0 \leqslant x < 1,\end{array}\right.$ then f is a continuous, one-to-one, onto mapping from X to $\mathbf{R}^{1}$, with the inverse mapping $x=f^{-1}(y)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}\frac{y}{1-y},-\infty < y < 0, \\\frac{y}{1+y}, 0 \leqslant y < +\infty.\end{array}\right.$ Clearly, it is also continuous. Hence, f is a homeomorphic mapping from X to $\mathbf{R}^{1}$. Now, take $x_{n}=1-\frac{1}{n} \in X, n=1, 2, \cdots$, then $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ is a Cauchy sequence in X. Because $y_{n}=f\left(x_{n}\right)=n-1$, $\left\{y_{n}\right\}$ is not a Cauchy sequence in $\mathbf{R}^{1}$.
chinese_rationale: 设  $X=(-1，1)$ ， 并在  X  上取通常距离。 令$y=f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\frac{x}{1+x}， & -1<x<0， \\\frac{x}{1-x}， & 0 \leqslant x<1，\end{array}\right.$则  f  是一个由  X  到  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  上的连续的、一对一的满射， 其逆映射为$x=f^{-1}(y)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}\frac{y}{1-y}，-\infty<y<0， \\\frac{y}{1+y}， 0 \leqslant y<+\infty 。\end{array}\right.$显然， 它也是连续的。 因此，  f  是  X  到  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  上的同胚映射。现 取  $x_{n}=1-\frac{1}{n} \in X， n=1，2， \cdots$ ， 则  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  是  X  中 的 一个 Cauchy 点列。 因为  $y_{n}=f\left(x_{n}\right)=n-1$ ， 故  $\left\{y_{n}\right\}$  不是  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  中的 Cauchy 点列。

statement: There exists a uniformly convex but non-reflexive normed linear space.
chinese_statement: 存在一致凸而不自反的赋范线性空间。
rationale: Example: Consider the norm on the linear space $E^{\infty}$. $\|x\|=\left(\sum_{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}},$ where $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in E^{\infty}$, then $E^{\infty}$ is an incomplete uniformly convex normed linear space. Since a reflexive space must be complete, and $E^{\infty}$ is incomplete, it is not reflexive. Note: The concept of uniformly convex Banach spaces was introduced by Clarkson in 1936 when discussing the Radon-Nikodym theorem for vector-valued measures. Uniformly convex Banach spaces are currently known to have the strongest convexity among Banach spaces and are the strongest spaces with geometric properties weaker than Hilbert spaces.
chinese_rationale: 例：在线性空间  $E^{\infty}$  上取范数。$\|x\|=\left(\sum_{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}},$其中  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in E^{\infty}$ , 则  $E^{\infty}$  为一不完备的一致凸赋范线性空间。 因为自反空间必是完备的, 而  $E^{\infty}$  不完备, 故它并不自反。注： 一致凸 Banach 空间的概念是 Clarkson  在 1936 年讨论向量值测度的 Radon-Nikodym 定理时引入的。 一致凸 Banach 空间是目前知道的具有最强凸性的 Banach 空间, 并且是目前知道的在几何性质方面弱于 Hilbert 空间的最强空间。

statement: There exists an additive continuous operator on some complex normed linear space that does not satisfy the condition of complex homogeneity.
chinese_statement: 存在某个复赋范线性空间上的可加连续算子， 它不满足复齐性的条件。
rationale: Let X and Y be normed linear spaces. An operator $T: X \rightarrow Y$ is called additive if $T(x+y)=T x+T y$; T is called homogeneous if $T(\alpha x)=\alpha T x$. It is easy to prove that if T is an additive operator from X to Y, then if T is continuous, it must be real homogeneous, i.e., homogeneous with respect to real numbers. It should be noted that for complex normed linear spaces, the continuity of an additive operator does not necessarily imply that it is complex homogeneous, i.e., homogeneous with respect to complex numbers. For example, let C[0,1] be a complex Banach space, and define $T: C[0,1] \rightarrow C[0,1]$ as $T x=\overline{x(t)}$. It is easy to see that T is additive and continuous. However, it is easy to verify that T does not satisfy the condition of complex homogeneity.
chinese_rationale: 设  X， Y  均为赋范线性空间， 算子  $T: X \rightarrow Y$  称为可加的， 是指  $T(x+y)=T x+T y$ ; T  称为齐性的， 是指  $T(\alpha x)=\alpha T x$ 。容易证明， 若  T  是由  X  到  Y  内的可加算子， 那么， 如果  T  是连续的， 则其必是实齐性的， 即对实数是齐性的。应当注意， 对于复赋范线性空间而言， 从可加算子的连续性未必能推出它是复齐性的， 即对复数是齐性的。 例如， 设  C[0，1]  是复 Banach 空间，  $T: C[0，1] \rightarrow C[0，1]$  定义为$T x=\overline{x(t)}$ 。易见，  T  可加且连续。 然而， 容易验证  T  并不满足复齐性的条件。

statement: There exists a non-closed linear subspace in a normed linear space.
chinese_statement: 存在赋范线性空间中不闭的线性子空间。
rationale: For example, let $E^{\infty}$ represent the linear space of sequences $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}$ with only finitely many non-zero coordinates, and define $\|x\|=\left(\sum_{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}$. Then $E^{\infty}$ is a linear subspace of $l^{2}$. In $E^{\infty}$, consider the sequence of points $x_{1}=(1,0,0, \cdots), x_{2}=\left(1, \frac{1}{2}, 0, \cdots\right), \cdots, x_{n}=\left(1, \frac{1}{2}, \cdots, \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}, 0, \cdots\right), \cdots$, and let $x=\left(1, \frac{1}{2}, \cdots, \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}, \frac{1}{2^{n}}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$. Then $\left\|x_{n}-x\right\|=\left(\sum_{i=n}^{\infty}\left|\frac{1}{2^{i}}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}} \rightarrow 0 \quad(n \rightarrow \infty)$, i.e., $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ converges to x. Since $x \notin E^{\infty}$, it follows that $E^{\infty}$ is a non-closed subspace of $l^{2}$.
chinese_rationale: 例如，我们用  $E^{\infty}$ 代表只有有限个非零坐标的数列  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}$  所成的线性空间， 并令$\|x\|=\left(\sum_{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}$，则  $E^{\infty}$  是  $l^{2}$  的一个线性子空间。 在  $E^{\infty}$  中取点列  $x_{1}=(1，0，0， \cdots) ，  x_{2}=\left(1， \frac{1}{2}， 0， \cdots\right)， \cdots， x_{n}=\left(1， \frac{1}{2}， \cdots， \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}， 0， \cdots\right)， \cdots$ ， 并令  $x=\left(1， \frac{1}{2}， \cdots， \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}， \frac{1}{2^{n}}， \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$ ， 则$\left\|x_{n}-x\right\|=\left(\sum_{i=n}^{\infty}\left|\frac{1}{2^{i}}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}} \rightarrow 0 \quad(n \rightarrow \infty)$，即  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  收敛于  x 。 由于  $x \notin E^{\infty}$ ， 故  $E^{\infty}$  是  $l^{2}$  中的一个不闭的子空间。

statement: There exists an infinite-dimensional Banach space such that every reflexive subspace is finite-dimensional.
chinese_statement: 存在一个无穷维 Banach 空间, 它的每个自反子空间都是 有限维的。
rationale: The Banach space $l$ has the required property. In fact, if $M$ is a reflexive subspace of $l$, then the unit ball $\{x: x \in M,\|x\| \leqslant 1\}$ is weakly sequentially compact. Since strong convergence and weak convergence of sequences in $l$ are equivalent, $\{x: x \in M,\|x\| \leqslant 1\}$ is also compact. However, this is only possible when $M$ is finite-dimensional.
chinese_rationale: Banach 空间  $l$  具有所需的性质，事实上,如果  $M$  是  $l$  的一个自反子空间, 那么单位球  $\{x: x \in M,\|x\| \leqslant 1\}$  是弱序列紧的。 由于  l  中点列的强收敛与弱收敛彼此等价, 因此,  $\{x: x \in M,\|x\| \leqslant 1\}$ 也是紧的。 然而, 这只有当  M  是有限维时才有可能。

statement: There exist two orthogonal closed subspaces $M_{1}, M_{2}$ in some inner product space such that $M_{1} \oplus M_{2}$ is not closed.
chinese_statement: 存在某个内积空间中的两个直交的闭子空间  $M_{1}, M_{2}$ , 使  $M_{1} \oplus   M_{2}$  不闭。
rationale: Let H be a Hilbert space, $M_{1}, M_{2}$ be two closed subspaces of H such that $M_{1} \cap M_{2}=\{0\}, M_{1} \perp M_{2}$, then $M_{1} \oplus M_{2}$ must be a closed subspace of H. It should be noted that for general inner product spaces, this proposition does not hold. For example: Let $U=\{x: x \in C[-1,1]\}$, for $x, y \in U$, define $\langle x, y \rangle=\int_{-1}^{1} x(t) \overline{y(t)} dt$ and let $M_{1}=\{x \in U \text {：when } t \leqslant 0 \text { } x(t)=0\}, M_{2}=\{x \in U \text { : when } t \geqslant 0 \text { } x(t)=0\}$, then $M_{1}$ and $M_{2}$ are both closed subspaces of the inner product space U, and $M_{1} \cap M_{2}=\{0\}, M_{1} \perp M_{2}$. We will now prove that $M_{1} \oplus M_{2}=\left\{x+y: x \in M_{1}, y \in M_{2}\right\}$ is not closed. To this end, let $x(t) \equiv 1$, and let $x_{n}(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}0, & t \leqslant 0, \\n t, & 0 \leqslant t \leqslant \frac{1}{n}, \\1, & \frac{1}{n} \leqslant t \leqslant 1,\end{array}\right.$ $y_{n}(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1, & -1 \leqslant t \leqslant-\frac{1}{n}, \\-n t, & -\frac{1}{n} \leqslant t \leqslant 0, \\0, & t \geqslant 0,\end{array}\right.$ then $x_{n}+y_{n} \in M_{1} \oplus M_{2}$, and $\begin{aligned}\int_{-1}^{1} \mid x(t)- & x_{n}(t)-\left.y_{n}(t)\right|^{2} dt \\& =\int_{-\frac{1}{n}}^{0}|1+n t|^{2} dt + \int_{0}^{\frac{1}{n}}|1-n t|^{2} dt \\& =\frac{2}{3} \cdot \frac{1}{n} \rightarrow 0 (n \rightarrow \infty). \end{aligned}$ Hence $x \in \overline{M_{1} \oplus M_{2}}$. But $x \in U$, and $x \notin M_{1} \oplus M_{2}$, so $M_{1} \oplus M_{2}$ is not closed.
chinese_rationale: 设  H  是 Hilbert 空间,  $M_{1}, M_{2}$  是  H  的两个闭子空间,使  $M_{1} \cap   M_{2}=\{0\}, M_{1} \perp M_{2}$ , 则  $M_{1} \oplus M_{2}$  必为  H  的闭子空间。 应当注意,对于一般的内积空间, 这个命题并不成立。 例如： 设  $U=\{x: x \in C[-1,1]\}$ , 对  $x, y \in U$ , 令$\langle x, y\rangle=\int_{-1}^{1} x(t) \overline{y(t)} d t$并令  $M_{1}=\{x \in U  \text {：当 } t \leqslant 0 \text { 时 } x(t)=0\} ,M_{2}=\{x \in U \text { : 当 } t \geqslant 0 \text { 时 } x(t)=0\} \text {, }$则  $M_{1}$  和  $M_{2}$  皆为内积空间  U  的闭子空间, 而且  $M_{1} \cap M_{2}=\{0\} ,  M_{1} \perp M_{2}$ 兹证  $M_{1} \oplus M_{2}=\left\{x+y: x \in M_{1}, y \in M_{2}\right\}$  不闭。 为此, 设  $x(t)   \equiv 1$ , 又设$x_{n}(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}0, & t \leqslant 0, \\n t, & 0 \leqslant t \leqslant \frac{1}{n}, \\1, & \frac{1}{n} \leqslant t \leqslant 1,\end{array}\right.y_{n}(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1, & -1 \leqslant t \leqslant-\frac{1}{n}, \\-n t, & -\frac{1}{n} \leqslant t \leqslant 0, \\0, & t \geqslant 0,\end{array}\right.$则  $x_{n}+y_{n} \in M_{1} \oplus M_{2}$ , 且$\begin{aligned}\int_{-1}^{1} \mid x(t)- & x_{n}(t)-\left.y_{n}(t)\right|^{2} d t \\& =\int_{-\frac{1}{n}}^{0}|1+n t|^{2} d t+\int_{0}^{\frac{1}{n}}|i-n t|^{2} d t \\& =\frac{2}{3} \cdot \frac{1}{n} \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty) .\end{aligned}$因此  $x \in \overline{M_{1} \oplus M_{2}}$ 。 但  $x \in U$ , 而  $x \in M_{1} \oplus M_{2}$ , 故  $M_{1} \oplus M_{2}$  不闭。

statement: There exists a sequence of functionals that converges $weak^{*}$ but not weakly.
chinese_statement: 弱^{*}收敛而不弱收敛的泛函列。
rationale: As is well known, if a sequence of functionals $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ on a normed linear space converges weakly to f, it also converges $weak^{*}$ to $f$. Notice, however, that the converse of this proposition does not hold. For example, take $X=c_{0}$, then $X^{*}=l$. Next, consider the sequence of functionals $f_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots) \in l, n=1,2, \cdots ,$ then, from the general expression of linear functionals on the space $c_{0}$, we know that for any $\boldsymbol{x}=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c_{0}$, we have $f_{n}(x)=\xi_{n} \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$ , meaning $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ converges $weak^{*}$ to 0. On the other hand, $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ clearly does not converge strongly to 0, nor does it converge weakly to 0.
chinese_rationale: 如所周知， 若赋范线性空间上的泛函列  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  弱收敛于  f ， 则其亦必弱^{*}收敛于  f 。 应当注意， 这个命题之逆并不成立。 例如， 取  $X=c_{0}$ ， 则  $X^{*}=l$ 。 再取泛函列$f_{n}=(0， \cdots， 0，1，0， \cdots) \in l， n=1，2， \cdots \text {， }$那么， 从空间  $c_{0}$  上有算线性泛函的一般表达式知，对任一  $\boldsymbol{x}=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c_{0}$ ， 都有  $f_{n}(x)=\xi_{n} \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$ ， 即  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  弱^{*}收敛于 0 。另一方面，  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  显然不强收敛于 0 ， 且也不弱收敛于 0 。

statement: There exists a subset in some normed linear space, its linear closure is not equal to the linear subspace spanned by its closure.
chinese_statement: 存在某个赋范线性空间中的子集， 它的线性闭包不等于它的闭包张成的线性子空间。
rationale: It is easy to prove that the linear closure of a subset in a normed linear space (i.e., the smallest closed linear subspace containing the set) is equal to the closure of the linear subspace spanned by it. However, the linear closure of a set is not necessarily equal to the linear subspace spanned by its closure. For example, the sequence $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ forms a closed set in the Banach space c, and the linear subspace spanned by it is $E^{\infty}$, but $E^{\infty}$ is not closed in c. On the other hand, the linear closure of $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is a closed set in c, hence it is not equal to $E^{\infty}$.
chinese_rationale: 容易证明，赋范线性空间中的子集的线性闭包（即包 含 该集的最小闭线性子空间）等于它所张成的线性子空间的闭包，然而，一个集的线性闭包未必等于它的闭包张成的线性子空间。 例如， 点列  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是 Banach 空间  c  中的闭集，它所张成的线性子空间是  $E^{\infty}$ ， 而  $E^{\infty}$  在  c  中不闭。 另一方面，  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  的线性闭包是  c  中的闭集，故它不等于  $E^{\infty}$ 。

statement: There exists a normed linear space without an unconditional basis, but can be embedded into a Banach space with an unconditional basis.
chinese_statement: 一个没有条无件基的赋范线性空间, 而能嵌入到具有无条 件基的 Banach 空间。
rationale: Lindenstrauss first constructed a normed linear space without an unconditional basis that can be embedded into a Banach space with an unconditional basis. He pointed out that if $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is the natural basis of a Banach space $l$, and let $x_{n}=e_{n}-\frac{\left(e_{2 n}+e_{2 n+1}\right)}{2}, n=1,2, \cdots$ , then the closed subspace $D$ of $l$ spanned by $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ has a basis $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$, but it does not have an unconditional basis. However, $D$ is a subspace of the Banach space $l$ which has an unconditional basis.
chinese_rationale: Lindenstrauss首先作出了一个没有无条件基的赋范线 性空间，而能嵌入到具有无条件基的 Banach 空间。 他指出，若  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ 是 Banach 空间  $l$  的自然基, 令 $x_{n}=e_{n}-\frac{\left(e_{2 n}+e_{2 n+1}\right)}{2}, n=1,2, \cdots$ , 则由  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  张成的  l  的闭子空间  D  有基  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ , 但它没有无条件基。 然而,  D  又是具有无条件基的 Banach 空间  l  的子空间。

statement: There exists a Banach space X with a family of contraction mappings $T_{n}(n=0,1,2, \cdots)$ on X, each having a fixed point $x_{n}(n=0,1,2, \cdots)$, such that for any $x \in X$, $\left\{T_{n} x\right\}$ converges to $T_{0} x$, but $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ does not converge to $x_{0}$.
chinese_statement: 存在某个 Banach 空间  X  上的分别具有不动 点  $x_{n}(n=0,1 ,  2, \cdots)$  的压缩映射  $T_{n}(n=0,1,2, \cdots)$ , 使 对任 意  $x \in X ,  \left\{T_{n} x\right\}$  收敛于  $T_{0} x$ , 但  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  并不收敛于  $x_{0}$ 。
rationale: To construct the required counterexample, first, prove the following lemma. Let (X, d) be a metric space, and $T_{n}(n=0,1,2, \cdots)$ be contraction mappings on X with fixed points $x_{n}(n=0,1,2, \cdots)$. If for any $x \in X$, $\left\{T_{n} x\right\}$ converges to $T_{0} x$, and some subsequence $\left\{x_{n_{k}}\right\}$ of $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ converges to $y_{0} \in X$, then $y_{0} = x_{0}$. Proof: For any $\varepsilon > 0$, there exists a positive integer $n_{0}$ such that when $k \geqslant n_{0}$, $d\left(x_{n_{k}}, y_{0}\right) < \frac{\varepsilon}{2}$ and $d\left(T_{n_{k}} y_{0}, T_{0} y_{0}\right) < \frac{\varepsilon}{2}$. Therefore, $\begin{aligned}d\left(x_{n_{k}}, T_{0} y_{0}\right) & = d\left(T_{n_{k}} x_{n_{k}}, T_{0} y_{0}\right) \\ & \leqslant d\left(T_{n_{k}} x_{n_{k}}, T_{n_{k}} y_{0}\right) + d\left(T_{n_{k}} y_{0}, T_{0} y_{0}\right) \\ & < d\left(x_{n_{k}}, y_{0}\right) + d\left(T_{n_{k}} y_{0}, T_{0} y_{0}\right) < \varepsilon. \end{aligned}$ Therefore, $\left\{x_{n_{k}}\right\}$ converges to $T_{0} y_{0}$, implying $T_{0} y_{0} = y_{0}$. Since the fixed point of $T_{0}$ is unique, $y_{0} = x_{0}$. Now, let X be an infinite-dimensional separable or reflexive Banach space. Let $F = \left\{f \in X^{*} : \|f\| \leqslant 1 \right\}$, then F is $weak ^{*}$ sequentially compact. Since X is infinite-dimensional, there exists a sequence of functionals $\left\{g_{n}\right\}$ in F such that $\left\{g_{n}\right\}$ has no norm-convergent subsequence. Since F is $weak^{*}$ sequentially compact, there exists a subsequence $\left\{g_{n_{k}}\right\}$ of $\left\{g_{n}\right\}$, which $weak^{*}$ converges to $g \in X^{*}$. Define $f_{k} = \frac{\left(g_{n_{k}} - g\right)}{\left\|g_{n_{k}} - g\right\|}$, then $\left\{f_{k}\right\}$ $weak^{*}$ converges to the zero functional, and $\left\|f_{k}\right\| = 1 (k = 1, 2, \cdots)$. For each k, let $x_{k} \in X$ such that $\left\|x_{k}\right\| = 1$, and $\left|f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)\right| > 1 - \frac{1}{k^{2}}$. For each $x \in X$, define the mapping $T_{k} x = \left(1 - \frac{1}{k}\right) f_{k}(x) \frac{x_{k}}{f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)} + \frac{x_{k}}{k}, \quad k = 1,2, \cdots$. For any $x,y \in X$, $\begin{aligned} \left\|T_{k} x - T_{k} y\right\| = & \left\| \left(1 - \frac{1}{k}\right) \frac{f_{k}(x) x_{k}}{f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)} - \left(1 - \frac{1}{k}\right) \frac{f_{k}(y) x_{k}}{f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)} \right\| \\ = & \left(1 - \frac{1}{k}\right) \left|f_{k}(x) - f_{k}(y)\right| \frac{\left\|x_{k}\right\|}{\left|f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)\right|} \\ \leqslant & \left(1 - \frac{1}{k}\right) \frac{\|x - y\|}{\left|f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)\right|} \\ \leqslant & \frac{k \| x - y \|}{1 + k} \end{aligned}$. Hence, $T_{k}$ is a contraction mapping on X. Since $\left\{f_{k}\right\}$ $weak^{*}$ converges to the zero functional, $\left\{T_{k} x\right\}$ converges to the zero mapping. It is evident that for each k, $x_{k}$ is the unique fixed point of $T_{k}$. Since $\left\|x_{k}\right\| = 1$, by the lemma, the sequence $\left\{x_{k}\right\}$ has no convergent subsequence.
chinese_rationale: 为构造所需反例, 先证明下述引理 设  (X, d)  是度量空间,  $T_{n}(n=0,1,2, \cdots)$  是由  X  到  X 内的具有不动点  $x_{n}(n=0,1,2, \cdots)$  的压缩映射。 若对任 意  $x \in   X,\left\{T_{n} x\right\}$  收敛于  $T_{0} x$ , 且  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  的某个子列  $\left\{x_{n_{k}}\right\}$  收敛于  $y_{0} \in X$ , 则  $y_{0}=x_{0}$ 证 对任意  $\varepsilon>0$ , 存在正整数  $n_{0}$ , 当  $k \geqslant n_{0}$  时  $d\left(x_{n_{k}}, y_{0}\right)<   \frac{\varepsilon}{2}, d\left(T_{n_{k}} y_{0}, T_{0} y_{0}\right)<\frac{\varepsilon}{2}$ , 故$\begin{aligned}d\left(x_{n_{k}}, T_{0} y_{0}\right) & =d\left(T_{n_{k}} x_{n_{k}}, T_{0} y_{0}\right) \\& \leqslant d\left(T_{n_{k}} x_{n_{k}}, T_{n_{k}} y_{0}\right)+d\left(T_{n_{k}} y_{0}, T_{0} y_{0}\right) \\& <d\left(x_{n_{k}}, y_{0}\right)+d\left(T_{n_{k}} y_{0}, T_{0} y_{0}\right)<\varepsilon .\end{aligned}$因此,  $\left\{x_{n_{k}}\right\}$  收敛于  $T_{0} y_{0}$ , 从而  $T_{0} y_{0}=y_{0}$ 。 由  $T_{0}$  的不动点的唯一性知  $y_{0}=x_{0}$ 。现设  X  为无穷维可分或 自反 Banach 空间, 令  $F=\left\{f \in X^{*}\right.  : \|f\| \leqslant 1\}$ , 则  F  是$弱  ^{*}$  序列紧的。 因  X  是无穷维的,故  F  中存在泛函列  $\left\{g_{n}\right\}$ , 使  $\left\{g_{n}\right\}$  中不存在按范数收敛的子列。 因  F  是$弱^{*}$序列紧的,故  $\left\{g_{n}\right\}$  中有子列  $\left\{g_{n_{k}}\right\}$ , 它$弱^{*}$收敛于  $g \in X^{*}$  。令$f_{k}=\frac{\left(g_{n_{k}}-g\right)}{\left\|g_{n_{k}}-g\right\|}$,则  $\left\{f_{k}\right\}$  $弱^{*}$收敛于零泛函，且  $\left\|f_{k}\right\|=1(k=1,2, \cdots)$ 。对每一  k , 令  $x_{k} \in X$  使  $\left\|x_{k}\right\|=1$ , 且  $\left|f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)\right|>1-\frac{1}{k^{2}}$ 。 再对每  $\rightarrow x \in X$ , 定义映射$T_{k} x=\left(1-\frac{1}{k}\right) f_{k}(x) \frac{x_{k}}{f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)}+\frac{x_{k}}{k}, \quad k=1,2, \cdots$ 。由于对任意  x, $y \in X$ , 均有$\begin{aligned}\left\|T_{k} x-T_{k} y\right\|= & \|\left(1-\frac{1}{k}\right) \frac{f_{k}(x) x_{k}}{f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)} \\& -\left(1-\frac{1}{k}\right) \frac{f_{k}(y) x_{k}}{f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)} \| \\= & \left(1-\frac{1}{k}\right)\left|f_{k}(x)-f_{k}(y)\right| \frac{\left\|x_{k}\right\|}{\left|f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)\right|} \\\leqslant & \left(1-\frac{1}{k}\right) \frac{\|x-y\|}{\left|f_{k}\left(x_{k}\right)\right|} \\\leqslant & \frac{k\|x-y\|}{(1+k)}\end{aligned}$故  $T_{k}$  是由  X  到  X  内的压缩映射．又由于  $\left\{f_{k}\right\}$  $弱^{*}$收敛于零泛函，故  $\left\{T_{k} x\right\}$  收敛于零映射。 易见, 对每一  k, $x_{k}$  是  $T_{k}$  的唯一不动点。由于  $\mid x_{k} \|=1$ , 故由引理知不动点列  $\left\{x_{k}\right\}$  没有收敛子列。

statement: There exists a sequence of points in a conjugate space $X^{*}$, which is both a basis of $X^{*}$ and a $weak^{*}$ basis of $X^{*}$, but it does not $weak^{*}$ converge to 0.
chinese_statement: 一个共轭空间  $X^{*}$  中的点列， 它既是  $X^{*}$  的基， 又是  $X^{*}$  的弱$^{*}$基， 但它并不弱$^{*}$收敛于 0 。
rationale: It is easy to prove that if $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ is a basis of an infinite-dimensional Banach space X, and $\operatorname{lnf}_{1 \leq n<+\infty}\left\|x_{n}\right\| > 0$, and $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is the bi-orthogonal functional sequence of $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$, then $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ $weak^{*}$ converges to 0. Due to the above proposition, we naturally pose the following question: If $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is a basis or $weak^{*}$ basis of the conjugate Banach space $X^{*}$, does $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ necessarily $weak^{*}$ converge to 0? The following example demonstrates that the answer to this question is negative. Take $X = c_{0}, X^{*} = l$. Let $f_{1} = e_{1}, f_{n} = (-1)^{n+1} e_{1} + e_{n}, n = 2, 3, \cdots$, then $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is both a basis of $X^{*}$ and a $weak^{*}$ basis of $X^{*}$. However, for $x = (1, 0, 0, \cdots) \in X$, we have $f_{1}(x) = 1, f_{n}(x) = (-1)^{n+1}, n = 2, 3, \cdots$. Therefore, $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ does not $weak^{*}$ converge to zero. Note that if $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is a basis of $X^{*}$ and $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ $weak^{*}$ converges to 0, it does not guarantee that $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is a $weak^{*}$ basis of X $^{*}$ (refer to [290], p. 299).
chinese_rationale: 易证， 若  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  是无穷维 Banach 空间  X  的 基， 且  $\operatorname{lnf}_{1 \leq n<+\infty}\left\|x_{n}\right\|>  0$ ， 又  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  的双直交泛函列， 则  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  弱$^{*}$收敛于 0 。由于上述命题， 我们自然会提出下述问题：若  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是共轭 Banach 空间  $X^{*}$  的基或是弱$^{*}$基， 那么  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是否一定弱$^{*}$收敛于 0 ? 下面的例子将说明这个问题的答案是否定的。取  $X=c_{0}， X^{*}=l$ . 令$f_{1}=e_{1}， f_{n}=(-1)^{n+1} e_{1}+e_{n}， n=2，3， \cdots$，则  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  既是  $X^{*}$  的基， 又是  $X^{*}$  的弱$^{*}$基。 然而， 对于  $x=(1，0 ，  0， \cdots) \in X$  而言， 我们有$f_{1}(x)=1， f_{n}(x)=(-1)^{n+1}， n=2，3， \cdots$ 。因此，  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  并不弱$^{*}$收敛于零。注 若  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}$  的基且  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  弱$^{*}$收敛于 0 ， 也不能保证  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ 是  X $^{*}$  的弱$^{*}$基（参看  [290] ，p. 299）。

statement: There exists an incomplete metric space, which is homeomorphic to its completion space.
chinese_statement: 一个不完备的度量空间， 它同胚于它的完备化空间。
rationale: Let $X$ be a planar set: $X=\left\{(x, y): x=0,1,2, \cdots ; y=0,1, \frac{1}{2}, \cdots\right\}$, with the usual distance taken on X. Let $X_{0}=X \backslash\{(0,0)\}$, then X is the completion space of $X_{0}$. Let $\begin{array}{c}f\left(m, \frac{1}{n}\right)=\left(m-1, \frac{1}{n+1}\right), m>0, \\f(m, 0)=(m-1,0), f\left(0, \frac{1}{n}\right)=(n-1,1),\end{array}$ then f is clearly a homeomorphic map from $X_{0}$ to X.
chinese_rationale: 设 $X$ 是平面集:  $X=\left\{(x， y): x=0，1，2， \cdots ; y=0，1， \frac{1}{2}， \cdots\right\}$ ，在  X  上取通常距离。 令  $X_{0}=X \backslash\{(0，0)\}$ ， 则  X  是  $X_{0}$  的完备化空间。 设$\begin{array}{c}f\left(m， \frac{1}{n}\right)=\left(m-1， \frac{1}{n+1}\right)， m>0， \\f(m， 0)=(m-1，0)， f\left(0， \frac{1}{n}\right)=(n-1，1)，\end{array}$则  f  显然是  $X_{0}$  到  X  上的同胚映射。

statement: There exists a Banach space can always be endowed with an equivalent smooth norm.
chinese_statement: Banach 空间一定能赋予等价的光滑范数。
rationale: The Banach space $l^{\infty}$ cannot be endowed with an equivalent G-differentiable norm, and the G-differentiability and smoothness of a Banach space's norm are equivalent, so $l^{\infty}$ cannot be endowed with an equivalent smooth norm.
chinese_rationale: Banach 空间  $l^{\infty}$  上不能赋予等价的  G  可微范数， 而 Banach空间的范数的  G  可微性与光滑性 是等价的， 故在  $l^{\infty}$  上不能赋予等价的光滑范数。

statement: There exists a bounded linear operator with an unbounded inverse operator.
chinese_statement: 一个有界线性算子， 其逆算子无界。
rationale: Let $X=Y=C[0,1], T x(t)=\int_{0}^{t} x(s) d s(0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1)$, then T is a bounded linear operator from X to Y. But the inverse operator $T^{-1} y=\frac{d}{d t} y(t)$ is an unbounded linear operator defined on $C^{1}[0,1] \subset Y$.
chinese_rationale: 设  $X=Y=C[0，1]， T x(t)=\int_{0}^{t} x(s) d s(0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1)$ ， 则  T  是由  X  到  Y  内的有界线性算子. 但逆算子  $T^{-1} y=\frac{d}{d t} y(t)$  是定义在 $C^{1}[0，1] \subset Y$  上的无界线性算子。

statement: There exists a non-compact operator whose square is a compact operator.
chinese_statement: 存在某个非紧算子，其平方是紧算子。
rationale: Example: Let T be an operator defined as follows: $T_{x}=\left(0, \xi_{1}, 0, \xi_{3}, 0, \xi_{5}, 0, \cdots\right)$, where $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$. Hence, T is a bounded linear operator defined on $l^{2}$ and its range is contained in $l^{2}$. Now we prove that T is not a compact operator. In fact, take $x_{1}=(1,0,0, \cdots), x_{3}=(0,0,1,0, \cdots), \cdots$, $x_{2 n-1}=(0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots)$, where 1 is at the $(2 n-1)$-th position. Then, $\left\{x_{2 n-1}\right\}$ is a bounded set in $l^{2}$. But since $T x_{2 n-1}=(0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots)$, we have $\left\|T x_{2 n-1}-T x_{2 m-1}\right\|=\sqrt{2}(n \neq m)$, hence $\left\{T x_{2 n-1}\right\}$ is not relatively compact, i.e., T is not a compact operator. On the other hand, according to the definition of operator T, we get $T^{2} x=T(T x)=T\left(0, \xi_{1}, 0, \xi_{3}, 0, \cdots\right)=0$, so $T^{2}$ is a compact operator.
chinese_rationale: 例： 设  T  是如下定义的算子:$T_{x}=\left(0, \xi_{1}, 0, \xi_{3}, 0, \xi_{5}, 0, \cdots\right)$,其中  $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$ 。 于是,  T  是定义在  $l^{2}$  上而值域含于  $l^{2}$ 中的有界线性算子。兹证  T  不是紧算子。事实上，取$x_{1}=(1,0,0, \cdots), x_{3}=(0,0,1,0, \cdots), \cdots$,$x_{2 n-1}=(0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots), \cdots$,其中 1 在第  $2 n-1$  的位置上, 则  $\left\{x_{2 n-1}\right\}$  是  $l^{2}$  中的一个有界集。 但因$T x_{2 n-1}=(0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots)$,故  $\left\|T x_{2 n-1}-T x_{2 m-1}\right\|=\sqrt{2}(n \neq m)$ , 因此  $\left\{T x_{2 n-1}\right\}$  不列紧, 即  T  不是紧算子。 另一方面，据算子  T  的定义，我们得到$T^{2} x=T(T x)=T\left(0, \xi_{1}, 0, \xi_{3}, 0, \cdots\right)=0$,故$T^{2}$是紧算子。

statement: There exists a sequence of projection operators $ \left\{\boldsymbol{P}_{n}\right\} $ on some Hilbert space $ H $ such that $ \left\{\boldsymbol{P}_{n}\right\} $ strongly converges to $ P $, and $ \operatorname{dim} P_{n}(H) < +\infty, \operatorname{dim} P(H) = +\infty $.
chinese_statement: 存在某个Hilbert空间  H  上的射影算子列  $\left\{\boldsymbol{P}_{n}\right\}$ , 使  $\left\{\boldsymbol{P}_{n}\right\}$  强收敛于  P , 且  $\operatorname{dim} P_{n}(H)<+\infty, \operatorname{dim} P(H)=+\infty$ 。
rationale: Let $ H $ be the Hilbert space $ l^{2} $ and $ H_{n} $ be the subspace of $ H $ consisting of elements $ x = \left\{\xi_{n}\right\} $, where $ \xi_{j} = 0 $ for $ j > n $. Let $ P_{n} $ be the projection operator from $ H $ to $ H_{n} $. Then, $ \operatorname{dim} P_{n}(H) = \operatorname{dim} H_{n} = n $. Let $ P $ be the identity operator on $ H $. For each $ x = \left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in H $, we have $ \left\|P_{n} x - P x\right\| = \left(\sum_{i = n+1}^{\infty} \left|\xi_{j}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}} \rightarrow 0 \quad (n \rightarrow \infty) $. Therefore, $ \left\{P_{n}\right\} $ strongly converges to $ P $, and $ \operatorname{dim} P(H) = \operatorname{dim} H = +\infty $.
chinese_rationale: 设  H  是Hilbert空间  $l^{2}, H_{n}$  是由元素  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}$  的全体所组成的  H 的子空间, 其中当  $j>n$  时,  $\xi_{j}=0$ 。 设  $P_{n}$  是由  H  到  $H_{n}$  上的射影算子, 则$\operatorname{dim} P_{n}(H)=\operatorname{dim} H_{n}=n$ 。令  P  是  H  到  H  上的恒等算子, 则对每一  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in H$ , 有$\left\|P_{n} x-P x\right\|=\left(\sum_{i=n+1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{j}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}} \rightarrow 0 \quad(n \rightarrow \infty)$,故  $\left\{P_{n}\right\}$  强收敛于  P ,且  $\operatorname{dim} P(H)=\operatorname{dim} H=+\infty$ 。

statement: There exists an operator with spectral radius 1 on a separable Banach space, which has uncountably many eigenvalues with modulus 1.
chinese_statement: 存在某个可分 Banach 空间上的谱半径为 1 的算子， 它有不可数多个模数为 1 的特征值。
rationale: Let $X=L^{2}[0,1]$, for $x \in X$, define $\begin{array}{l}(S x)(t)=4 e^{2 \pi i t} x(t), \\(T x)(i)=\int_{0}^{t} e^{2 \pi i s} x(s) d s.\end{array}$ For each $a \in[0,1)$, let $\chi_{(0,a)}(t)$ represent the characteristic function of the interval $[0, \alpha)$. It is easy to verify that $\chi_{(0,\alpha)}(t)$ is an eigenvector of $S-T$ corresponding to the eigenvalue $e^{2 \pi i a}$. Therefore, the operator $S-T$ on the separable Banach space $X$ has uncountably many eigenvalues $e^{2 \pi i \alpha}$, all of which have modulus 1. It remains to prove that the spectral radius of the operator $S-T$ is 1. Indeed, a straightforward calculation yields $T^{2}=S T -T S$. Moreover, by applying the principle of induction, we obtain $(S-T)^{n}=S^{n}-n T S^{n-1}, n \geqslant 1\text{.}$ Thus, $\left\|(S-T)^{n}\right\| \leqslant 1+2 \pi n$, It follows that the spectral radius of $S-T$ is $\begin{aligned}r(S-T) & =\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left\|(S-T)^{n}\right\|^{\frac{1}{n}}=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}(1+2 \pi n)^{\frac{1}{n}} \\& =1.\end{aligned}$.
chinese_rationale: 设  $X=L^{2}[0，1]$ ， 对  $x \in X$ ， 令$\begin{array}{l}(S x)(t)=4 e^{2 \pi i t} x(t)， \\(T x)(i)=\int_{0}^{t} e^{2 \pi i s} x(s) d s .\end{array}$对每一  $a \in[0，1)$ ， 用  $\chi_{(0， a)}(t)$  代表区间 $ [0， \alpha)$  的特征函数。 容易验证，  $\chi_{(0， \alpha)}(t) $ 是  S-T  对应于特征值  $e^{2 \pi i a}$  的特征向量。 因之， 可分Banach空间  X  上的算子  S-T  有不可数多个特征值  $e^{2 \pi i \alpha} $， 它们的模数均为 1 。兹证算子  S-T  的谱半径为 1 。 事实上， 直接计算可得 $ T^{2}=S T   -T S$。 又， 应用归纳法可得$(S-T)^{n}=S^{n}-n T S^{n-1}， n \geqslant 1 \text {. }$于是  $\left\|(S-T)^{n}\right\| \leqslant 1+2 \pi n$ ， 可见  S-T  的谱半径为$\begin{aligned}r(S-T) & =\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left\|(S-T)^{n}\right\|^{\frac{1}{n}}=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}(1+2 \pi n)^{\frac{1}{n}} \\& =1 .\end{aligned}$ 。

statement: A subset in some conjugate space that is $weak^{*}$ compact but not $weak^{*}$ sequentially compact.
chinese_statement: 某个共轭空间中弱$^{*}$紧而不弱$^{*}$序列紧的子集。
rationale: Take $X=l^{\infty}$, according to the Banach-Alaoglu theorem, the closed unit ball $U^{*}=U\left(X^{*}\right)=\left\{f \in X^{*}: \|f\| \leqslant 1\right\}$ in $X^{*}$ is $weak^{*}$ compact. Here we prove that $U^{*}$ is not $weak^{*}$ sequentially compact. In fact, let $f_{n}(x)=\xi_{n}, \quad x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{\infty}$, then $f_{n}$ is a linear functional on $l^{\infty}$ and $\left\|f_{n}\right\|=1$, so $f_{n} \in U^{*}$. However, $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ does not have a $weak^{*}$ convergent subsequence, because for any subsequence $\left\{f_{n_{i}}\right\}$ of $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$, take $x \in l^{\infty}$ as follows: $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \xi_{n}, \cdots\right)$, where $\xi_{n_{1}}=1, \xi_{n_{2}}=2, \xi_{n_{3}}=1, \xi_{n_{4}}=2, \cdots$, the rest $\xi_{n}=0$, obviously, $\left\{f_{n_{i}}(x)\right\}$ does not converge, that is, $\left\{f_{n_{i}}\right\}$ is not a $weak^{*}$ convergent subsequence.
chinese_rationale: 取  $X=l^{\infty}$ , 据 Banach-Alaoglu 定理,  $X^{*}$  中的单位闭球$U^{*}=U\left(X^{*}\right)=\left\{f \in X^{*}:\|f\| \leqslant 1\right\}$是弱^{*} 紧的。兹证  $U^{*}$  不是弱^{*} 序列紧的。事实上，令$f_{n}(x)=\xi_{n}, \quad x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{\infty}$,则  $f_{n}$  为  $l^{\infty}$  上的线性泛函且  $\left\|f_{n}\right\|=1$ , 故  $f_{n} \in U^{*}$ 。 但是  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  没有弱^{*} 收敛子列，因为对  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  的任一子列  $\left\{f_{n_{i}}\right\}$  ，取  $x \in l^{\infty}$  如下：$x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \xi_{n}, \cdots\right)$,其中  $\xi_{n_{1}}=1, \xi_{n_{2}}=2, \xi_{n_{3}}=1, \xi_{n_{4}}=2, \cdots$ , 其余的  $\xi_{n}=0$ , 显然,  $\left\{f_{n_{i}}(x)\right\}$  并不收敛，即  $\left\{f_{n_{i}}\right\}$  不是弱$^{*}$ 收敛的子列。

statement: There exists a sequence of normal operators $\left\{T_{n}\right\}$ that strongly converges to T, such that $\sigma(T) \neq \lim \sigma\left(T_{n}\right)$.
chinese_statement: 存在某个强收敛于  T  的 正规算子列  $\left\{T_{n}\right\}$ , 使  $\sigma(T) \neq   \lim \sigma\left(T_{n}\right)$ 。
rationale: For example: For $x=\left(\xi_{1}\right., \left.\xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$, let $T_{n} x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \xi_{n}, 0,0, \cdots\right)$, then $\left\{T_{n}\right\}$ strongly converges to the identity operator I. However, $\sigma\left(T_{n}\right)=\{0,1\}, \sigma(I)=\{1\}$, hence $\sigma(I) \neq \lim \sigma\left(T_{n}\right)$.
chinese_rationale: 例如：对  $x=\left(\xi_{1}\right. ,  \left.\xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$ , 令$T_{n} x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \xi_{n}, 0,0, \cdots\right)$,则  $\left\{T_{n}\right\}$  强收敛于恒等算子  I 。 但  $\sigma\left(T_{n}\right)=\{0,1\}, \sigma(I)=\{1\}$ , 故  $\sigma(I) \neq \lim \sigma\left(T_{n}\right)$ 。

statement: The principle of Hchy's choice also holds for the family of functions with strongly bounded variation taking values in c.
chinese_statement: Hchy 选择原理对于取值于  c  中的 强有界变差函数族也成立。
rationale: Construct the function $f(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}0, & t=0 \text { or } \frac{1}{2} \leqslant t \leqslant 1, \\1, & t=\frac{1}{4}, \\\text { linear, } & 0 \leqslant t \leqslant \frac{1}{4} \text { or } \frac{1}{4} \leqslant t \leqslant \frac{1}{2} .\end{array}\right.$ Take $\begin{array}{l}x^{(1)}(t)=(f(t), 0,0, \cdots), \\x^{(2)}(t)=(0, f(t), 0, \cdots), \\x^{(3)}(t)=(0,0, f(t), 0, \cdots), \\\cdots\end{array}$ Then each $x^{(n)}(t)=\left(\xi_{1}^{(n)}(t), \xi_{2}^{(n)}(t), \cdots\right) \in c$, and $\lim _{k \rightarrow \infty} \xi_{k}^{(n)}(t)=\xi^{(n)}(t) \equiv 0$. It is not difficult to see that $\left\|x^{(n)}(t)\right\| \leqslant 1, \bigvee_{0}^{1}\left(x^{(n)}\right)=2, n=1,2, \cdots . \quad$ But from $\left\{x^{(n)}(t)\right\}$, no subsequence can be found such that it converges pointwise on [0,1] (if the limit exists, it would of course be $x(t)=0$). The reason is as follows: for any $t \in [0,1]$, each coordinate of $x^{(n)}(t)=\left(\xi_{1}^{(n)}(t), \xi_{2}^{(n)}(t), \cdots\right)$ converges to 0 $(n \rightarrow \infty ; k=1,2, \cdots)$, but this convergence is not uniform with respect to k. In fact, taking $t=\frac{1}{4}$, then $x^{(n)}(t)=(0, \cdots, 0, 1, 0, \cdots)$, whereas $x(l)=(0, \cdots, 0, \cdots)$. Therefore, no matter how large n is, there always exists $k(=n)$ such that $\left|\xi_{k}^{(n)}\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)-\xi_{k}\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)\right|=1>\frac{1}{2}=\varepsilon_{0}$. This proves that the convergence with respect to the coordinate number k is not uniform. The same argument applies to any subsequence of $\left\{x^{(n)}(t)\right\}$. Therefore, at $t=\frac{1}{4}$, no subsequence $\left\{x^{\left(n_{i}\right)}(t)\right\}$ can converge (because the convergence in space c is equivalent to the uniform convergence of coordinates).
chinese_rationale: 作函数$f(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}0, & t=0 \text { 或 } \frac{1}{2} \leqslant t \leqslant 1, \\1, & t=\frac{1}{4}, \\\text { 线性, } & 0 \leqslant t \leqslant \frac{1}{4} \text { 或 } \frac{1}{4} \leqslant t \leqslant \frac{1}{2} .\end{array}\right.$取$\begin{array}{l}x^{(1)}(t)=(f(t), 0,0, \cdots), \\x^{(2)}(t)=(0, f(t), 0, \cdots), \\x^{(3)}(t)=(0,0, f(t), 0, \cdots), \\\cdots\end{array}$则每个  $x^{(n)}(t)=\left(\xi_{1}^{(n)}(t), \xi_{2}^{(n)}(t), \cdots\right) \in c$ , 且$\lim _{k \rightarrow \infty} \xi_{k}^{(n)}(t)=\xi^{(n)}(t) \equiv 0$不难看出:  $\left\|x^{(n)}(t)\right\| \leqslant 1, \bigvee_{0}^{1}\left(x^{(n)}\right)=2, n=1,2, \cdots . \quad$  但从  $\left\{x^{(n)}(t)\right\}$  中并不能找出任何子列, 使它在  [0,1]  上每点收敛（极限倘若存在, 则当然为  $x(t)=0$)  ，其理由如下：任取  $t \in[0,1]$ , 则  $x^{(n)}(t)=\left(\xi_{1}^{(n)}(t), \xi_{2}^{(n)}(t), \cdots\right)$  的每个坐标  $\xi_{k}^{(n)}(t) \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty ; k=   1,2, \cdots)$ , 但此种收敛性关于  k  并非一致的。 事实上，取  $t=\frac{1}{4}$ ,则$x^{(n)}(t)=(0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots)$,而  $x(l)=(0, \cdots, 0, \cdots)$ 。 因此, 不论取  n  多大, 恒有  $k(=n)$ , 使$\left|\xi_{k}^{(n)}\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)-\xi_{k}\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)\right|=1>\frac{1}{2}=\varepsilon_{0}$ 。这就证明了收敛性关于坐标的号码  k  并不是一致的。对于  $\left\{x^{(n)}(t)\right\}$  的任何子列而言，也有这种情形，其证法相同。所以在  $t=\frac{1}{4}$  这点, 任何子列  $\left\{x^{\left(n_{i}\right)}(t)\right\}$  都不能收敛（因为空间  c  中的收敛性等价于对坐标的一致收敛性)。

statement: There exists a subset in a certain conjugate space, whose weak $^{*}$ closure is not the same as its weak $^{*}$ sequential closure.
chinese_statement: 存在某个共轭空间中的子集, 它的弱$^{*}$闭包与弱$^{*}$序列闭包并不相同。
rationale: Let $X = l^{\boldsymbol{P}}(1 \leqslant p < +\infty), \left\{f_{n}\right\} \subset X$ be defined as $f_{n} = n^{\frac{1}{p}} e_{n}$ where $e_{n} = (0, \cdots, 0, 1, 0, \cdots)$. Here we prove that 0 is in the weak closure $\bar{A}^{w *}$ of $A = \left\{f_{n}\right\}$. In fact, let $\left\{x_{i}= \left(\xi_{1}^{(i)}, \xi_{2}^{(i)}, \cdots\right): 1 \leqslant i \leqslant k\right\}$ be a finite subset of X, and $\varepsilon > 0$. Since for each i, $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}{ }^{(i)}\right|^{p} < +\infty$, we have $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\xi_{n}^{(i)}\right|\right)^{p}<+\infty$. Therefore, there exists a positive integer n such that $\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\xi_{n}{ }^{(i)}\right| < \varepsilon n^{-\frac{1}{p}}$ (otherwise, if for any n, $\left(\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\xi_{n}^{(i)}\right|\right)^{p} \geqslant e^{p} n^{-1}$, then $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\xi_{n}^{(i)}\right|\right)^{p} = +\infty$, which is a contradiction). For such n, we have $\left|f_{n}\left(x_{i}\right)\right|=n^{\frac{1}{P}}\left|\xi_{n}^{(i)}\right| < \varepsilon, i = 1, 2, \cdots, k$. Therefore, the sequence $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ intersects every basic neighborhood of zero weak $^{*}$. Thus, $0 \in \bar{A}^{w*}$. On the other hand, 0 does not belong to the weak $^{*}$ sequential closure of A. In fact, if there exists a subsequence $\left\{f_{n_{i}}\right\}$ of $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ that converges to 0 weak $^{*}$, then by the Banach-Alaoglu theorem, $\left\{f_{n_{i}}\right\}$ should be uniformly bounded. However, from the definition of $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$, this is not possible.
chinese_rationale: 设$X=l^{\boldsymbol{P}}(1 \leqslant p<+\infty),\left\{f_{n}\right\} \subset X$  定义为$f_{n}=n^{\frac{1}{p}} e_{n}$其中  $e_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots)$ 。兹证 0 属于  $A=\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  的弱闭包$\bar{A}^{w *}$  。 事实上, 设$\left\{x_{i}=\left(\xi_{1}^{(i)}, \xi_{2}^{(i)}, \cdots\right): 1 \leqslant i \leqslant k\right\}$是  X  的有限子集,  $\varepsilon>0$ 。 由于对每一  i , 都有  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}{ }^{(i)}\right|^{p}<+\infty$ ,故$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\xi_{n}^{(i)}\right|\right)^{p}<+\infty$ 。因此, 存在正整数  n  而有  $\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\xi_{n}{ }^{(i)}\right|<\varepsilon n^{-\frac{1}{p}}$  (假如不然, 即对任意  n  均有$\left(\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\xi_{n}^{(i)}\right|\right)^{p} \geqslant e^{p} n^{-1}$则  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{k}\left|\xi_{n}^{(i)}\right|\right)^{p}=+\infty$ , 此为矛盾)。 对于这样的  n , 就有$\left|f_{n}\left(x_{i}\right)\right|=n^{\frac{1}{P}}\left|\xi_{n}^{(i)}\right|<\varepsilon, i=1,2, \cdots, k $。因此, 点列  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  与每个零点弱^{*} 基本邻域相交。 故  $0 \in \bar{A}^{w *}$ 。另一方面, 0 不属于  A  的弱^{*} 序列闭包, 事实上, 如果存在 $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  的子列  $\left\{f_{n_{i}}\right\}$ , 使  $\left\{f_{n_{i}}\right\}$  弱^{*} 收敛于 0 , 则据共鸣定理,  $\left\{f_{n_{i}}\right\}$  应当是一致有界的。 然而由  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  的定义可知, 这是不可能的。

statement: Subnormal operators on infinite-dimensional Hilbert spaces must be hyponormal.
chinese_statement: 无穷维 Hilbert 空间上的次正规算子必是拟正规的。
rationale: For example: Let T be the unilateral right shift operator on $l^{2}$, i.e., for $x=\left(\xi_{0}, \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$. Let $T\left(\xi_{0}, \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right)=\left(0, \xi_{0}, \xi_{1}, \cdots\right)$ and let K be the Hilbert space formed by all sequences $\left(\cdots, \xi_{-2}, \xi_{-1},\left(\xi_{0}\right), \xi_{1}\right. \xi_{2}, \cdots )$ such that $\sum_{i=-\infty}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{i}\right|^{2}+<\infty$, and W be the bilateral shift operator on K: $\begin{array}{l}W\left(\cdots, \xi_{-2}, \xi_{-1},\left(\xi_{0}\right), \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \\\quad=\left(\cdots, \xi_{-3}, \xi_{-2},\left(\xi_{-1}\right), \xi_{0}, \xi_{1}, \cdots\right)\end{array}$ Clearly, W is a bounded linear operator, and $\begin{array}{l}W^{*}\left(\cdots, \xi_{-2}, \xi_{-1},\left(\xi_{0}\right), \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \\\quad=\left(\cdots, \xi_{-1}, \xi_{0},\left(\xi_{1}\right), \xi_{2}, \xi_{3}, \cdots\right).\end{array}$ So, $W W^{*} x=\left(\cdots, \xi_{-2}, \xi_{-1},\left(\xi_{0}\right), \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right)=x$, i.e., $W W^{*}=I$. Therefore, W is a normal operator, and W is a normal extension of T, so T is a subnormal operator. However, T is not a hyponormal operator. In fact, if T were a hyponormal operator, i.e., T and $T^{*} T$ commute: $T T^{*} T=T^{*} T T$, then $T T^{*}=T^{*} T T$, so T would be a normal operator, which is obviously absurd. Note: Lubin constructed two commuting subnormal operators R and S such that $R+ S$ and RS are neither subnormal operators nor even hyponormal operators.
chinese_rationale: 例如：设  T  是  $l^{2}$  上的单侧右移算子, 即对  $x=\left(\xi_{0}, \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right)   \in l^{2}$ 。 令$T\left(\xi_{0}, \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right)=\left(0, \xi_{0}, \xi_{1}, \cdots\right)$又设  K  是一切使  $\sum_{i=-\infty}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{i}\right|^{2}+<\infty$  的数列  $\left(\cdots, \xi_{-2}, \xi_{-1},\left(\xi_{0}\right), \xi_{1}\right.  ，  \xi_{2}, \cdots  )$ 所成的Hilbert 空间,  W  是  K  上的双侧移位算子:$\begin{array}{l}W\left(\cdots, \xi_{-2}, \xi_{-1},\left(\xi_{0}\right), \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \\\quad=\left(\cdots, \xi_{-3}, \xi_{-2},\left(\xi_{-1}\right), \xi_{0}, \xi_{1}, \cdots\right)\end{array}$显然,  W  是有界线性算子, 且$\begin{array}{l}W^{*}\left(\cdots, \xi_{-2}, \xi_{-1},\left(\xi_{0}\right), \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \\\quad=\left(\cdots, \xi_{-1}, \xi_{0},\left(\xi_{1}\right), \xi_{2}, \xi_{3}, \cdots\right) .\end{array}$所以 $ W W^{*} x=\left(\cdots, \xi_{-2}, \xi_{-1},\left(\xi_{0}\right), \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right)=x $,即  $W W^{*}=I$ 。 因此,  W  是正规算子，且  W  是  T  的正规扩张，从而  T  是次正规算子。然而，  T  不是拟正规算子。事实上,假如  T  是拟正规算子, 即  T  与  $ T^{*} T $ 可换:$T T^{*} T=T^{*} T T$则  $T T^{*}=T^{*} T T$ , 从而  T  是正规算子, 这显然是荒谬的。注 ：Lubin  构造了两个可换的次正规算子  R  和  S , 使  $R+   S$  与  R S  均非次正规算子,甚至还均非亚正规算子。

statement: There exists a bounded closed convex set in some locally convex Fréchet space that has no support points.
chinese_statement: 存在某个局部凸的 Fréchet 空间中的有界闭凸集， 它没有支撑点。
rationale: Let X be a real locally convex topological vector space, and A be a non-empty convex set in X. If there exists an $f \in X^{*}$ such that $f(x)=\sup f(A)$, then $x \in A$ is called a support point of A. Bishop and Phelps proved that if X is a Banach space and A is a bounded closed convex set in X, then the support points of A are densely distributed on the boundary of A. The Bishop-Phelps theorem cannot be extended to locally convex Fréchet spaces. Peck provided an example of a locally convex Fréchet space X which contains a bounded closed convex set that has no support points. Interested readers may refer to the original text by the author. Note that although the Bishop-Phelps theorem cannot be extended to locally convex Fréchet spaces, the following conclusion holds for $(X^{*}, \sigma\left(X^{*}, X\right))$: Let X be a Banach space and C be a $weak^{*}$ closed bounded convex subset of $X^{*}$, then the $weak^{*}$ support points of C are densely distributed on the norm-boundary of C. A weak support point $x_{0}^{*}$ of C means that $x_{0}^{*} \in C$, and there exists $x \in X$ such that $x_{0}^{*}(x)=\sup _{x * \in C} x^{*}(x)$.
chinese_rationale: 设  X  是实局部凸拓扑线性空间，  A  是  X  的非空凸集，若存在  $f \in X^{*}$ ， 使  $f(x)=\sup f(A)$ ， 则  $x \in A$  称为  A  的支摚点。Bishop 和 Phelps 证明了， 若  X  是 Banach 空间，  A  是  X  的一个有界闭凸集，则  A  的支撑点在  A  的边界上是范稠的。Bishop-Phelps 定理不能推广到局部凸的 Fréchet 空间。 Peck  { }^{[238]}  给出了一个局部凸的 Fréchet 空间  X ， 在  X  中有一个有界闭凸集，它没有支撑点，读者如有兴趣，可参看作者原文。注 Bishop-Phelps 定理不可推广到局部凸的 Fréchet 空间，但对 $(  X^{*}， \sigma\left(X^{*}， X\right)  )$， 却有如下的结论: 设  X  是 Banach空间，  C 是  $X^{*}$  的弱^{*}闭有界凸子集， 则  C  的弱^{*} 支撑点是在  C  的范数边界上范稠的， 其中  C  的弱 支撑点  $x_{0}^{*}$  是指  $x_{0}^{*} \in C$ ， 且存在  $x \in X$ ， 使得$x_{0}^{*}(x)=\sup _{x * \in C} x^{*}(x)$ 。

statement: Banach space $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$ is linearly isomorphic to $l^{\infty}$.
chinese_statement: Banach 空间  $L^{\infty}[0，1]$  与  $l^{\infty}$  线性同胚。
rationale: When $1 \leqslant p<+\infty, p \neq 2$, $L^{p}[0, 1]$ is not linearly isomorphic to $l^{p}$. Pelczyński pointed out: when $p=+\infty$, $L^{p}[0, 1]$ is linearly isomorphic to $l^{\infty}$. (1) Let $X=L^{\infty}[0, 1], {Y}=l^{\infty}$, then X is linearly isomorphic to $X \times X$, and Y is linearly isomorphic to $Y \times Y$. In fact, for each $x \in L^{\infty}[0, 1]$, let $\begin{array}{l}x_{1}(t)=x\left(\frac{t}{2}\right), \\x_{2}(t)=x\left(\frac{1}{2}-\frac{t}{2}\right),\end{array} 0\leq t\leq 1$ clearly, $x_{1}, x_{2} \in L^{\infty}[0, 1]$. Define the mapping $T: X \rightarrow X \times X$ by $T x=\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right)$ then $\|T x\|=\left\|\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right)\right\| \leq 2\|x\|$. On the other hand, for each $\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right) \in X \times X$, let $x(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}x_{1}(2 t), & t \in\left[0, \frac{1}{2}\right], \\x_{2}(2 t-1), & t \in\left[\frac{1}{2}, 1\right],\end{array}\right.$ then $x \in X$. Therefore, T is a linear isomorphism from X onto $X \times X$. Secondly, let $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \xi_{n}, \cdots\right) \in Y$, let $x_{1}=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{3}, \cdots, \xi_{2 n-1}, \cdots\right), \\x_{2}=\left(\xi_{2}, \xi_{4}, \cdots, \xi_{2 n}, \cdots\right),$ then $T x=\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right)$ is a linear isomorphism from Y onto $Y \times Y$. (2) $l^{\infty}$ is isometrically isomorphic to a complemented subspace of $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$. Represent [0, 1] as a countable number of disjoint intervals $\Delta_{n}(n=1, 2, \cdots)$, let $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{\infty}$, define $y(t)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \xi_{n} \chi_{\Delta_{n}}(t)$, where $\chi_{\Delta_{n}}$ is the characteristic function of the interval $\Delta_{n}$, then $y \in L^{\infty}[0, 1]$, and $\left.\|x\|_{l^{{\infty}}}=\| y\right\}_{L^{{\infty}}[0, 1]}$. We now point out that the space $Z=\left\{\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \xi_{n} \chi_{\Delta_{n}}(t):\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{\infty}\right\}$ is complemented in $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$. In fact, for $y \in L^{{\infty}}[0, 1]$, let $\xi_{n} =sup_{t \in \Delta_{n}}|y(t)|$, $P y=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \xi_{n} \chi_{\Delta_{n}}$, then P is a bounded linear operator from $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$ onto Z, and $P^{2} y=P y(y \in Z)$, hence P is a bounded linear projection from $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$ onto Z, i.e., Z is complemented in $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$. (3) $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$ can be embedded into $l^{\infty}$ as a complemented subspace. Since $L[0, 1]$ is separable, there exists a countable dense subset $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ on the unit ball of $L[0, 1]$. For each $f \in(L[0, 1])^{*}=L^{\infty}[0, 1]$, let $T f=\left(f\left(x_{1}\right), f\left(x_{2}\right), \cdots, f\left(x_{n}\right), \cdots\right)$, since $sup_n \left|f\left(x_{n}\right)\right|=\|f\|$, thus T is a one-to-one bounded linear operator from $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$ into $l^{\infty}$ and is an isometric embedding into $l^{\infty}$, hence $l^{\infty} \supset L^{\infty}[0, 1]$. By Example 14, $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$ is injective, so $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$ is complemented in $l^{\infty}$, i.e., $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$ is isometrically isomorphic to a complemented subspace of $l^{\infty}$. By a lemma, $L^{\infty}[0, 1]$ is linearly isomorphic to $l^{\infty}$.
chinese_rationale: 当  $1 \leqslant p<+\infty， p ≠ 2$  时，  $L^{p}[0，1]$  与  $l^{p}$  不线 性同胚。 Pelczyński 指出: 当  $p=+\infty$  时，  $L^{p}[0，1]$  与  $l^{\infty}$  是线性同胚的。 (1) 记  $X=L^{\infty}[0，1]， {Y}=l^{\infty}$ ， 则  X  与  $X \times X$  线性同胚，  Y  与  $Y \times Y$  线性同胚。事实上， 对每一 $ x \in L^{\infty}[0，1]$ ， 令$\begin{array}{l}x_{1}(t)=x\left(\frac{t}{2}\right)， \\x_{2}(t)=x\left(\frac{1}{2}-\frac{t}{2}\right)，\end{array} 0≤t≤1$显然，  $x_{1}， x_{2} \in L^{\infty}[0，1]$ 。 作 $ X \rightarrow X \times X$  的映射  $T：T x=\left(x_{1}， x_{2}\right)$则$\|T x\|=\left\|\left(x_{1}， x_{2}\right)\right\| \leqslant 2\|x\| \text {。 }$另一方面， 对每个 $ \left(x_{1}， x_{2}\right) \in X \times X $， 作$x(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}x_{1}(2 t)， & t \in\left[0， \frac{1}{2}\right]， \\x_{2}(2 t-1)， & t \in\left[\frac{1}{2}， 1\right]，\end{array}\right.$则  $x \in X$ 。 因此  T  为  X  到  $X \times X$  上的线性同胚映射。其次， 设  $x=\left(\xi_{1}， \xi_{2}， \cdots， \xi_{n}， \cdots\right) \in Y$ ， 令 $ x_{1}=\left(\xi_{1}， \xi_{3}， \cdots， \xi_{2 n-1}， \cdots\right)， \\x_{2}=\left(\xi_{2}， \xi_{4}， \cdots， \xi_{2 n}， \cdots\right)，$则  $T x=\left(x_{1}， x_{2}\right)$  为  Y  到  $Y \times Y$  上的线性同胚映射。(2)  $i^{\infty} $ 与  $L^{\infty}[0，1]$  的某个可补子空间等距同构。把  [0，1]  表为可数个互不相交 的 区 间  $\Delta_{n}(n=1，2， \cdots) $， 设 $ x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{\infty} $， 令$y(t)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \xi_{n} \chi_{\Delta_{n}}(t)$，这里 $ \chi_{\Delta_{n}}$  为区间  $\Delta_{n}$  的特征函数， 则  $y \in L^{\infty}[0，1]$ ， 且$\left.\|x\|_{l^{{\infty}}}=\| y\right\}_{L^{{\infty}}[0，1]}$现指出空间  $Z=\left\{\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \xi_{n} \chi_{\Delta_{n}}(t):\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{\infty}\right\}$  在 $ L^{\infty}[0，1]$  中 可补。 事实上， 对  $y \in L^{{\infty}}[0，1] $， 记 $ \xi_{n} =sup_{t \in \Delta_{n}}|y(t)|， P y=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \xi_{n} \chi_{\Delta_{n}} $，则  P  为 $ L^{\infty}[0，1] $ 到  Z  上的有界线性算子， 并且$P^{2} y=P y(y \in Z)$，因此  P  为  $L^{\infty}[0，1]$  到  Z  上的有界线性射影算子， 即  Z  在  $L^{\infty}[0，1]$  中可补。（3） $ L^{\infty}[0，1]$  可嵌人到  $l^{\infty}$  中作为  $l^{\infty}$  的一个可补子空间。因为 $ L[0，1]$  是可分的， 所以在 $ L[0，1]$  的单位球上存在一个可数稠密子集 $ \left\{x_{n}\right\}$  。 对每一 $ f \in(L[0，1])^{*}=L^{\infty}[0，1] $， 令$T f=\left(f\left(x_{1}\right)， f\left(x_{2}\right)， \cdots， f\left(x_{n}\right)， \cdots\right)$，由于$ sup_n  \left|f\left(x_{n}\right)\right|=\|f\|$ ， 因而T为$L^{\infty}[0，1]$  到  $l^{\infty}$  中 的一个一对一的有界线性算子， 并且是到  $l^{\infty}$  中的一个等距映射， 因此 $ l^{\infty} \supset   L^{\infty}[0，1]$ 。 由例  14，$ L^{\infty}[0，1]$  为内射空间， 所以 $ L^{\infty}[0，1]$  在 $ l^{\infty}$  中可补， 实即 $ L^{\infty}[0，1]$  与  $l^{\infty}$  的一个可补子空间等距同构。 由引理可知，  $L^{\infty}[0，1]$  与  $l^{\infty}$  线性同胚。

statement: There exists a closed set in a product space, whose projection is not a closed set.
chinese_statement: 一个乘积空间中的闭集，其射影不是闭集。
rationale: It is easy to prove that the projection of an open set in a product space is always open, however, the projection of a closed set is not necessarily closed. For example, $F=\left\{\left(n, \frac{1}{n}\right): n=1,2, \cdots\right\}$ is a closed set in the Euclidean space $\mathbf{R}^{2}=R_{x} \times R_{y}$, but the projection of F onto $R_{y}$, $\left\{\frac{1}{n}\right\}$, is clearly not a closed set in $R_{y}$.
chinese_rationale: 容易证明，乘积空间中开集的射影必为开集，但是，闭集的射影不必是闭集。 例如，  $F=\left\{\left(n， \frac{1}{n}\right): n=1，2， \cdots\right\}$  是二维欧氏空间  $\mathbf{R}^{2}=R_{x} \times R_{y}$  中的闭集， 但  F  在  $R_{y}$  上的射影  $\left\{\frac{1}{n}\right\}$  显然不是  $R_{y}$  中的闭集。

statement: There exists a sequence of strongly convergent compact operators from one Banach space to another, whose limit is not a compact operator.
chinese_statement: 存在由某个 Banach 空间到另一Banach 空间的强收敛的紧算子列, 其极限不是紧算子。
rationale: For example: Let $T_{n}$ be an operator from the Banach space $l^{2}$ to itself: $T_{n} x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \xi_{n}, 0, \cdots\right)$, where $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \xi_{n}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$. Clearly, for each n, $T_{n}$ is a compact linear operator. Let $I x=x\left(x \in l^{2}\right)$, then $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left\|T_{n} x-I x\right\|=0$, i.e. $\left\{T_{n}\right\}$ strongly converges to I, but I is not a compact operator.
chinese_rationale: 例如：设  $T_{n}$  是由 Banach 空间  $l^{2}$  到其自身的算子:$T_{n} x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \xi_{n}, 0, \cdots\right)$,其中  $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \xi_{n}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$ 。 显然, 对每一  n, $T_{n}$  都是紧线性算子。令  $I x=x\left(x \in l^{2}\right)$ , 则$\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left\|T_{n} x-I x\right\|=0$,即  $\left\{T_{n}\right\}$  强收敛于  I , 但  I  不是紧算子。

statement: There exists operators S and T such that ST and TS have different spectra.
chinese_statement: 存在算子  S， T ， 使  S T  与  T S  有不同的谱。
rationale: Let $H=l^{2}$, for $ x=\left(x_{0}, x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right) \in H$, define $S x=\left(0, x_{0}, x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right)$, and let $ T=S^{*}$, then $T x=\left(x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right)$, thus $\begin{array}{l}(S T) x=\left(0, x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right), \\(T S) x=\left(x_{0}, x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right)=I x .\end{array}$ Therefore, the spectrum of ST is $\{0, 1\}$, while the spectrum of TS is $\{1\}$. Note: If at least one of S or T is invertible, then ST and TS must have the same spectrum.
chinese_rationale: 设  $H=l^{2}$ ， 对 $ x=\left(x_{0}， x_{1}， x_{2}， \cdots\right) \in H$ ， 令$S x=\left(0， x_{0}， x_{1}， x_{2}， \cdots\right)$，又令 $ T=S^{*}$ ， 则  $T x=\left(x_{1}， x_{2}， \cdots\right)$ ， 故$\begin{array}{l}(S T) x=\left(0， x_{1}， x_{2}， \cdots\right)， \\(T S) x=\left(x_{0}， x_{1}， x_{2}， \cdots\right)=I x .\end{array}$因此，  S T  的谱是  $\{0，1\} $， 而  T S  的谱是 $ \{1\} $ 。注： 若  S， T  中至少有一个存在逆算子， 则  S T  与  T S  必有相同的谱。

statement: There exist vector-valued measures of bounded variation and absolutely continuous with respect to $\mu$ for which the Radon-Nikodym theorem does not hold.
chinese_statement: 存在Radon-Nikodym 定理不成立的有界变差且关于  $\mu$  绝对连续的向量值测度。
rationale:
Let $(\Omega, \mathscr{R}, \mu)$ be a $\sigma$-finite measure space, X be a Banach space, and $F: \mathscr{R} ightarrow X$ be a vector-valued measure. For $E \in \mathscr{R}, \pi$ is a partition of E into a finite number of disjoint elements in $\mathscr{R}$, define $|F|(E)=\sup_{\pi} \sum_{\Delta \in \pi}\|F(A)\|$, and call $|F|$ the variation of F. If $|F|(\Omega)<+\infty$, then F is called a measure of bounded variation. Let $F: \mathscr{R} ightarrow X$ be a vector-valued measure. If for any $\varepsilon>0$, there exists $\delta>0$ such that for $E \in \mathscr{R}, \mu(E)<\delta$, $\|F(E)\|<\varepsilon$, then F is called absolutely continuous with respect to $\mu$. The Radon-Nikodym theorem in measure theory states: if $(\Omega, \mathscr{R}, \mu)$ is a $\sigma$-finite measure space, $
u$ is a $\sigma$-finite signed measure on $\mathscr{R}$, and $
u$ is absolutely continuous with respect to $\mu$, then there exists a $\mathscr{R}$-measurable function f with finite values such that for every $E \in \mathscr{R}$, $
u(E)=\int_{E} f d\mu$. Naturally, one may ask: For vector-valued measures, does the corresponding result hold? That is, if $F : \mathscr{R} ightarrow X$ is a vector-valued measure of bounded variation and absolutely continuous with respect to $\mu$, is there an $f \in B(\Omega, X, \mu)$ (Bochner integrable functions), such that for every $E \in \mathscr{R}$, $F(E)=\int_{E} f d\mu$. The following example shows that this result is not generally true. Let $\Omega=[0,1], \mathscr{R}$ be the collection of all Lebesgue measurable sets on [0,1], and m be the Lebesgue measure. Define the mapping $F: \mathscr{R} ightarrow c_{0}$ by $ oldsymbol{F}(E)=\left\{\int_{E} \sin 2^{n} \pi t dm(t)ight\}$. It is easy to see that $F(E) \in c_{0}$, and $\|F(E)\|=\sup_{n}\left|\int_{E} \sin 2^{n} \pi t dm(t)ight| \leqslant m(E)$. Therefore, F is a $c_{0}$-valued measure of bounded variation and absolutely continuous with respect to m. If there exists a Bochner integrable function $f: \Omega ightarrow c_{0}$, such that $F(E)=\int_{E} f(t) dm(t)$, let $f(t)=\left\{f_{n}(t)ight\}$, then the nth coordinate of $F(E)$ for $E \in \mathscr{R}$ is $(F(E))_{n}=\int_{E} f_{n}(t) dm(t)$, so for almost all t, $f_{n}(t)=\sin 2^{n} \pi t$. However, let $E_{n}=\left\{t:\left|\sin 2^{n} \pi tight|> rac{1}{\sqrt{2}}ight\}$, then for all n, $m(E_{n})= rac{1}{2}$, hence $m(\overline{\lim} E_{n}) \geqslant \overline{\lim} m(E_{n})= rac{1}{2}$. Therefore, $m(\left\{t: f(t) \in c_{0}ight\}) \leqslant  rac{1}{2}$, that is, f is not almost everywhere $c_{0}$-valued, which is a contradiction. This illustrates that the Radon-Nikodym theorem does not generally hold for F.
chinese_rationale:
设  $(\Omega, \mathscr{R}, \mu)$  是  $\sigma$  有限测度空间,  X  是Banach 空间,  $F: \mathscr{R} ightarrow   X$  是向量值测度。 对  $E \in \mathscr{R}, \pi$  是把  E  分解为  $\mathscr{R}$  中互不相交的有限个元的分割, 规定$|F|(E)=\sup _{\pi} \sum_{\Delta \in \pi}\|F(A)\|$,称  $|F|$  为  F  的变差。 若  $|F|(\Omega)<+\infty$ , 则 称  F  是具有有界变差的测度。设  $F: \mathscr{R} ightarrow X$  是向量值测度, 若对任意  $\varepsilon>0$ , 存在  $\delta>0$ , 使得  $E \in \mathscr{R}, \mu(E)<\delta$  时,  $\|F(E)\|<\varepsilon$ , 则称  F  关于  $\mu$  是绝对连续的。在测度论中有基本的Radon-Rikodym定理,设$(\Omega, \mathscr{R}, \mu)$是  $\sigma$  有限测度空间,  $
u$  是  $\mathscr{R}  $上的  $\sigma$  有限广义测度,  $
u$  关于  $\mu$  绝对连续, 则存在  $\mathscr{R} $ 上有限值可测函数  f , 使得对每个  $E \in \mathscr{R}$ , 有$
u(E)=\int_{E} f d \mu$ 。自然要问: 对向量值测度而言, 相应的结果是否成立? 即设  $F  :  \mathscr{R} ightarrow X$  是具有有界变差的向量值测度, 且关于  $\mu$  绝对连续, 是否存在  $f \in B(\Omega, X, \mu)$  (Bochner 可积函数全体)，使得对每个  $E \in   \mathscr{R}$ , 有$F(E)=\int_{E} f d \mu$ 。下面的例子说明, 这个结果并非普遍成立。设  $\Omega=[0,1], \mathscr{R}$  为  [0,1]  上 Lebesgue 可测集全体,  m  为Lebesgue 测度。 规定映射  $F: \mathscr{R} ightarrow c_{0}$  为$ oldsymbol{F}(E)=\left\{\int_{E} \sin 2^{n} \pi t d m(t)ight\}$ 。易见  $F(E) \in c_{0}$ , 且$\|F(E)\|=\sup _{n}\left|\int_{E} \sin 2^{n} \pi t d m(t)ight| \leqslant m(E)$ 。因此,  F  是具有有界变差的  $c_{0}$  值测度, 且关于  m  绝对连续。 如果存在 Bochner 可积函数  $f: \Omega ightarrow c_{0}$ , 使得  $F(E)=\int_{E} f(t) d m(t)$ ,设  $f(t)=\left\{f_{n}(t)ight\}$ , 则对  $E \in \mathscr{R}, F(E)$  的第  n  个坐标为$(F(E))_{n}=\int_{E} f_{n}(t) d m(t)$,故对几乎所有的  $t, f_{n}(t)=\sin 2^{n} \pi t$ 。 但如记  $E_{n}=\left\{t:\left|\sin 2^{n} \pi tight|>ight.   \left. rac{1}{\sqrt{2}}ight\}$ , 则对一切  $n, m\left(E_{n}ight)= rac{1}{2}$ , 从而$m\left(\overline{\lim } E_{n}ight) \geqslant \overline{\lim } m\left(E_{n}ight)= rac{1}{2}$ 。所以  $m\left(\left\{t: f(t) \in c_{0}ight\}ight) \leqslant  rac{1}{2}$ , 即  f  并非几乎处处为  $c_{0}$  值的, 此为矛盾。 这就说明了 Radon-Nikodym 定理关于  F  并不成立。

statement: There exists a series in some Banach spaces that is weakly unconditionally convergent but not unconditionally convergent. A series $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} x_{n}$ in a normed linear space X is called weakly unconditionally convergent if for any $f \in X^{*}$, $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|f\left(x_{n}\right)\right|<+\infty$. It is easy to prove that an unconditionally convergent series must be weakly unconditionally convergent. However, the converse is not true.
chinese_statement: 存在某个 Banach空间中弱无条件收敛而非无条件收敛的级数。赋范线性空间  X  中的级数  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} x_{n}$  称为弱无条件收敛的， 是指对任一  $f \in X^{*}$ ， 都有$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|f\left(x_{n}\right)\right|<+\infty$ 。容易证明，无条件收敛的级数必定是弱无条件收敛。然而逆命题并不成立。
rationale: For example, on the interval [0, 1], define the sequence of continuous functions $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ $:x_{n}(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}0, & 0 \leqslant t \leqslant \frac{1}{2^{n+1}}, \frac{1}{2^{n}} \leqslant t \leqslant 1, \\1, & t=\frac{\left(\frac{1}{2^{n+1}}+\frac{1}{2^{n}}\right)}{2}=t_{n}, \\\text{ linear, } \frac{1}{2^{n+1}} \leqslant t \leqslant t_{n}, t_{n} \leqslant t \leqslant \frac{1}{2^{n}}.\end{array}\right.$ It can be proven that the series $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} x_{n}$ in $C[0, 1]$ is weakly unconditionally convergent, but it is not unconditionally convergent. Note that, in fact, there also exist series that are weakly unconditionally convergent but not convergent. For example, let $\boldsymbol{e}_{n} = (0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots)$, then for any $-\cdot f=\left\{\boldsymbol{\xi}_{\mathrm{n}}\right\} \in l$, we have $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|f\left(e_{n}\right)\right|=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|<+\infty$, so the series $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} e_{n}$ in the Banach space $c_{0}$ is weakly unconditionally convergent, but it is not convergent in $c_{0}$.
chinese_rationale: 例如， 在区间  [0，1]  上定义连续函数列  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  $:x_{n}(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}0， & 0 \leqslant t \leqslant \frac{1}{2^{n+1}}， \frac{1}{2^{n}} \leqslant t \leqslant 1， \\1， & t=\frac{\left(\frac{1}{2^{n+1}}+\frac{1}{2^{n}}\right)}{2}=t_{n}， \\\text { 线性， } \frac{1}{2^{n+1}} \leqslant t \leqslant t_{n}， t_{n} \leqslant t \leqslant \frac{1}{2^{n}} .\end{array}\right.$可以证明， 级数  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} x_{n}$  在  $C[0，1]$  中是弱无条件收敛的， 但它并不无条件收敛。注 其实， 还存在弱无条件收敛而非收敛的级数。 例如， 令  $\boldsymbol{e}_{n}=(0， \cdots， 0，1，0， \cdots)$ ， 则对任  $-\cdot f=\left\{\boldsymbol{\xi}_{\mathrm{n}}\right\} \in l$ ， 均有$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|f\left(e_{n}\right)\right|=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|<+\infty$，故级数  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} e_{n}$  在 Banach 空间  $c_{0}$  中是弱无条件收敛的， 但它在  $c_{0}$  中并不收敛。
