It is easy to see that $F_{\alpha}$ is an extension of f, and $\left\|F_{\alpha}\right\| \geqslant 1$. Moreover, since $\left|F_{\mathbb{k}}(x)\right| \leqslant\left|\xi_{1}\right|+|\alpha| \cdot\left|\xi_{2}\right| \leqslant\left|\xi_{1}\right|+\left|\xi_{2}\right|=\|x\|$, it follows that $\left\|F_{\alpha}\right\| \leqslant 1$, thus $\left\|F_{\alpha}\right\|=1$. Therefore, $F_{\alpha}$ is an extension of f and satisfies $\left\|F_{\alpha}\right\|= \|f\|_{G}$. However, the set formed by all $F_{\alpha}(|\alpha| \leqslant 1)$ has a cardinality of the continuum.
chinese_rationale: 考察一切二维向量  $x=\left(\xi_{1}， \xi_{2}\right)$  按照范数  $\|x\|=\left|\xi_{1}\right|+\left|\xi_{2}\right|$  所成的 Banach 空间  X 。 令  G  为  X  中形如  $\left(\xi_{1}， 0\right)$  的向量 组 成的子空间。 在  G  上定义有界线性泛函  f  :$f(x)=\xi_{1}(x \in G)$ 。显然，  $\|f\|_{G}=1$ 。 任取满足  $|\alpha| \leqslant 1$  的数  \alpha ， 再定义  X  上的有界线性泛函  $F_{\alpha}  :F_{\alpha}(x)=\xi_{1}+\alpha \xi_{2}， x=\left(\xi_{1}， \xi_{2}\right) \in X$。易见，  $F_{\alpha}$  是  f  的扩张， 且  $\left\|F_{\alpha}\right\| \geqslant 1$ 。 又因$\left|F_{\mathbb{k}}(x)\right| \leqslant\left|\xi_{1}\right|+|\alpha| \cdot\left|\xi_{2}\right| \leqslant\left|\xi_{1}\right|+\left|\xi_{2}\right|=\|x\|$，故  $\left\|F_{\alpha}\right\| \leqslant 1$ ， 是  $\left\|F_{\alpha}\right\|=1$ 。 因此，  $F_{\alpha}$  是  f  的扩张且 满足  $\left\|F_{\alpha}\right\|=   \|f\|_{G}$ 。 但是全部  $F_{\alpha}(|\alpha| \leqslant 1)$  构成之集具有连续统对势。

statement: There exist two self-adjoint operators whose product is not a self-adjoint operator.
chinese_statement: 存在两个自伴算子,其积不是自伴算子。
rationale: Let $S=\left(\begin{array}{cc}13 & 12 \\12 & 13\end{array}\right), T=\left(\begin{array}{cc}16 & 0 \\0 & 49\end{array}\right)$ then for $x=\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right), y=\left(y_{1}, y_{2}\right) \in R^{2}$, we have $\begin{aligned}\langle S x, y\rangle & =\left\langle\left(13 x_{1}+12 x_{2}, 12 x_{1}+13 x_{2}\right),\left(y_{1}, y_{2}\right)\right\rangle \\& =13 x_{1} y_{1}+12 x_{1} y_{2}+12 x_{2} y_{1}+13 x_{2} y_{2} \\\langle x, S y\rangle & =\left\langle\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right),\left(13 y_{1}+12 y_{2}, 12 y_{1}+13 y_{2}\right)\right\rangle \\& =13 x_{1} y_{1}+12 x_{1} y_{2}+12 x_{2} y_{1}+13 x_{2} y_{2}\end{aligned}$ thus S is a self-adjoint operator from $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ to $\mathbf{R}^{2}$. Similarly, it can be proved that T is also a self-adjoint operator from $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ to $\mathbf{R}^{2}$. On the other hand, it is easy to verify $\langle(S T) x, y\rangle \neq\langle x,(S T) y\rangle$, so S T is not a self-adjoint operator. Note: If S, T are both self-adjoint operators from Hilbert space H to H, then the necessary and sufficient condition for S T to be a self-adjoint operator is that S, T commute. Therefore, the operators S, T in this case are non-commutative.
chinese_rationale: 设$S=\left(\begin{array}{cc}13 & 12 \\12 & 13\end{array}\right), T=\left(\begin{array}{cc}16 & 0 \\0 & 49\end{array}\right)$则对  $x=\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right), y=\left(y_{1}, y_{2}\right) \in R^{2}$ , 有$\begin{aligned}\langle S x, y\rangle & =\left\langle\left(13 x_{1}+12 x_{2}, 12 x_{1}+13 x_{2}\right),\left(y_{1}, y_{2}\right)\right\rangle \\& =13 x_{1} y_{1}+12 x_{1} y_{2}+12 x_{2} y_{1}+13 x_{2} y_{2} \\\langle x, S y\rangle & =\left\langle\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right),\left(13 y_{1}+12 y_{2}, 12 y_{1}+13 y_{2}\right)\right\rangle \\& =13 x_{1} y_{1}+12 x_{1} y_{2}+12 x_{2} y_{1}+13 x_{2} y_{2}\end{aligned}$故  S  是由  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  到  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  内的自伴算子。 同理可证，  T  也是由  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  到  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ 内的自伴算子。 另一方面，容易验证$\langle(S T) x, y\rangle \neq\langle x,(S T) y\rangle$,故  S T  不是自伴算子。注： 若  S, T  都是由 Hilbert 空间  H  到  H  中的自伴算子, 则  S T  为自伴算子的充要条件是  S, T  可换。 因此, 此例中的算子  S, T  是不可换的。

statement: There exists a dense convex balanced absorbing true subset in a normed linear space.
chinese_statement: 存在某个赋范线性空间内稠密的凸的均衡吸收的真子集。
rationale: Let f be a discontinuous linear functional on an infinite-dimensional normed linear space X. Define B = {x: x ∈ X, |f(x)| ≤ 1}, then B is a convex balanced absorbing set in X. Now prove that B is dense in X. In fact, since f is discontinuous, {x: x ∈ X, f(x) = 0} is not closed, but instead a dense set in X. Therefore, B is also dense in X.
chinese_rationale: 设  f  是无穷维赋范线性空间  X  上的不连续的线性泛函， 令  $B=\{x: x \in X，|f(x)| \leqslant 1\}$ ， 则  B  是  X  中的凸的均衡吸收集。兹证  B  在  X  中稠密，事实上，由于  f  不连续，因而  $\{x: x \in X  ，  f(x)=0\}$  不是闭的， 而是  X  的稠密集。 于是，  B  在  X  中也稠密。

statement: There exists a sequence $ \left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset l^{2} $ such that $ \left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{n}\right\} $ converges by coordinates but does not converge weakly.
chinese_statement: 存在点列  $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset l^{2}$ ， 使  $\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{n}\right\}$  按坐标收敛而并不弱收敛。
rationale: For example, take $x_{n}=\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt[4]{n}}, \frac{1}{\sqrt[4]{n}}, \cdots, \frac{1}{\sqrt[4]{n}}, 0, \cdots\right) \text{, then }\left\{x_{n}\right\}  $ converges by coordinates to 0. However, since $ \left\|x_{n}\right\|=\sqrt[4]{n} ,  \left\{\left\|x_{n}\right\|\right\}$ is unbounded, and so $ \left\{x_{n}\right\} $ does not converge weakly.
chinese_rationale: 例如， 取$x_{n}=\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt[4]{n}}， \frac{1}{\sqrt[4]{n}}， \cdots， \frac{1}{\sqrt[4]{n}}， 0， \cdots\right) \text {， 则 }\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ 按坐标收敛于 0 。 但是， 由于  $\left\|x_{n}\right\|=\sqrt[4]{n}$ ， 因而  $\left\{\left\|x_{n}\right\|\right\}$  无界， 故  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  不弱收敛。

statement: There exists some integral operator that is a non-compact strictly singular operator.
chinese_statement: 存在某个积分算子，它是非紧的严格奇异算子。
rationale: For $n=1,2, \cdots$, define the function K on $[0,1] \times[0,1]$ as: $K(s, t)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}0, (s, t) \in\left(\frac{1}{2^{n}}, \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}\right] \times\left(\frac{2 j}{2^{n}}, \frac{(2 j+1)}{2^{n}}\right], \\2, (s, t) \in\left(\frac{1}{2^{n}}, \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}\right] \times\left(\frac{(2 j+1)}{2^{n}}, \frac{(2 j+2)}{2^{n}}\right], \\0, s=0 \text { or } t=0,\end{array}\right.$ where $j=0,1, \cdots, 2^{n-1}-1$. Obviously, K is bounded and measurable on $[0,1] \times[0,1]$. Define the integral operator T from the Banach space $L[0,1]$ to $L^{p}[0,1](1 \leqslant p<+\infty)$ as $(T x)(t)=\int_{0}^{1} K(s, t) x(s) d s$, then T is a weakly compact operator, hence it is a strictly singular operator. Now, it is proven that T is not a compact operator. To this end, define the sequence of functions $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ on the interval [0,1] as follows: $x_{n}(s)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}2^{n}, & s \in\left(\frac{1}{2^{n}}, \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}\right], n=1,2, \cdots, \\0, & \text { otherwise, }\end{array}\right.$ then $\left\|x_{n}\right\|_{1}=1$. With simple calculations, one can obtain $\left\|T x_{n}-T x_{m}\right\|_{p} \geqslant\left\|T x_{n}-T x_{m}\right\|_{1}=1(m \neq n)$, thus $\left\{T x_{n}\right\}$ does not have a convergent subsequence in $L^{p}[0,1]$, i.e., T is not a compact operator.
chinese_rationale: 对  $n=1,2, \cdots$ , 在  $[0,1] \times[0,1]$  上定义函数  K  为:$K(s, t)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}0,(s, t) \in\left(\frac{1}{2^{n}}, \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}\right] \times\left(\frac{2 j}{2^{n}}, \frac{(2 j+1)}{2^{n}}\right], \\2,(s, t) \in\left(\frac{1}{2^{n}}, \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}\right] \times\left(\frac{(2 j+1)}{2^{n}}, \frac{(2 j+2)}{2^{n}}\right], \\0, s=0 \text { 或 } t=0,\end{array}\right.$其中  $j=0,1, \cdots, 2^{n-1}-1$ 。 显然,  K  在  $[0,1] \times[0,1]$  上有界可测。 定义由 Banach 空间  $L[0,1]$  到  $L^{p}[0,1](1 \leqslant p<+\infty)$  的积分算子  T  为$(T x)(t)=\int_{0}^{1} K(s, t) x(s) d s$,则  T  为弱紧算子, 从而它是严格奇异算子  。兹证  T  不是紧算子。 为此,在区间  [0,1]  上定义函数列  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  如下:$x_{n}(s)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}2^{n}, & s \in\left(\frac{1}{2^{n}}, \frac{1}{2^{n-1}}\right], n=1,2, \cdots, \\0, & \text { 其它, }\end{array}\right.$则  $\left\|x_{n}\right\|_{1}=1$ 。 经过简单的计算, 可得$\left\|T x_{n}-T x_{m}\right\|_{p} \geqslant\left\|T x_{n}-T x_{m}\right\|_{1}=1(m \neq n)$,因而  $\left\{T x_{n}\right\}$  在  $L^{p}[0,1]$  中不存在收敛子列, 即 T  不是紧算子。

statement: There exist continuous but unbounded functionals.
chinese_statement: 存在连续而无界的泛函。
rationale: Let $x=\left\{\xi_{k}\right\} \in E^{\infty}$, and take the norm $\|x\|=\sup _{k}\left|\xi_{k}\right|$ on $E^{\infty}$, then $\left(E^{\infty},\|\cdot\|\right)$ is a normed linear space. Define $f(x)=\sum_{k=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{k}\right|^{k}$, it is easy to see that $f$ is a continuous functional on $E^{\infty}$. However, $f$ is not bounded, because if you take $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \cdots, \xi_{n}, 0, 0, \cdots\right) \in E^{\infty}$, where $\xi_{k}=1, 1 \leqslant k \leqslant n$, then $\|x\|=1$ and $|f(x)|=\sum_{k=1}^{n}\left|\xi_{k}\right|^{k}=n$. Since $n$ is any positive integer, $f$ is not bounded. Note: If $f$ is a linear functional defined on a normed linear space, then the necessary and sufficient condition for $f$ to be continuous is that it is bounded. The above counterexample shows that the linearity condition of $f$ cannot be omitted in this proposition.
chinese_rationale: 设  $x=\left\{\xi_{k}\right\} \in E^{\infty}$ ， 在  $E^{\infty}$  上取范数  $\|x\|=\sup _{k}\left|\xi_{k}\right|$ ， 则  $\left(E^{\infty}，\|\cdot\|\right)$ 为一赋范线性空间。 令$f(x)=\sum_{k=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{k}\right|^{k}$，易见，  f  是  $E^{\infty}$  上的连续泛函。 但  $f$  不是有界的， 因为若取  $x=   \left(\xi_{1}， \cdots， \xi_{n}， 0，0， \cdots\right) \in E^{\infty}$ ， 其中  $\xi_{k}=1，1 \leqslant k \leqslant n$ ， 则  $\|x\|=1$  且$|f(x)|=\sum_{k=1}^{n}\left|\xi_{k}\right|^{k}=n$由于  n  是任意正整数， 因而  f  不是有界的。注 如果  f  是定义在赋范线性空间上的线性泛函，那么  f  为连续的充要条件是它为有界的。 上述反例说明了在这个命题中  f 为线性的条件不可去掉。

statement: There exist two distances $d_{1}$ and $d_{2}$ on a set, for which there is no distance d such that $d\leqslant\ d_{1},\boldsymbol{d}\leqslant\boldsymbol{d}_{2}$.
chinese_statement: 存在一个集上的两个距离$d_{1}$与$d_{2}$，不存在距离d使$d\leqslant\ d_{1}，\boldsymbol{d}\leqslant\boldsymbol{d}_{2}$。
rationale: For example, let $X=\{x:0\leqslant x\leqslant 1\}$, and consider the usual distance on X $d_{1}(x,y)=|x-y|, x,y\in X$. Let $f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1,&x=0,\\0,&x=1,\\x,&0<x<1,\end{array}\right.d_{2}(x,y)=d_{1}(f(x),f(y))$, then when $0<x<1$, we have $\begin{array}{l}d_{1}(x,0)=|x|=x,\\d_{2}(x,1)=d_{1}(f(x),f(1))=d_{1}(x,0)=x.\\\end{array}$ It is hereby shown that there is no distance $d$ such that for all $x, y \in X$, $d(x, y)\leqslant d_1(x, y), d(x, y)\leqslant d_2(x, y)$. Suppose there exists a distance d with the above properties, then for any $x(0<x<1)$, it should hold $\begin{array}{l}d(x,0)\leqslant d_{1}(x,0)=x,\\d(x,1)\leqslant d_{2}(x,1)=x\end{array}$. Hence, $d(0,1) \leqslant d(0,x)+d(x,1) \leqslant 2 x$. The right end of the above expression can be arbitrarily small, whereas the left end is a fixed number, which is impossible.
chinese_rationale: 例如，设$X=\{x:0\leqslant x\leqslant 1\}$，并在X上取通常距离$d_{1}(x，y)=|x-y|，x，y\in X$。令$f(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1，&x=0，\\0，&x=1，\\x，&0<x<1，\end{array}\right.d_{2}(x，y)=d_{1}(f(x)，f(y))$，则当0<x<1时，有$\begin{array}{l}d_{1}(x，0)=|x|=x，\\d_{2}(x, 1)=d_{1}(f(x), f(1))=d_{1}(x,0)=x.\\\end{array}$ 兹证不存在距离$d$，使对一切$x, y \in X$有$d(x, y)\leqslant d_1(x, y), d(x, y)\leqslant d_2(x, y)$. 反设具有上述性质的距离d，那么对任意$x(0<x<1)$，应存$\begin{array}{l}d(x，0)\leqslant d_{1}(x，0)=x，\\d(x，1)\leqslant d_{2}(x，1)=x\end{array}$。由此得到$d(0,1) \leqslant d(0, x)+d(x, 1) \leqslant 2 x $。上式右端可以任意小， 而左端为一正常数，这是不可能的。

statement: There exist Banach spaces with the weak Banach-Saks property that do not have the Banach-Saks property.
chinese_statement: 存在具有弱 Banach-Saks 性质而不具 有 Banach-Saks 性质 的 Banach空间。
rationale: For example, let $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset l$ and $x_{n} x \to {\text { weak }} x_{0}$, then due to the fact that in $l$, strong convergence and weak convergence of sequences are equivalent, we have $x_{n}x \to {\text { strong }} x_{0}$. Therefore, $\left\|\sum_{i=1}^{k} \frac{x_{n_{i}}}{k} x_{0}\right\| \rightarrow 0(k \rightarrow \infty)$, which means the space $l$ has wBSP. On the other hand, it's easy to prove that $l$ does not have BSP. Note that Banach spaces $c_{0}, L[0,1]$ also have wBSP but do not have BSP.
chinese_rationale: 例如, 设  $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset l$  且  $x_{n} x  \to    {\text { 弱 }} x_{0}$ , 则因  $l$  中点列的强、弱收敛性是等价的, 故  $x_{n}x  \to  {\text { 强 }} x_{0}$ , 从而$\left\|\sum_{i=1}^{k} \frac{x_{n_{i}}}{k} x_{0}\right\| \rightarrow 0(k \rightarrow \infty)$,即空间  l  具有 wBSP。 另一方面, 容易证明,  l  没有BSP。注 Banach 空间  $c_{0}, L[0,1]$  也具有wBSP而不具有BSP。

statement: In vector spaces, Hamel basis and Schauder basis do not imply each other.
chinese_statement: 范线性空间中 Hamel 基与 Schauder 基互不蕴涵。
rationale:
Example one: A Hamel basis that is not a Schauder basis. Consider an infinite-dimensional Banach space with a Schauder basis. Since a Schauder basis is a countable sequence, while a Hamel basis in an infinite-dimensional Banach space is uncountable, any Hamel basis in this space cannot be a Schauder basis.
Example two: A Schauder basis that is not a Hamel basis. We examine the sequence $\left\{e_{k}\right\}$ in the Banach space $c_{0}$, where $e_{k}=(0, \cdots, 0, 1, 0, \cdots)$, and take an arbitrary $x=\left\{a_{k}\right\} \in c_{0}$, then $\left\|x-\sum_{k=1}^{n} a_{k} e_{k}\right\|=\sup _{k>n}\left|a_{k}\right| \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$, so $x=\sum_{k \sim 1}^{\infty} a_{k} e_{k}$. It is not difficult to see that this representation is unique, and since $c_{0}$ is complete, the coordinate functionals $a_{k}$ are continuous. Thus, $\left\{e_{k}\right\}$ is a Schauder basis for $c_{0}$. On the other hand, the linear space spanned by $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is $E^{\infty}$, which is a proper subspace of $c_{0}$, hence $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is not a Hamel basis for the space $c_{0}$.
chinese_rationale:
第一例: 一个 Hamel 基， 它不是 Schauder 基。任取一个具有 Schauder 基的无穷维 Banach 空间。由于 Schauder基是一个可数点列， 而无穷维Banach空间中的Hamel基是不可数的， 因此， 这个空间中的任何一个 Hamel 基 都 不可能是 Schauder基。
第二例: 一个 Schauder 基， 它不是 Hamel 基。我们考察 Banach 空间  $c_{0}$  中的点列  $\left\{e_{k}\right\}$ ， 其 中$e_{k}=(0， \cdots， 0，1，0， \cdots)$，并任取  $x=\left\{a_{k}\right\} \in c_{0}$ ， 则$\left\|x-\sum_{k=1}^{n} a_{k} e_{k}\right\|=\sup _{k>n}\left|a_{k}\right| \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$，故  $x=\sum_{k \sim 1}^{\infty} a_{k} e_{k}$ 。 不难看出， 这个表示式是唯一的， 且因  $c_{0}$  完备， 从而坐标泛函  $a_{k}$  都是连续的。因此，  $\left\{e_{k}\right\}$  是  $c_{0}$  的 Schauder 基。另一方面，  $\left\{e_{n}\right\} $ 所张成的线性空间是  $E^{\infty}$ ， 它是  $c_{0}$  的真子空间， 故 $ \left\{e_{n}\right\}$ 不是空间  $c_{0}$  的 Hamel 基。

statement: There exists a weak $^{*}$ Schauder basis in a conjugate space, which is not a Schauder basis.
chinese_statement: 一个共轭空间中的弱$^{*}$Schauder 基， 它不是 Schauder 基。
rationale: It can be proved that weak Schauder bases and Schauder bases in Banach spaces are equivalent. However, in conjugate spaces, Schauder bases need not be weak $^{*}$ Schauder bases (see Example 25); and weak $^{*}$ Schauder bases are not necessarily Schauder bases. For example, take $X=l, X^{*}=l^{\infty}$. Clearly, $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is a weak $^{*}$ Schauder basis in $X^{*}$, but it is not a basis in $X^{*}$. Note (i) For Banach spaces, the concepts of basis, Schauder basis, weak basis, and weak Schauder basis are equivalent to each other. (ii) For an incomplete normed linear space, a basis need not be a Schauder basis ; a weak Schauder basis need not be a basis. (iii) For a conjugate space $X^{*}$ of a Banach space $X$, a Schauder basis in $X^{*}$ need not be a weak $^{*}$ basis , and vice versa . Also, a weak $^{*}$ basis in $X^{*}$ need not be a weak $^{*}$ Schauder basis .
chinese_rationale: 可以证明， Banach 空间中的弱 Schauder 基与 Schauder 基是等价的。 但是，共轭空间中的 Schauder 基不必是弱$^{*}$ Schauder 基 （参看例 25); 而弱$^{*}$Schauder 基也不必是 Schauder 基。 例如， 取  $X=l， X^{*}=l^{\infty}$ 。显然，  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}$  中的弱$^{*}$ Schauder 基， 但它不是  $X^{*}$  中的基。注 （i）对于 Banach 空间而言，基、Schauder 基、弱基和弱 Schauder 基的概念彼此都是等价的。（ii）对于不完备的赋范线性空间而言， 基不必是 Schauder 基(例 14); 弱Schauder 基不必是基(例 15)。 (iii) 对于 Banach 空间  X  的共轭空间  $X^{*}$  而言，  $X^{*}$  中的 Schauder 基不必是弱$^{*}$基（例 25); 反过来也一样(例 27)。 又，  $X^{*}$  中的弱$^{*}$基不必是弱$^{*}$ Schauder 基(例 26)。

statement: There exists a homeomorphic mapping that maps a closed set to a non-closed set.
chinese_statement: 把闭集映成非闭集的同胚映射。
rationale: The open interval (-1,1) (not a closed set) in $\mathbf{R}^{1}$ is a homeomorphic image of $\mathbf{R}^{1}$ (a closed set). The homeomorphic mapping is $f(x)=\frac{x}{1+x},-1<x<0 ； f(x)=\frac{x}{1-x}, 0 \leqslant x<1$.
chinese_rationale: $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  中的开区间  (-1,1)  (不是闭集)是  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  (闭集)的同胚象，同胚映射为  $f(x)=\frac{x}{1+x},-1<x<0 ； f(x)=\frac{x}{1-x}, 0 \leqslant x<1$。

statement: There exists a basis $\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{n}\right\}$ of a Banach space, such that the subsequence $\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{2 k}\right\}$ is equivalent to the basis $\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{n}\right\}$, but $\left\{\boldsymbol{f}_{2 k}\right\}$ is not equivalent to $\left\{\boldsymbol{f}_{n}\right\}$, where $\left\{\boldsymbol{f}_{n}\right\}$ is the sequence of coordinate functionals for $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$.
chinese_statement: 一个Banach空间的基  $\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{n}\right\}$ ，使基序列  $\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{2 k}\right\}$  等价于基  $\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{n}\right\}$ ，但  $\left\{\boldsymbol{f}_{2 k}\right\}$  并不等价于  $\left\{\boldsymbol{f}_{n}\right\}$ ， 这里，  $\left\{\boldsymbol{f}_{n}\right\}$  是  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  的坐标泛函列。
rationale: For example: Consider the basis $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ in the Banach space c, where $x_{n}=\left\{\xi_{i}^{(n)}\right\}_{i=1}^{\infty}, \quad \xi_{i}^{(n)}=\left\{\begin{array}{l}0, i<n, \\1, i \geqslant n.\end{array}\right.$ Thus, $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ in $c^{*}=l$ has the sequence of coordinate functionals $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$, where $f_{n}=\left\{\eta_{i}^{(n)}\right\}_{i=1}^{\infty}$, and $\begin{aligned}\eta_{i}^{(1)} & =\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1, & i=1, \\0, & i>1,\end{array}\right. \\\eta_{i}^{(n)} & =\left\{\begin{array}{ll}-1, & i=n-1, \\1, & i=n, n=2,3, \cdots \\0, & \text{ other } i .\end{array}\right.\end{aligned}$ Let $n_{k}=2 k, k=1,2, \cdots$, it is not difficult to see that the subsequence $\left\{x_{2 k}\right\}$ is equivalent to the basis $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$. However, since $\left\{f_{2 k}\right\}$ is equivalent to the natural basis $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ in l, and $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is not equivalent to $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$, hence $\left\{f_{2 k}\right\}$ is also not equivalent to $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$.
chinese_rationale: 例如:在 Banach 空间  c  中考虑基  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ ， 这里$x_{n}=\left\{\xi_{i}^{(n)}\right\}_{i=1}^{\infty}， \quad \xi_{i}^{(n)}=\left\{\begin{array}{l}0， i<n， \\1， i \geqslant n .\end{array}\right.$于是，  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  在  $c^{*}=l$  中的坐标泛函列是  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ ， 这里  $f_{n}=\left\{\eta_{i}^{(n)}\right\}_{i=1}^{\infty}$ ，面$\begin{aligned}\eta_{i}^{(1)} & =\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1， & i=1， \\0， & i>1，\end{array}\right. \\\eta_{i}^{(n)} & =\left\{\begin{array}{ll}-1， & i=n-1， \\1， & i=n， n=2，3， \cdots \\0， & \text { 其它的 } i .\end{array}\right.\end{aligned}$令  $n_{k}=2 k， k=1，2， \cdots$ ， 不难看出， 基序列  $\left\{x_{2 k}\right\}$  等价于基  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ 。然而， 由于  $\left\{f_{2 k}\right\}$  等价于  l  中的自然基  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ ， 而  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  不等价于  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ ，因而  $\left\{f_{2 k}\right\}$  也不等价于  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ 。

statement: There exists a vector-valued function that is strongly continuous everywhere but weakly differentiable nowhere.
chinese_statement: 存在处处强连续而却无处弱可导的向量值函数。
rationale: Example: Let $x(t)$ be a vector-valued function from the interval $[0,2 \pi]$ to the Banach space $l^{2}$: $x(t)=\left(\sin t, \frac{\sin 2 t}{2^{\frac{(1+\sigma)}{2}}}, \cdots, \frac{\sin n t}{n^{\frac{1+\sigma)}{2}}}, \cdots\right), \quad 0 \leqslant t \leqslant 2 \pi$, where $0<\sigma<1$. Then $x(t)$ is strongly continuous everywhere but weakly differentiable nowhere on $[0,2 \pi]$. In fact, it is known from $\begin{aligned}\|x(t)\|^{2} & =\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\frac{\sin n t}{n^{\frac{(1+\sigma)}{2}}}\right)^{2} \\& \leqslant \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n^{1+\sigma}}<+\infty\end{aligned}$ that the above-defined $x(t)$ is indeed an element in $l^{2}$. Moreover, for any $t_{0} \in[0,2 \pi]$, as long as $t_{0}+\Delta t \in[0,2 \pi]$, we have $\begin{array}{l} \left\|x\left(t_{0}+\Delta t\right)-x\left(t_{0}\right)\right\|^{2}=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\frac{\sin n\left(t_{0}+\Delta t\right)-\sin n t_{0}}{n \frac{(1+\sigma)}{2}}\right)^{2}=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\frac{2 \cos n\left(t_{0}+\frac{\Delta t}{2}\right) \sin \frac{\Delta t}{2}}{n^{\frac{(1+\sigma)}{2}}}\right)^{2} \\\leqslant \sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\frac{2}{n^{\frac{(1+\sigma)}{2}}} \cdot \frac{\Delta t}{2}\right)^{2} \\=\left(\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n^{1+\sigma}}\right) \Delta t \rightarrow 0(\Delta t \rightarrow 0) .\end{array}$ Thus, it follows that the vector-valued function $x(t)$ is strongly continuous at every point on $[0,2 \pi]$. Secondly, since $\left(l^{2}\right)^{*}=l^{2}$, if the vector-valued function $x(t)=\left\{x_{n}(t)\right\}$ has a weak derivative at point $t_{0}$, then the weak derivative must be $\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{n}{ }^{\prime}\left(t_{0}\right)\right\}$. Also, from the nature of the weak convergence limits of a sequence, we should have $\left\|\left\{x_{n}{ }^{\prime}\left(t_{0}\right)\right\}\right\|^{2}=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|x^{\prime}{ }_{n}\left(t_{0}\right)\right|^{2}<+\infty$. (1) However, according to $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|x_{n}{ }^{\prime}\left(t_{0}\right)\right|^{2}=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\frac{\cos n t_{0}}{n^{\frac{(\sigma-1)}{2}}}\right)^{2}\begin{array}{l}=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{\cos ^{2} n t_{0}}{n^{\sigma-1}} \\=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} n^{1-\sigma} \cos ^{2} n t_{0}\end{array}$ it is known that $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|x_{n}{ }^{\prime}\left(t_{0}\right)\right|^{2}=+\infty$, which leads to a contradiction with (1). Thus, the vector-valued function $x(t)$ is weakly differentiable nowhere on $[0,2 \pi]$.

}_{n}\left(t_{0}\right)\right|^{2}<+\infty$ 。（1）然而，根据$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|x_{n}{ }^{\prime}\left(t_{0}\right)\right|^{2}=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left(\frac{\cos n statement: There exists a separable and strictly convex Banach space that cannot be endowed with an equivalent uniformly convex norm.
chinese_statement: 存在某个可分且严格凸的 Banach 空间, 而不能赋予等价的一致凸范数。
rationale: Let $E=\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \oplus E_{i}\right)_{p}$ be the Banach space in Example 5. We first prove that E is strictly convex if and only if each $E_{i}$ is strictly convex. In fact, suppose $E_{i}$ $(i=1,2,...)$ are all strictly convex, and assume $\|x\|_{E}=\left\|x^{\prime}\right\|_{E}=1,\left\|x+x^{\prime}\right\|_{E}=2$, then $\begin{aligned}2 & =\left\|x+x^{\prime}\right\|_{E} \\& =\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}+x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{e_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}} \leqslant\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}}+\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}} \\& =\|x\|_{E}+\left\|x^{\prime}\right\|_{E}=2 .\end{aligned}$ From $\left\|x+x^{\prime}\right\|_{E}=\|x\|_{E}+\left\|x^{\prime}\right\|_{E}$, we obtain $x_{i}+x_{i}^{\prime}\left\|_{E_{i}}=\right\| x_{i}\left\|_{E_{i}}+\right\| x_{i}^{\prime} \|_{E_{i}}$. Since $E_{i}$ are all strictly convex, there exists $\lambda_{i}>0$ such that $x_{i}=\lambda_{i} x_{i}^{\prime}$, thus $\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}=\lambda_{i}\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}$. Also, since (1) becomes an equality, $\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}=\lambda\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}$. Hence, $\lambda_{i}=\lambda, x_{i}=\lambda x_{i}^{\prime}(i=1,2, \cdots)$, so $X=\lambda X^{\prime}$, meaning that $\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \oplus E_{i}\right)_{p}$ is strictly convex. Conversely, suppose $\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \oplus E_{i}\right)_{p}$ is strictly convex, and assume $\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}+\| x_{i}^{\prime}\|_{E_{i}}= \left\|x_{i}+x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}$, then we have $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}+x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}+\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}$, hence $\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}=\lambda\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}$, so the Minkowski inequality becomes equality, therefore $\begin{aligned} \left\|x+x^{\prime}\right\|_{E} & =\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}+x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}} \\& =\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left(\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}+\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}\right)^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}} \\& =\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}}+\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}} \\& =\|x\|_{E}+\left\|x^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{.}} .\end{aligned}$ Since $\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \oplus E_{i}\right)_{p}$ is strictly convex, $X=\lambda^{\prime} X$, so $x_{i}=\lambda x_{i}^{\prime}$, indicating each $E_{i}$ is strictly convex. Suppose $E_{i}$ is an i-dimensional normed linear space consisting of points $x_{i}=\left(x_{i 1}, \cdots, x_{i i}\right)$, its norm is defined as $\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}=\sup _{1\le j\le i}\left|x_{i j}\right|$, then $E_{i}$ is a separable and reflexive Banach space. Therefore, an equivalent strictly convex norm can be endowed on $E_{i}$, under this new norm, $E_{i}$ is a separable, reflexive, and strictly convex Banach space, so E is also a separable, reflexive, and strictly convex Banach space. However, as known from Example 5, E cannot be endowed with an equivalent uniformly convex norm. This result was also obtained by Day. Note: The above counterexample also shows that a strictly convex Banach space is not necessarily uniformly convex.
chinese_rationale: 设  $E=\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \oplus E_{i}\right)_{p}$  是例 5 中的 Banach 空间。 我们 首先证明, 为使  E  是严格凸的, 当且仅当每个  $E_{i}$  都是严格凸的。 事实上， 设$E_{i}（i=1,2,...）$都是严格凸的，且设$\|x\|_{E}=\left\|x^{\prime}\right\|_{E}=1,\left\|x+x^{\prime}\right\|_{E}=2$ , 则$\begin{aligned}2 & =\left\|x+x^{\prime}\right\|_{E} \\& =\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}+x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{e_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}} \leqslant\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}}+\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}} \\& =\|x\|_{E}+\left\|x^{\prime}\right\|_{E}=2 .\end{aligned}$由  $\left\|x+x^{\prime}\right\|_{E}=\|x\|_{E}+\left\|x^{\prime}\right\|_{E}$  得到  $x_{i}+x_{i}^{\prime}\left\|_{E_{i}}=\right\| x_{i}\left\|_{E_{i}}+\right\| x_{i}^{\prime} \|_{E_{i}}$ 。 由于  $E_{i}$  都是严格 的, 故存在  $\lambda_{i}>0$ , 使  $x_{i}=\lambda_{i} x_{i}^{\prime}$ , 于是  $\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}=   \lambda_{i}\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}$ 。 又因为  (1)  成为等式, 故  $\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}=\lambda\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}} $。 由此可知, $\lambda_{i}=\lambda, x_{i}=\lambda x_{i}^{\prime}(i=1,2, \cdots)$ , 从而  $X=\lambda X^{\prime}$ , 即  $\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \oplus E_{i}\right)_{p}$  是严格凸的。反之, 设  $\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \oplus E_{i}\right)_{p}$  是严格凸的, 且设  $\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}+\| x_{i}^{\prime}\|_{E_{i}}=   \left\|x_{i}+x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}$ , 则有$\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}+x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}+\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}$,故  $\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}=\lambda\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}$ , 从而 Minkowski 不等式成为等式, 因而得到$\begin{aligned}\left\|x+x^{\prime}\right\|_{E} & =\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}+x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}} \\& =\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left(\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}+\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}\right)^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}} \\& =\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}}+\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty}\left\|x_{i}^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{i}}^{p}\right)^{\frac{1}{p}} \\& =\|x\|_{E}+\left\|x^{\prime}\right\|_{E_{.}} .\end{aligned}$由于  $\left(\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \oplus E_{i}\right)_{p}$  是严格凸的, 故  $X=\lambda^{\prime} X$ , 从而  $x_{i}=\lambda x_{i}^{\prime}$ , 即每个  $E_{i}$  都是严格凸的。设  $E_{i}$  是由点  $x_{i}=\left(x_{i 1}, \cdots, x_{i i}\right)$  所组成的  i  维赋范线性空间，其范数定义为  $\left\|x_{i}\right\|_{E_{i}}=\sup _{1\le j\le i}\left|x_{i j}\right|$ , 则  $E_{i}$  是可分且自反的 Banach 空间。 因此, 在  $E_{i}$  上可赋予一个等价的严格凸的范数,在此新范数下,  $E_{\mathrm{i}}$  是可分、自反且严格凸的 Banach 空间, 从而  E  也是可分、自反且严格凸的 Banach 空间。 然而由例 5 可知, 不能在  E  上赋予等价的一致凸范数。这个结果也是由 Day  得到的。注： 上述反例也说明了严格凸的 Banach 空间不必是一致凸的。

statement: There exists a metric space in which the closure of an open ball is a closed ball, but a certain subspace of it does not have this property.
chinese_statement: 存在度量空间, 其中开球的闭包都是闭球, 但 它的某个子空间却无此性质。
rationale: It is evident that in $\mathbf{R}^{1}$, the closure of each open ball is a closed ball. Consider the metric subspace $\mathrm{Y}=[0,1] \cup[2,3]$ of $\mathbf{R}^{1}$. In X, the closure of the open ball $\{x \in X: d(1, x)<1\}$ is [0,1], while $\{x \in X: d(1, x) \leqslant 1\}=[0,1] \cup\{2\}$. Therefore, the closure of the open ball $\{x \in X: d(1, x)<1\}$ is not a closed ball.
chinese_rationale: 易见,  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  中每个开球的闭包都是闭球。 取  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  的 度量子空间  $\mathrm{Y}=[0,1] \cup[2,3]$ , 则  X  中开球  $\{x \in X: d(1, x)<1  )$ 的闭包是  [0,1] , 而  $\{x \in X: d(1, x) \leqslant 1\}=[0,1] \cup\{2\}$ , 故开球  $\{x \in X: d(1, x)<1\}$  的闭包不是闭球。

statement: There exist non-reflexive Banach spaces.
chinese_statement: 存在不自反的Banach空间。
rationale: Because the conjugate space of Banach space $c_{0}$ is $l$, and the conjugate space of $l$ is Banach space $l^{\infty}$, so $l^{\infty}$ is the second conjugate space of $c_{0}$. Since $c_{0}$ is a proper subspace of $l^{\infty}$, $c_{0}$ is not reflexive. From the fact that $c_{0}$ is not reflexive, it is known that l and $l^{\infty}$ are not reflexive.
chinese_rationale: 因Banach 空间  $c_{0}$  的共轭空间是  $l$ ，而  $l$  的共轨空间是Banach 空间  $l^{\infty}$ ， 于是  $l^{\infty}$  是  $c_{0}$  的二次共轭空间。 由于  $c_{0}$  是  $l^{\infty}$  的真子空间，因而  $c_{0}$  并不自反。从  $c_{0}$  不自反的事实可知  l  和  $l^{\infty}$  均不自反。

statement: There exists a closed convex subset in L[0,1], which contains infinitely many elements with minimum norm.
chinese_statement: L[0，1]  中的一个闭凸子集， 它含有无穷多个最小范数的元素。
rationale: Let $M=\left\{x: x \in L[0,1]\right.$ and $\left.\int_{0}^{1} x(t) dt=1\right\}$. It is not difficult to see that M is a closed convex subset in L[0,1]. For any $x \in M$, by the inequality $1=\int_{0}^{1} x(t) dt \leqslant \int_{0}^{1}|x(t)| dt=\|x\|$, it is known that the elements in M with minimum norm should have their norm being 1, and there are obviously infinitely many elements $x \in M$ that satisfy $\|x\|=1$.
chinese_rationale: 令  $M=\left\{x: x \in L[0，1]\right.$  且  $\left.\int_{0}^{1} x(t) d t=1\right\}$ 。 不难看出，  M  是  L[0，1]  中的一个闭凸子集。 任取  $x \in M$ ， 由不等式$1=\int_{0}^{1} x(t) d t \leqslant \int_{0}^{1}|x(t)| d t=\|x\|$可知，  M  中最小范数的元紊其范数应为 1 ， 而适合  $\|x\|=1$  的元素  $x \in M$  显然有无穷多个。

statement: There exists a bounded self-adjoint operator without eigenvalues.
chinese_statement: 存在没有特征值的有界自伴算子。
rationale: For $x \in L^{2}[0,1]$, let $T x(t)=t x(t)$, then T is a bounded linear operator from $L^{2}[0,1]$ to $L^{2}[0,1]$. Also, $\langle T x, y\rangle=\langle x, T y\rangle$, so T is a self-adjoint operator. Because $R_{\lambda}(T) x(t)=(t-\lambda)^{-1} x(t)$, we have $\sigma(T)=[0,1]$. For $\lambda \in[0,1]$, from the equation $(t-\lambda) x(t)=0$, when $\boldsymbol{t} \neq \lambda$, $x(t)=0$, hence $x=0$. Therefore, $\lambda$ is not an eigenvalue of T. Since $\lambda \in[0,1]$ is arbitrary, T has no eigenvalues.
chinese_rationale: 对  $x \in L^{2}[0,1]$ , 令  $T x(t)=t x(t)$ , 则  T  为  $L^{2}[0,1]$  到  $L^{2}[0,1]$  内的有界线性算子。 又  $\langle T x, y\rangle=\langle x, T y\rangle$ , 故  T  是自伴算子。 因为$R_{\lambda}(T) x(t)=(t-\lambda)^{-1} x(t)$,所以  $\sigma(T)=[0,1]$ 。 对于  $\lambda \in[0,1]$ , 由等式  $(t-\lambda) x(t)=0$  得到当  $\boldsymbol{t} \neq \lambda$  时,  $x(t)=0$ , 从而  $x=0$ 。 因此,  $\lambda$  不是  T  的特征值。 由于  $\lambda \in[0,1]$  是任取的, 故  T  没有特征值。

statement: A non-empty closed convex subset U of a reflexive Banach space with normal structure and a mapping T from U to itself, satisfying $\|T x-T y\| \leqslant K\|x-y\|$, then T must have a fixed point.
chinese_statement: 一个自反 Banach 空间中的具有正规结构 的非空闭凸子集  U , 及由  U  到其自身的映射  T , 适合  $\|T x-T y\| \leqslant K\|x-y\|$  ，则T  一定有不动点。
rationale: Let A be a bounded closed convex set in a Banach space X. $x \in A$ is called a non-diameter point of A if $\sup _{y \in A}\|x-y\|<\operatorname{diam} A $. Let U be a subset of a Banach space X, and U is said to have normal structure if every bounded closed convex subset of U has a non-diameter point. Kirk { }^{[174]} pointed out that the existence of fixed points of non-expansive mappings is related to the geometric properties of the normal structure of the space. He proved that if U is a non-empty bounded closed convex subset with normal structure of a reflexive Banach space, and T is a non-expansive mapping from U to itself, then T has a fixed point. It should be noted that if T is not a non-expansive mapping, then the conclusion of the above proposition does not hold. Kirk has an example as follows: Let U denote the unit closed ball in the space $l^{2}$. It is easy to see that U has a normal structure. Suppose $K>1$, for $x=\left(x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right) \in U$, let $T x=\left(t,(1-\|x\|), x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right)$, where t is a constant ensuring $t<1$ and $0<t \leqslant\left(K^{2}-1\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}$. It is easy to verify that T maps U to itself, and for any $x, y \in U$, there is $\left\|T x-r_{y}\right\| \leqslant K\|x-y\|$. Obviously, T does not have a fixed point.
chinese_rationale: 设  A  是 Banach 空间  X  的有 界闭 凸集，  $x \in A$  称为  A  的非直径点，如果$\sup _{y \in A}\|x-y\|<\operatorname{diam} A $。设  U  为 Banach 空间  X  的子集, 称  U  具有正规结构,如果  U  的每个有界闭凸子集都具有非直径点。Kirk  { }^{[174]}  指出,非扩张映射的不动点存在与空 间的 正 规结构的几何性质有关。他证明了, 若  U  是自反 Banach 空间中的具有正规结构的非空有界闭凸子集,  T  是  U  到其自身的非扩张映射,则  T  有不动点。应当注意,若  T  不是非扩张映射, 则上述命题的结论就不再成立。 Kirk 有例如下:我们用  U  代表空间  $l^{2}$  中的单位闭球，易见，  U  具有正规结构。 设  $K>1$ , 对  $x=\left(x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right) \in U$ , 令$T x=\left(t,(1-\|x\|), x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right)$,其中  t  是常数使  $t<1$  且  $0<t \leqslant\left(K^{2}-1\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}$ 。 易于验证,  T  映  U  到其自身,且对任何  x, $y \in U$ , 都有$\left\|T x-r_{y}\right\| \leqslant K\|x-y\|$ 。显然，  T  没有不动点。

statement: An unconditional basis of a certain Banach space, which is not necessarily boundedly complete.
chinese_statement: 某个 Banach 空间的无条件基, 它不是有界完全的。
rationale: The natural basis $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ in the Banach space $c_{0}$ is unconditional. For the sequence $\left\{\alpha_{i}\right. \left(\alpha_{i}=1, i=1,2, \cdots\right)$, it is evident that $\sup _{n}\left\|\sum_{i \leqslant n} \alpha_{i} e_{i}\right\|=1$, but $\sum_{i \leqslant n} a_{i} e_{i}$ does not converge in $c_{0}$, hence $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is not boundedly complete.
chinese_rationale: Banach 空间  $c_{0}$  中的自然基  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是无条件的。 对于数列  $\left\{\alpha_{i}\right.   \left(\alpha_{i}=1, i=1,2, \cdots\right)$  而言, 显然有$\sup _{n}\left\|\sum_{i \leqslant n} \alpha_{i} e_{i}\right\|=1$但  $\sum_{i \leqslant n} a_{i} e_{i}$  在  $c_{0}$  中并不收敛, 故  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  不是有界完全的。

statement: There exists a column compact collection whose union is not column compact.
chinese_statement: 一个列紧集列， 其并集并不列紧。
rationale: In $(\mathbf{R}^{1})$, every subset $([n, n+1])$ is column compact, but their union $(\bigcup_{n=0}^{\infty}[n, n+1] = [0,+\infty))$ is not column compact.
chinese_rationale: $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  中每个子集  [n， n+1]  都是列紧的， 但其并集  $\bigcup_{n=0}^{\infty}[n， n+1]   =[0，+\infty)$  并不列紧。

statement: A basis in a Banach space, which is not necessarily a normalized basis.
chinese_statement: 一个 Banach 空间中的基, 它不是正规基。
rationale: A basis $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ of a normed linear space X is called normalized if $\left\|x_{n}\right\|=1, n=1, 2, \cdots;$ and is called normalized if $\left\|x_{n}\right\|=\left\|f_{n}\right\|=1, n=1,2, \cdots$, where $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is the sequence of coordinate functionals of $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$. Consider the Banach space $X=C[0,1]$. Let $\begin{array}{l}x_{0}(t)=1, x_{1}(t)=t, \\x_{2^{k}+l}(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}0, & t \notin\left(\frac{2 l-2}{2^{k+1}}, \frac{2 l}{2^{k+1}}\right), \\1, & t=\frac{2 l-1}{2^{k+1}} \\\text { linearly, } & t \in\left[\frac{2 l-2}{2^{k+1}}, \frac{2 l-1}{2^{k+1}}\right] \\& \text { or } t \in\left[\frac{2 l-1}{2^{k+1}}, \frac{2 l}{2^{k+1}}\right],\end{array}\right.\end{array}$ where $l=1,2, \cdots, 2^{k}; k=0,1,2, \cdots$. It can be shown that $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ is a basis in $C[0,1]$. Clearly, the sequence of coordinate functionals is $\begin{array}{c}f_{0}(x)=x(0), \quad f_{1}(x)=x(1)-x(0), \\f_{2^{k+l}}(x)=x\left(\frac{2 l-1}{2^{k+1}}\right)-\frac{1}{2} x\left(\frac{2 l-2}{2^{k+1}}\right) \\-\frac{1}{2} x\left(\frac{2 l}{2^{k+1}}\right),\end{array}$ where $x \in \boldsymbol{C}[0,1], l=1,2, \cdots, 2^{k}; k=0,1,2, \cdots$. Since $f_{0}=1, \left\|f_{n}\right\|=2, n=1,2, \cdots$, $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ is not a normalized basis in $C[0,1]$.
chinese_rationale: 赋范线性空间  X  的基  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  称为正规化的, 是指  $\left\|x_{n}\right\|=1, n=1 ,  2, \cdots ;\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  称为正规的, 是指  $\left\|x_{n}\right\|=\left\|f_{n}\right\|=1, n=1,2, \cdots ,$ 其 中  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  的坐标泛函列。考虑 Banach 空间  $X=C[0,1]$ 。 令$\begin{array}{l}x_{0}(t)=1, x_{1}(t)=t, \\x_{2^{k}+l}(t)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}0, & t \notin\left(\frac{2 l-2}{2^{k+1}}, \frac{2 l}{2^{k+1}}\right), \\1, & t=\frac{2 l-1}{2^{k+1}} \\\text { 线性, } & t \in\left[\frac{2 l-2}{2^{k+1}}, \frac{2 l-1}{2^{k+1}}\right] \\& \text { 或 } t \in\left[\frac{2 l-1}{2^{k+1}}, \frac{2 l}{2^{k+1}}\right],\end{array}\right.\end{array}$其中  $l=1,2, \cdots, 2^{k} ; k=0,1,2, \cdots$ 。 可以证明,$\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  是  $C[0,1]$ 中的基 。 显然，坐标泛函列为$\begin{array}{c}f_{0}(x)=x(0), \quad f_{1}(x)=x(1)-x(0), \\f_{2^{k+l}}(x)=x\left(\frac{2 l-1}{2^{k+1}}\right)-\frac{1}{2} x\left(\frac{2 l-2}{2^{k+1}}\right) \\-\frac{1}{2} x\left(\frac{2 l}{2^{k+1}}\right),\end{array}$ 其中  $x \in \boldsymbol{C}[0,1], l=1,2, \cdots, 2^{k} ; k=0,1,2, \cdots$ 。 由于  $f_{0}=1 ,  \left\|f_{n}\right\|=2, n=1,2, \cdots$ , 因而  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  不是  $C[0,1]$  中的正规基。

statement: If $\mathrm{X}$ is a metric linear space, $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset X$ and $x_{n} \rightarrow 0 \quad(n \rightarrow \infty )$, then it follows that $\frac{\sum_{k=1}^{n} x_{k}}{n} \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$ .
chinese_statement: 如果  $\mathrm{X}$  是度量线性空间,  $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset X$  且  $x_{n} \rightarrow 0 \quad(n \rightarrow   \infty  )$, 那么必有  $\frac{\sum_{k=1}^{n} x_{k}}{n} \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$ 。
rationale: Example: Consider the metric linear space $l^{P}(0< p<1 )$, and choose $\alpha>0$ such that $0<p+\alpha p<1$. Let $x_{n}=\left(0, \cdots, 0, \frac{1}{n^{\alpha}}, 0, \cdots\right)$, then $x_{n}\in l^{p}$ and $x_{n}\to 0$, i.e., $（x_{n}，0）= \frac{1}{{n}^{\alpha p}} \to 0(n\to \infty )$. However, we have $\frac{\sum_{k=1}^{n} x_{k}}{n}=\left(\frac{1}{n}, \frac{1}{n \cdot 2^{\alpha}}, \cdots, \frac{1}{n \cdot n^{\alpha}}, 0,0, \cdots\right)$, therefore $\begin{aligned}d\left(\frac{\sum_{k=1}^{n} x_{k}}{n}, 0\right) & =\frac{1}{n^{p}}+\frac{1}{n^{p} 2^{\alpha p}}+\cdots+\frac{1}{n^{p}2^{\alpha p} n^{\sigma p}} \\& \geqslant \frac{n}{n^{p} n^{\alpha p}}=n^{1-(p+\alpha p)} \rightarrow+\infty(n \rightarrow \infty) .\end{aligned}$
chinese_rationale: 例：考虑度量线性空间  $l^{P}(0<   p<1  )$, 并取  $\alpha>0$  使  $0<p+\alpha p<1$ 。 令$x_{n}=\left(0, \cdots, 0, \frac{1}{n^{\alpha}}, 0, \cdots\right)$,则$x_{n}\in l^{p}$且$x_{n}\to 0$，即$（x_{n}，0）= \frac{1}{{n}^{\alpha p}} \to 0(n\to \infty )$。但是我们有$\frac{\sum_{k=1}^{n} x_{k}}{n}=\left(\frac{1}{n}, \frac{1}{n \cdot 2^{\alpha}}, \cdots, \frac{1}{n \cdot  n^{\alpha}}, 0,0, \cdots\right)$,因此$\begin{aligned}d\left(\frac{\sum_{k=1}^{n} x_{k}}{n}, 0\right) & =\frac{1}{n^{p}}+\frac{1}{n^{p}  2^{\alpha p}}+\cdots+\frac{1}{n^{p}2^{\alpha p} n^{\sigma p}} \\& \geqslant \frac{n}{n^{p} n^{\alpha p}}=n^{1-(p+\alpha p)} \rightarrow+\infty(n \rightarrow \infty) .\end{aligned}$

statement: There exists a Banach space whose norm is not Gateaux differentiable.
chinese_statement: 存在基个 Banach 空间, 其范数不 Gateaux 可微。
rationale: The norm on the Banach space $l^{\infty}$ is not G-differentiable. To prove this statement, we take $x_{0}=(1,1,0, \cdots) \in l^{\infty}$, then $\left\|x_{0}\right\|=1$, and for $y=(1,0, 0, \cdots) \in l^{\infty}$, we have $\frac{\left\|x_{0}+\lambda y\right\|-\left\|x_{0}\right\|}{\lambda}=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1, & \lambda>0, \\0, & \lambda<0.\end{array}\right.$ Therefore, $\lim _{\lambda \rightarrow 0} \frac{\left(\left\|x_{0}+\lambda y\right\|-\left\|x_{0}\right\|\right)}{\lambda}$ does not exist, hence the norm on $l^{\infty}$ at $x_{0}$ is not G-differentiable. Note: In fact, it can be further proven that $l^{\infty}$ is not linearly homeomorphic to a Banach space with a G-differentiable norm.
chinese_rationale: Banach 空间  $l^{\infty}$  的范数不是  G  可微的。 为证明这一陈述, 我们只要取  $x_{0}=(1,1,0, \cdots) \in l^{\infty}$ , 则  $\left\|x_{0}\right\|=1$ , 且对于  $y=(1,0 ,  0, \cdots) \in l^{\infty}$  ，有$\frac{\left\|x_{0}+\lambda y\right\|-\left\|x_{0}\right\|}{\lambda}=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1, & \lambda>0, \\0, & \lambda<0 .\end{array}\right.$因此,  $\lim _{\lambda \rightarrow 0} \frac{\left(\left\|x_{0}+\lambda y\right\|-\left\|x_{0}\right\|\right)}{\lambda}$  不存在, 故  $l^{\infty}$  的范数在  $x_{0}$  处不是  G  可微的。注 其实, 还可进一步证明  $l^{\infty}$  不线性同胚于范数  G  可 微 的 Banach 空间。

statement: There exists an infinite matrix $\left(\alpha_{i j}\right)$ satisfying $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \sum_{j=1}^{\infty}\left|\alpha_{i j}\right|^{2}=+\infty$, but the operator $\boldsymbol{y}=\boldsymbol{T} \boldsymbol{x} : \eta_{i}=\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{i j} \xi_{j}\left(x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}, y=\left\{\eta_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}\right)$ is compact.
chinese_statement: 存在无穷阵  $\left(\alpha_{i j}\right)$  适 合  $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \sum_{j=1}^{\infty}\left|\alpha_{i j}\right|^{2}=+\infty$ , 而算子  $\boldsymbol{y}=\boldsymbol{T} \boldsymbol{x}  :  \eta_{i}=\sum_{j=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{i j} \xi_{j}\left(x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}, y=\left\{\eta_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}\right)$  却是紧的。
rationale: Example: Consider the infinite matrix $\left(\begin{array}{cccc}1 & & & 0 \\& \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} & & \\& & \ddots & \\& 0 & \frac{1}{\sqrt{i}} \\& & & \ddots\end{array}\right)$. Clearly $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \sum_{j=1}^{\infty}\left|\alpha_{i j}\right|^{2}=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{i}=+\infty$. On the other hand, for any $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}$, we have $\eta_{n}=\frac{\xi_{n}}{\sqrt{n} }$, thus $y=\left\{\eta_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}$, and the operator T determined by the equation $y=T x$ is a bounded linear operator from $l^{2}$ to $l^{2}$. To prove that T is compact, take any bounded set A in $l^{2}$, i.e., there exists a constant M such that for any $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in A$, we have $\|x\|=\left\{\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{2}\right\}^{\frac{1}{2}} \leqslant M$. Since $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{\sqrt{n}}=0$, for any $\varepsilon>0$, there exists a positive integer $n_{0}$ such that when $n>n_{0}$, $\frac{1}{\sqrt{n}}<\frac{\varepsilon}{M}$, thus $\left(\sum_{n=n_{0}+1}^{\infty}\left|\frac{\xi_{n}}{\sqrt{n}}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}<\frac{\varepsilon}{M}\left(\sum_{n=n_{0}+1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}} \leqslant \varepsilon$. This shows that the element $\left(\eta_{1}, \cdots, \eta_{n_{0}}, 0, \cdots\right)$ formed by the first $n_{0}$ coordinates of $y=T x(x \in A)$ constitutes a $\varepsilon$-net of the set $T(A)$. Since B is a bounded set in a finite-dimensional subspace of $l^{2}$, B is relatively compact. Thus, $T(A)$ has a relatively compact $\boldsymbol{\varepsilon}$ net, and since the space $l^{2}$ is complete, $T(A)$ is relatively compact, i.e., T is a compact operator.
chinese_rationale: 例：考虑无穷阵$\left(\begin{array}{cccc}1 & & & 0 \\& \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} & & \\& & \ddots & \\& 0 & \frac{1}{\sqrt{i}} \\& & & \ddots\end{array}\right)$显然$\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \sum_{j=1}^{\infty}\left|\alpha_{i j}\right|^{2}=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{i}=+\infty$ 。另一方面, 任取  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}$ , 则  $\eta_{n}=\frac{\xi_{n}}{\sqrt{n} }$ , 因此,  $y=\left\{\eta_{n}\right\} \in   l^{2}$ , 而且由等式  $y=T x$  确定的算子  T 是  $l^{2}$  到  $l^{2}$  内的有界线性算子。 兹证  T  是紧的。 为此, 任取  $l^{2}$  中的有界集  A , 即存在常数  M ,使对任何  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in A$ , 都有$\|x\|=\left\{\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{2}\right\}^{\frac{1}{2}} \leqslant M$由于  $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \frac{1}{\sqrt{n}}=0$ , 故对任意  $\varepsilon>0$ , 存在正整数  $n_{0}$ , 当  $n>n_{0}$  时就有  $\frac{1}{\sqrt{n}}<\frac{\varepsilon}{M}$ , 从而$\left(\sum_{n=n_{0}+1}^{\infty}\left|\frac{\xi_{n}}{\sqrt{n}}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}<\frac{\varepsilon}{M}\left(\sum_{n=n_{0}+1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}} \leqslant \varepsilon$ 。这就说明了  $y=T x(x \in A)$  的前  $n_{0}$  个坐标  $\eta_{1}, \cdots, \eta_{n_{0}}$  作成的元素  $\left(\eta_{1}, \cdots, \eta_{n_{0}}, 0, \cdots\right)$  的全体  B  构成集合  $T(A)$  的一个  $\varepsilon$  网。 因为  B  是  $l^{2}$  中的一个有限维子空间中的有界集,故  B  是列紧的, 即  $T(A)$  存在列紧的  $\boldsymbol{\varepsilon}  $网,而空间  $l^{2}$  是完备的, 从而  $T(A)$  是列 紧集，即  T  是紧算子。

statement: Elements that belong to $l^{p}$ but not to $l^{r}(1 \leqslant r<p<+\infty)$.
chinese_statement: 属于  $l^{p}$  而不属于  $l^{r}(1 \leqslant r<p<+\infty)$  的元素。
rationale: Let $x=\left(1, \frac{1}{2^{\frac{1}{r}}}, \frac{1}{3^{\frac{1}{r}}}, \cdots, \frac{1}{n^{\frac{1}{r}}}, \cdots\right)$, since $\frac{p}{r}>1$, the series $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n^{\frac{p}{r}}}$ converges, thus $x \in l^{p}$. However, since the series $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n}$ diverges, $x \notin l^{r}$.
chinese_rationale: 设  $x=\left(1， \frac{1}{2^{\frac{1}{r}}}， \frac{1}{3^{\frac{1}{r}}}， \cdots， \frac{1}{n^{\frac{1}{r}}}， \cdots\right)$ ， 因  $\frac{p}{r}>1$ ， 故级数  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n^{\frac{p}{r}}}$  收敛， 从而  $x \in l^{p}$ 。 然而， 由于级数  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n}$  发散， 因而  $x \notin l^{r}$ 。

statement: Non-commutative continuous linear operators.
chinese_statement: 不可换的连续线性算子。
rationale: For $x \in L^{2}[0,1]$, let $A x(t)=t x(t)$, $B x(t)=\int_{0}^{1} t s x(s) d s$. It is easy to see that both A and B are continuous linear operators from $L^{2}[0,1]$ to $L^{2}[0,1]$, and $\begin{array}{l}A B x(t)=t^{2} \int_{0}^{1} s x(s) d s, \\B A x(t)=t \int_{0}^{1} s^{2} x(s) d s .\end{array}$ Therefore, $A B \neq B A$.
chinese_rationale: 对  $x \in L^{2}[0，1] ， 令  A x(t)=t x(t)$ ，$B x(t)=\int_{0}^{1} t s x(s) d s$ .易见，  A  与  B  都是由  $L^{2}[0，1]$  到  $L^{2}[0，1]$  的连续线性算子， 且$\begin{array}{l}A B x(t)=t^{2} \int_{0}^{1} s x(s) d s， \\B A x(t)=t \int_{0}^{1} s^{2} x(s) d s .\end{array}$因此，  $A B \neq B A$ .

statement: There exists a non-reflexive normed linear space.
chinese_statement: 存在非次自反的赋范线性空间。
rationale: The set of all polynomials on the closed interval $[0,1]$ as a subspace of the Banach space $C[0,1]$ is incomplete, and it is obviously not reflexive. Note: It is easy to prove that dense subspaces of a Hilbert space are reflexive. The above counterexample shows that dense subspaces of a Banach space need not be reflexive.
chinese_rationale: 闭区间  [0,1]  上的多项式的全体作为 Banach 空间  C[0,1]  的子空间是不完备的, 它显然不是次自反的。注： 容易证明,Hilbert 空间的稠密子空间都是次自反的。 上述反例说明了 Banach 空间的稠密子空间不必是次自反的。

statement: Spectral Mapping Theorem: Let X be a complex Banach space, $T \in L(X)$, p be a polynomial, then $p(\sigma(T))=\sigma(p(T))$. There exist bounded linear operators for which the spectral mapping theorem does not hold.
chinese_statement: 谱映射定理： 设  X  是复 Banach 空间，  $T \in L(X)$， p  是多项式， 则  $p(\sigma(T))=\sigma(p(T))$  。存在谱映射定理不成立的有界线性算子。
rationale: For example: for $ \left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right) \in \mathbb{R}^{2}$, let $ T\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right)=\left(-x_{2}, x_{1}\right)$, then $\sigma(T)=\varnothing$. On the other hand, let $p(t)=t^{2}$, since $T^{2}$ has eigenvalue -1, the spectral mapping theorem does not hold.
chinese_rationale: 例如：对 $ \left(x_{1}， x_{2}\right) \in \mathbb{R}^{2}$ ， 令 $ T\left(x_{1}， x_{2}\right)=\left(-x_{2}， x_{1}\right)$ ， 则  $\sigma(T)=\varnothing$ 。 另一方面， 令  $p(t)=t^{2}$ ， 则因  $T^{2}$  有特征值 -1 ， 故谱映射定理不成立。

statement: There exist operators A, B, C such that $AB - BA = C$ and $BC = CB$, but $C \neq 0$.
chinese_statement: 存在算子  A, B, C , 使  $A B-B A=C$  且  $B C=C B$ , 但  $C \ne 0$ 。
rationale: Let $A = \left(\begin{array}{ll}2 & 0 \\0 & 1\end{array}\right), B = \left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 1 \\0 & 1\end{array}\right), \quad C = \left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 1 \\0 & 0\end{array}\right)$, then $AB - BA = C$ and $BC = CB$. However, $C \neq 0$.
chinese_rationale: 设$A=\left(\begin{array}{ll}2 & 0 \\0 & 1\end{array}\right), B=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 1 \\0 & 1\end{array}\right), \quad C=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 1 \\0 & 0\end{array}\right)$,则  $A B-B A=C$  且  $B C=C B$ 。 然而  $C \neq 0$ 。

statement: There exists a set in some conjugate space that is $weak^{*}$ sequentially compact but not weakly sequentially compact.
chinese_statement: 存在某个共轭空间中弱$^{*}$序列紧而不弱序列紧的集合。
rationale: Let X be the sequence space c. Since X is separable, the closed unit ball in $X^{*}=l$ is $weak^{*}$ sequentially compact. We now show that the closed unit ball in $X^{*}$ is not weakly sequentially compact. Otherwise, since the strong and weak convergences of sequences in the space l are equivalent, the closed unit ball in l would also be sequentially compact, which contradicts the fact that l is an infinite-dimensional normed linear space.
chinese_rationale: 设  X  为序列空间  c 。 因  X  可分, 故  $X^{*}=l$  内的单位闭球是弱^{*}序列紧的。兹证  $X^{*}$  内的单位闭球不是弱序列紧的。如若不然, 则由空间  $l$ 中点列的强收敛性与弱收敛性是等价的, 便得到  $l$  中的单位闭球也是序列紧的,这与  $l$  是无穷维赋范线性空间发生矛盾。

statement: There exists a weakly continuous function defined on $[0,1]$ valued in the space $l^{2}$, which is nowhere strongly continuous on the Cantor set in $[0,1]$.
chinese_statement: 存在定义在  [0,1]  上而取值于空间  $l^{2}$  中的一个弱连续函数, 它在  [0,1]  中的 Cantor 集上无处强连续。

statement: The square of a hyponormal operator must be a hyponormal operator.
chinese_statement: 双正规算子其平方必是双正规算子。
rationale: Let $T=\left(\begin{array}{rrr}0 & 0 & 1 \\1 & 1 & 0 \\1 & -1 & 0\end{array}\right)$, it is easy to verify that T is a hyponormal operator, but $T^{2}$ is not a hyponormal operator. Note: Campbell constructed a hyponormal and subnormal operator T, for which $T^{2}$ is not a hyponormal operator.
chinese_rationale: 设$T=\left(\begin{array}{rrr}0 & 0 & 1 \\1 & 1 & 0 \\1 & -1 & 0\end{array}\right)$不难验证,  T  是双正规算子而 $T^{2}$不是双正规算子。注： Campbell  构造了一个双正规且是亚正规的算子  T , 使$T^{2}$不是双正规算子。

statement: There exists a non-discrete complete metric on the set of irrational numbers, making it a complete separable space.
chinese_statement: 无理数集上存在非离散的完备距离， 使其成为完备的可分空间。
rationale: As is well known, the set of irrational numbers with the usual metric is an incomplete separable space. This raises the question: does there exist a non-discrete complete metric on the set of irrational numbers, making it a complete separable space? We point out that the answer to this question is affirmative. Let $\mathrm{Q}$ be the set of rational numbers, $\mathrm{Q}=\left\{r_{i}\right\}$, for $x, y \in \mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathrm{Q}$, let $d(x, y)=|x-y|+\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} 2^{-i}\times \inf \left\{1,\left|\max _{j \leqslant i} \frac{1}{\left|x-r_{j}\right|}-\max _{j\leqslant i} \frac{1}{\left|y-r_{j}\right|}\right|\right\}$. Then $d$ is a metric on $\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}$, and $\left(\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathrm{Q}, d\right)$ is clearly not a discrete space. For any sequence $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset\left(\mathbf{R}^1 \backslash Q, d\right)$, if it converges to some rational number $r_{k}$ with the usual metric on $\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash Q$, then for each $x_{n}$, there exists $x_{m}, m>n$, such that $d\left(x_{n}, x_{m}\right) \geqslant\left|x_{n}-x_{m}\right|+2^{-k}$, hence $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ cannot be a Cauchy sequence in the metric space $\left(\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}, d\right)$. Therefore, $\left(\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}, d\right)$ is complete. The set of all irrational numbers of the form $\pi+q(q \in \mathbf{Q})$ is clearly dense in $\left(\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}, d\right)$, so $\left(\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}, d\right)$ is separable.
chinese_rationale: 如所周知， 在无理数集上取通常距离后， 它是一个不完备的可分空间。 于是便产生问题：在无理数集上是否存在非离散的完备距离， 使其成为完备的可分空间? 我们指出， 这个问题的答案是肯定的。设  $\mathrm{Q}$  为有理数集，  $\mathrm{Q}=\left\{r_{i}\right\}$  ，对  $x， y \in \mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathrm{Q}$ ， 令$d(x， y)=|x-y|+\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} 2^{-i}\times \inf \left\{1，\left|\max _{j \leqslant i} \frac{1}{\left|x-r_{j}\right|}-\max _{j\leqslant i} \frac{1}{\left|y-r_{j}\right|}\right|\right\}$则  d  是  $\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}$  上的一个距离， 且  $\left(\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}， d\right)$  显然不是离散空间。任取数列  $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset\left(\mathbf{R}^1 \backslash Q， d\right)$ ， 如果它依  $\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash Q$  上的通常距离收敛于某个有理数  $r_{k}$ ， 则对每一  $x_{n}$ ， 存在  $x_{m}， m>n$ ， 使$d\left(x_{n}， x_{m}\right) \geqslant\left|x_{n}-x_{m}\right|+2^{-k}$，故  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  不可能是度量空间  $\left(\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}， d\right)$  中的 Cauchy 点列。 因此，  $\left(\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}， d\right)$  是完备的。形如  $\pi+q(q \in \mathbf{Q})$  的无理数的全体在  $\left(\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}， d\right)$  中显然是稠密的， 故  $\left(\mathbf{R}^{1} \backslash \mathbf{Q}， d\right)$  是可分的。

statement: There exists a set in the conjugate space that is $weak^{*}$ bounded but not weakly bounded.
chinese_statement: 存在共轭空间中弱$^{*}$有界而不弱有界的集合。
rationale: Let X be a normed linear space, and A be a subset of $X^{*}$. It is easy to prove that if A is weakly bounded, i.e., it is bounded in the topological linear space $\left(X^{*}, \sigma\left(X^{*}, X^{* *}\right)\right)$, then it must also be $weak^{*}$ bounded. If X is a Banach space, then by the Banach-Alaoglu theorem, a $weak^{*}$ bounded set must be weakly bounded. However, when X is incomplete, a $weak^{*}$ bounded set in $X^{*}$ may not be weakly bounded. For example, on the linear space $E^{\infty}$, defining the norm $\|x\|=\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right| \quad\left(x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in E^{\infty}\right)$, then $E^{\infty}$ is an incomplete normed linear space. $f_{n}(x)=n \xi_{n}, n=1,2, \cdots$, then $f_{n} \in\left(E^{\infty}\right)^{*}$. For any $x \in E^{\infty}$, since $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} f_{n}(x)=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} n \xi_{n}=0$, there exists a constant M (M depends on x) such that $\left|f_{n}(x)\right| \leqslant \ M, \quad n=1,2, \cdots$. Hence, for any sequence $\left\{\lambda_{n}\right\}$ tending to 0, $\left\{\lambda_{n} f_{n}\right\}$ weakly$^{*}$ converges to 0, so $A=\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is $weak^{*}$ bounded. On the other hand, since $\left(E^{\infty}\right)^{*}=l$, it follows from the definition of $f_{n}$ that $f_{n}$ can be expressed in the following form: $f_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0, n, 0, \cdots) \in l$. Now take $\lambda_{n}=\frac{1}{n}$, then for $F=(1,1, \cdots) \in\left(E^{\infty}\right)^{* *}=l^{\infty}$, we have $F \left(  \lambda_{n} f_{n}\right)=1$, i.e., $\left\{\lambda_{n} f_{n}\right\}$ does not weakly converge to 0, so $A=\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is not weakly bounded.
chinese_rationale: 设  X  为一赋范线性空间，  A  为  $X^{*}$  的子集。 容易证明，若  A  是弱有界集，即它是拓扑线性空间  $\left(X^{*}， \sigma\left(X^{*}， X^{* *}\right)\right)$  中的有界集，则它亦必是$弱^{*}$有界的。 若  X  是 Banach 空间， 则由共鸣定理 可知， $弱^{*}$有界集必是弱有界集。 然而， 当  X  不完备时，  $X^{*}$  中的$弱^{*}$有界集未必是弱有界的。 例如， 在线性空间  $E^{\infty}$  上定义范数$\|x\|=\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right| \quad\left(x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in E^{\infty}\right)$，则  $E^{\infty}$  为一不完备的赋范线性空间。$f_{n}(x)=n \xi_{n}， n=1，2， \cdots$，则  $f_{n} \in\left(E^{\infty}\right)^{*}$ 。 任取  $x \in E^{\infty}$ ， 由于$\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} f_{n}(x)=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} n \xi_{n}=0$，故存在常数  M(M  依赖于  x) ， 使$\left|f_{n}(x)\right| \leqslant \ M， \quad n=1，2， \cdots$ 。因此， 对于趋于 0 的任何数列  $\left\{\lambda_{n}\right\}，\left\{\lambda_{n} f_{n}\right\}  弱^{*}$收敛于 0 ， 从而  $A=\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是$弱^{*}$  有界的。另一方面， 由于  $\left(E^{\infty}\right)^{*}=l$ ， 因而由  $f_{n}$  的定义可知，  $f_{n}$  可表成下列形式:$f_{n}=(0， \cdots， 0， n， 0， \cdots) \in l$ 。今取  $\lambda_{n}=\frac{1}{n}$ ， 则对  $F=(1，1， \cdots) \in\left(E^{\infty}\right)^{* *}=l^{\infty}$  而言， 有$F \left(  \lambda_{n} f_{n}\right)=1$，即  $\left\{\lambda_{n} f_{n}\right\}$  并不弱收敛于 0 ， 故  $A=\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  不是弱有界的。

statement: There exists a quotient space of a Banach space X that is not linearly homeomorphic to any subspace of X.
chinese_statement: 存在某个 Banach 空间  X  的商空间， 它 不 线性同胚于  X  的任何一个子空间。
rationale: Take $X=l^{\infty}, M=c_{0}$, then there is no complement subspace of M in X, hence M is not a quotient space of X, which indicates that a quotient space of X may not be linearly homeomorphic to any subspace of X.
chinese_rationale: 取  $X=l^{\infty}， M=c_{0}$ ， 则不存在  M  在  X  中 的可补子空间， 故  M 不是  X  的商空间， 这就说明了  X  的商空间可能不线性同胚于  X  的任何子空间。

statement: There exists an operator whose relative spectrum is the unit circle.
chinese_statement: 存在相对谱是单位圆周的算子。
rationale: For $x=\left(\xi_{0}, \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$, let $U x=\left(0, \xi_{0}, \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right)$, thus T is bounded. Conversely, assume T is bounded, then T has a uniquely determined inverse mapping S, which maps the (closed) range of T onto the whole space. S is a bounded linear mapping, and S can be extended as follows: its value is defined as 0 on the orthogonal complement of the range of T. Thus, the extended operator of S is the left inverse operator of T. Q.E.D. Since the operator U has no eigenvalues, it follows from the lemma that U's relative spectrum and approximate point spectrum are the same, and U's approximate point spectrum is the unit circle (see Example 24), so its relative spectrum is also the unit circle. Note: The concept of relative spectrum was introduced by splund in 1958.
chinese_rationale: 对  $x=\left(\xi_{0}， \xi_{1}， \xi_{2}， \cdots\right) \in l^{2}$ ， 令$U x=\left(0， \xi_{0}， \xi_{1}， \xi_{2}， \cdots\right)$，故  T  下有界. 反之， 设  T  下有界， 则  T  有唯一确定的逆咉射  S ， 它把  T  的(闭)值域射到全空间上。  S  是有界线性映射， 可把  S  作如下扩张：在  T  的值域的直交补上定义其值为 0 。于是，  S  的扩张后的算子就是  T  的左逆算子。 引理证毕。由于算子  U  没有特征值， 故由引理可知，  U  的相对谱与近似点谱是相同的，而  U  的近似点谱是单位圆周 (参看例 24 )， 从而它的相对谱也是单位圆周。注： 相对谱的概念是由 splund   于 1958 年引人的。

statement: Non-closed linear operators with closed range.
chinese_statement: 具有闭的值域的非闭线性算子。
rationale: A linear operator with a closed range does not necessarily need to be closed. For example, let X, Y be Banach spaces, E a dense proper subset of X, T an operator defined on E taking values as 0, then $R(T)$ is clearly a closed set in Y. However, $E \times\{0\}$ is not closed in $X \times Y$, so T is not a closed linear operator.
chinese_rationale: 具有闭的值域的线性算子不必是闭的。例如， 设  X， Y  均为 Banach空间，  E  为  X  的稠密的真子空间，  T  是定义在  E  上而取值为 0的算子， 则  $R(T)$  显然是  Y  中的闭集。 然而，  $E \times\{0\}$  在  $X \times Y$  中不闭，所以  T  不是闭线性算子。

statement: There exist strictly convex but not midpoint locally uniformly convex Banach spaces.
chinese_statement: 存在严格凸而非中点局部一致凸的 Banach 空间。
rationale: Example: For $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in l$, let $x^{\prime}=\left(0, \xi_{2}, \xi_{3}, \cdots\right)$, and define the equivalent norm on l as $\|x\|_{M}==\max \left\{\left|\xi_{1}\right|,\left\|x^{\prime}\right\|_{1}\right\}$. Here, $\|\cdot\|_{1}$ represents the usual norm on l. For $x \in l$, let $I x=x$, then I is a continuous linear operator from l to $l^{2}$. Define the norm on l as $\|x\|_{H}=\left(\|x\|_{M}^{2}+\|I x\|_{w}^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}$. Here, $\|\cdot\|_{w}$ is the norm on $l^{2}$ given in Example 11. It is evident that $\left\|_{1}\right\|_{H}$ is an equivalent norm on l and is strictly convex. We will demonstrate that $\|\cdot\|_{H}$ is not midpoint locally uniformly convex. To this end, let $\alpha=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}, \boldsymbol{x}=\alpha e_{1}, x_{n}=\alpha\left(e_{1}+e_{n}\right), y_{n}=\alpha\left(e_{1}-e_{n}\right)$, then $\|x\|_{H}=1,\left\|x_{n}\right\|_{H} \rightarrow 1, \left\|y_{n}\right\|_{H} \rightarrow 1,\left\|2 x-\left(x_{n}+y_{n}\right)\right\|_{H} \rightarrow 0$, while $\left\|x_{n}-y_{n}\right\|_{H} \rightarrow \alpha \sqrt{8}$. Therefore, $\|\cdot\|_{H}$ is not midpoint locally uniformly convex.
chinese_rationale: 例： 对  $x=\left(\xi_{1}， \xi_{2}， \cdots\right) \in l$ ， 令  $x^{\prime}=\left(0， \xi_{2}， \xi_{3}， \cdots\right)$ ， 并定义  l  上的等价范数$\|x\|_{M}==\max \left\{\left|\xi_{1}\right|，\left\|x^{\prime}\right\|_{1}\right\}$这里，  $\|\cdot\|_{1}$  代表  l  上的通常范数。 好  $x \in l$ ， 令  $I x=x$ ， 则  I  是由  l 到  $l^{2}$  内的连续线性算子。 在  l  上定义范数$\|x\|_{H}=\left(\|x\|_{M}^{2}+\|I x\|_{w}^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}$这里，  $\|\cdot\|_{w}$  是例 11 中给出的  $l^{2}$  上的范数。 易见，  $\left\|_{1}\right\|_{H}$  是  l  上的等价范数且是严格凸的。兹证  $\|\cdot\|_{H}$  不是中 点局部一致凸的。 为此， 令  $\alpha=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} ，  \boldsymbol{x}=\alpha e_{1}， x_{n}=\alpha\left(e_{1}+e_{n}\right)， y_{n}=\alpha\left(e_{1}-e_{n}\right)$ ， 则  $\|x\|_{H}=1，\left\|x_{n}\right\|_{H} \rightarrow 1 ，  \left\|y_{n}\right\|_{H} \rightarrow 1，\left\|2 x-\left(x_{n}+y_{n}\right)\right\|_{H} \rightarrow 0$ ， 而  $\left\|x_{n}-y_{n}\right\|_{H} \rightarrow \alpha \sqrt{8}$ 。 因此，  $\|\cdot\|_{H}$  不是中点局部一致凸的。

statement: There exists a mappings that map each subset to a countably compact nowhere continuous mapping.
chinese_statement: 映每个子集为列紧集的无处连续映射。
rationale: Let $X=Y=\mathbf{R}^{1}, f(x)=1$, x be a rational number; $f(x)=0, x$ be an irrational number, then $f$ maps each subset of $X$ to a set in $Y$ with at most two points. Therefore, $f$ is a countably compact mapping, but $f$ is nowhere continuous.
chinese_rationale: 设  $X=Y=\mathbf{R}^{1}， f(x)=1$， x  为有理数;  $f(x)=0， x  为无理数，则  f  映  X  中的每个子集为  Y  中至多仅有两个点之集。 因此，  f  是一个列紧映射， 但  f  是无处连续的。

statement: There exists a Banach space X such that the $weak^{*}$ convergence and weak convergence of sequences in $X^{*}$ coincide, but the $weak^{*}$ compactness and weak compactness of point sets in $X^{*}$ do not coincide.
chinese_statement: 存在某个 Banach 空间  X , 使  $X^{*}$  中点列的弱$^{*}$收敛与弱收敛相一致, 但  $X^{*}$  中点集的弱$^{*}$紧与弱紧并不一致。
rationale: Let X be the Banach space $l^{\infty}$, then the $weak^{*}$ convergence and weak convergence of sequences in $X^{*}$ coincide. On the other hand, the weak sequential compactness and weak compactness of point sets in $X^{*}$ coincide, but the closed unit ball $U^{*}=\left\{f \in X^{*}: \| f \| \leqslant 1\right\}$ in $X^{*}$ is $weak^{*}$ compact but not $weak^{*}$ sequentially compact. Therefore, $U^{*}$ is $weak^{*}$ compact but not weak compact.
chinese_rationale: 设  X  是 Banach 空间  $l^{\infty}$ , 则  $X^{*}$  中点列的弱^{*}收敛与弱收敛是一致的。另一方面,  $X  ^{*}$中点集的弱序列紧与弱紧是一致的，但  $X ^{*}$  中的单位闭球  $U^{*}=\left\{f \in X^{*}: \| f \| \leqslant 1\right\}$  是弱^{*}紧而不弱^{*}序列 紧的。因此,  $U^{*}$  是弱^{*}紧而不是弱紧的。

statement: There exists a Banach space that is weakly sequentially complete but not reflexive.
chinese_statement: 存在弱序列完备而不自反的 Banach 空间。
rationale: For example, the Banach space $L[a, b]$ is not reflexive, but it is weakly sequentially complete.
chinese_rationale: 例如，Banach 空间  $L[a， b]$  并不自反，但它是弱序列完备的 。

statement: There exist two disjoint bounded closed sets whose distance is zero.
chinese_statement: 存在两个不相交的有界闭集, 它们之间的距离等于零。
rationale: Let $X=(0,1) \cup(1,2)$, with the usual distance $d(x, y)=|x-y|$ on X, $\boldsymbol{x}, y \in X$, then X is a metric space. It is evident that (0,1) and (1,2) are two disjoint bounded closed sets in X, yet their distance is zero.
chinese_rationale: 设$X=(0,1) \cup(1,2)$ , 在  X  上取通常距离  $d(x, y)=|x-y|$ ,  $\boldsymbol{x}, y \in X $, 则  X  为一度量空间。易见,  (0,1)  与  (1,2)  是  X  中的两个不相交的有界闭集，然而它们之间的距离等于零。

statement: There exists a normed linear space X and $f \in X^{*}$, but there does not exist any $x \in X$ such that $\|x\|=1$ and $f(x)=\|f\|$.
chinese_statement: 某个赋范线性空间  X  与  $f \in X^{*}$ ， 而不存在  $x \in X$ ， 使  $\|x\|=1$ 且  $f(x)=\|f\|$ 。
rationale: According to the Hahn-Banach theorem, if X is a normed linear space and $x \in X, x \neq 0$, then there exists an $f \in X^{*}$ such that $\|f\|=1$ and $f(x)=\|x\|$. It is noteworthy that the dual proposition does not hold, i.e., given $f \in X^{*}, f \neq 0$, there does not necessarily exist any $x \in X$ such that $\|x\|= 1$ and $f(x)=\|f\|$. For example, for $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c$, let $f(x)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}(-1)^{n} \frac{\xi_{n}}{n!}$. It is clear that f is a continuous linear functional on c, i.e., $f \in c^{*}$. Suppose $x \in c$ such that $\|x\|=\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right| \leqslant 1$, then $|f(x)| \leqslant \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}$, thus $\|f\| \leqslant \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}$. (1) On the other hand, for any positive integer m, let $x=\left(-1,1,-1,1, \cdots,(-1)^{m}, 0,0, \cdots\right)$, where $(-1)^{m}$ is the m-th term, then $x \in c$ and $\|x\|=1$. At this time, $|f(x)|=\sum_{n=1}^{m} \frac{1}{n!}$, thus $\|f\| \geqslant \sum_{n=1}^{m} \frac{1}{n!}$. Since m is any positive integer, $\|f\| \geqslant \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}$. (2) From (1) and (2), we obtain $\|f\|=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}$. This proves that there does not exist any $x \in c$ such that $\|x\|=1$ and $f(x)=\|f\|$. To prove this, assume any $x= \left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c$ and $\|x\| \leqslant 1$, then for any n, $\left|\xi_{n}\right| \leqslant 1$. If $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \xi_{n}=\xi$ and $|\xi|<1$, then for sufficiently large n, $\left|\xi_{n}\right|<1$, thus $|f(x)|=\left|\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}(-1)^{n} \frac{\xi_{n}}{n!}\right|<\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}=\|f\|$. If $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \xi_{n}=\xi$ and $\xi=1$, then there exists a positive integer $n_{0}$ such that $n \geqslant n_{0}$ implies $\xi_{n}>0$, thus $\sum_{n=n_{0}}^{\infty}(-1)^{n} \frac{\xi_{n}}{n!}$ is an alternating series, therefore $|f(x)|<\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}=\|f\|$. Similarly, if $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \xi_{n}=\xi$ and $\xi=-1$, then $|f(x)|<\|f\|$. In conclusion, for any $x \in c,\|x\| \leqslant 1$, always $|f(x)|<\|f\|$, i.e., there does not exist any $x \in c$ such that $\|x\|=1$ and $|f(x)|=\|f\|$.
chinese_rationale: 由 Hahn-Banach定理可知， 若  X  为一赋范线性空间，  $x \in X， x   \neq 0$ ， 则存在  $f \in X^{*}$ ， 使  $\|f\|=1$  且  $f(x)=\|x\|$ 。 所宜注意的是: 对偶命题并不成立， 即给定  $f \in X^{*}， f \neq 0$ ， 不必存在  $x \in X$ ， 使  $\|x\|=  1$ 且  $f(x)=\|f\|$ 。 例如， 对  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c$ ， 令$f(x)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}(-1)^{n} \frac{\xi_{n}}{n!}$ 。易见，  f  是  c  上的连续线性泛函， 即  $f \in c^{*}$ 。取  $x \in c$ ，使  $\|x\|=\sup _{n}\left|\xi_{n}\right| \leqslant 1$ ， 则$|f(x)| \leqslant \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}$，从而  $\|f\| \leqslant \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}$ 。  (1)另一方面，对任意正整数  m ， 令$x=\left(-1，1，-1，1， \cdots，(-1)^{m}， 0，0， \cdots\right)$ \text {， }其中  (-1)^{m}  是第  m  位上的一个数， 则  $x \in c$  且  $\|x\|=1$ 。 此时有$|f(x)|=\sum_{n=1}^{m} \frac{1}{n!}$，从而  $\|f\| \geqslant \sum_{n=1}^{m} \frac{1}{n!}$ 。 因  m  是任取的正整数，故$\|f\| \geqslant \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}$ 。             (2)由 (1)， (2) 得到  $\|f\|=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}$ 。兹证不存在  $x \in c$ ， 使  $\|x\|=1$  且  $f(x)=\|f\|$ 。 为此， 任取  $x=   \left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c$  且  $\|x\| \leqslant 1$ ， 则对任意  n ， 均有  $\left|\xi_{n}\right| \leqslant 1$ 。 若  $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \xi_{n}=\xi$  而  $|\xi|<1$ ， 则对充分大的  n  有  $\left|\xi_{n}\right|<1$ ， 从而$|f(x)|=\left|\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}(-1)^{n} \frac{\xi_{n}}{n!}\right|<\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}=\|f\| $。若  $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \xi_{n}=\xi$  而  $\xi=1$ ， 则存在正整数  $n_{0}$ ， 当  $n \geqslant n_{0}$  时就有  $\xi_{n}>0$ ， 故  $\sum_{n=n_{0}}^{\infty}(-1)^{n} \frac{\xi_{n}}{n!}$  是一个交错级数，因而也有$|f(x)|<\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n!}=\|f\|$ 。同理， 若  $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \xi_{n}=\xi$  而  $\xi=-1$ ， 则也有  $|f(x)|<\|f\|$ 。总之， 对任意  $x \in c，\|x\| \leqslant 1$ ， 恒有  $|f(x)|<\|f\|$ ， 即不存在  $x \in c$ ， 使  $\|x\|=1$  且  $|f(x)|=\|f\|$ 。

statement: There exists a non-weakly compact operator S such that $0 \leqslant S \leqslant T$, where T is a weakly compact operator.
chinese_statement: 存在某个非弱紧算子  S  适合  $0 \leqslant S \leqslant T$ , 其中  T  为弱紧算子。
rationale: Let $\left\{r_{n}\right\}$ be the Rademacher function system on the interval [0,1], i.e., $r_{n}(t)=\operatorname{sgn sin} 2^{n} \pi t$. Consider the operators S, T from the Banach space $L[0,1]$ to $l^{\infty}$: $\begin{array}{c}S x=\left(\int_{0}^{1} x(t) r_{1}(t) d t, \cdots, \int_{0}^{1} x(t) r_{n}(t) d t, \cdots\right), \\T x=\left(\int_{0}^{1} x(t) d t, \int_{0}^{1} x(t) d t, \cdots\right),\end{array}$ then since the range of T is a 1-dimensional subspace of $l^{\infty}$, it is compact and thus also weakly compact, and $0 \leqslant S \leqslant T$. Here we prove that S is not weakly compact. For this, consider the sequence $u_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0,1,1, \cdots)$ in $l^{\infty}$, where the first n coordinates are all $0, n=1,2, \cdots$. Clearly, it has no subsequence that converges weakly to 0. Now consider the sequence $\left\{x_{k}\right\}$ in L[0,1]: $x_{k}=2^{k} \chi_{[0,2^{-k}]}$, where $\chi_{\left[0,2^{-k}\right]}$ is the characteristic function of the interval $\left[0,2^{-k}\right]$. Clearly, $\left\|x_{k}\right\|_{1}=1, k=1, 2, \cdots$, and a simple calculation yields $S x_{k}=\left(1, \cdots, 1, \frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}, \cdots\right)$, where the first k coordinates are all 1. It is easy to see that the weak limit of any subsequence of $\left\{S x_{k}\right\}$ can only be $e=(1,1, \cdots)$. However, the equality $S x_{k}-e=-\frac{u_{k}}{2}$ shows that $\left\{S x_{k}\right\}$ cannot have a weakly convergent subsequence. That is to say, S is not weakly compact.
chinese_rationale: 设  $\left\{r_{n}\right\}$  是区间  [0,1]  上的 Rademacher函数系, 即$r_{n}(t)=\operatorname{sgn sin} 2^{n} \pi t$ 。考虑由 Banach 空间  $L[0,1]$  到  $l^{\infty}$  的算子  S, T  :$\begin{array}{c}S x=\left(\int_{0}^{1} x(t) r_{1}(t) d t, \cdots, \int_{0}^{1} x(t) r_{n}(t) d t, \cdots\right), \\T x=\left(\int_{0}^{1} x(t) d t, \int_{0}^{1} x(t) d t, \cdots\right),\end{array}$则因  T  的值域是空间  $l^{\infty}$  的 1 维子空间, 故它是紧的, 从而也是弱紧的,且  $0 \leqslant S \leqslant T$ 。兹证  S  不是弱紧的。 为此, 我们考虑空间  $l^{\infty}$  中的点列  $u_{n}=   (0, \cdots, 0,1,1, \cdots)$ , 其中前  n  个坐标均为  $0, n=1,2, \cdots$ 。 显然,它没有弱收敛于 0 的子列。 我们再考虑 空间  L[0,1]  中的点列  $\left\{x_{k}\right\}  :x_{k}=2^{k} \chi_{[0,2-k]}$,其中  $\chi_{\left[0,2^{-k}\right]}$  是区间  $\left[0,2^{-k}\right]$  的特征函数。 显然,  $\left\|x_{k}\right\|_{1}=1, k=1 ,  2, \cdots$ , 且经过简单的计算可得$S x_{k}=\left(1, \cdots, 1, \frac{1}{2}, \frac{1}{2}, \cdots\right)$,其中前  k  个坐标均为 1 。 易见,  $\left\{S x_{k}\right\} $ 的任何子列的弱极限只可能是  $e=(1,1, \cdots)$ 。 然而, 等式$S x_{k}-e=-\frac{u_{k}}{2}$说明了  $\left\{S x_{k}\right\}$  不能有弱收敛的子列。也就是说，S不是弱紧的。

statement: There exists a Banach space with a basis but no symmetric basis.
chinese_statement: 有基而没有次对称基的 Banach 空间。
rationale: The Banach space $L^{p}[0,1](1<p<+\infty, p \neq 2)$ has a basis but no symmetric basis.
chinese_rationale: Banach 空间  $L^{p}[0，1](1<p<+\infty， p \neq 2)$  有基而没有次对称基 。

statement: There exists an inseparable Banach space with a separable infinite-dimensional quotient space.
chinese_statement: 存在不可分的Banach空间， 它有可分的无穷维商空间。
rationale: Since a quotient space of $l^{2}$ is linearly isomorphic to $l^{\infty}$, the inseparable Banach space $l^{\infty}$ has a separable infinite-dimensional quotient space.
chinese_rationale: 因为  $l^{2}$  与  $l^{\infty}$  的一个商空间线性同胚， 所以不可分 Banach 空间  $l^{\infty}$  有可分的无穷维商空间。

statement: There exist normed linear spaces where the closed graph theorem is not valid.
chinese_statement: 闭图象定理不成立的赋范线性空间。
rationale: Closed Graph Theorem: Let T be a linear operator from a second category normed linear space X to a Banach space Y. Then, when T is a closed operator, it is a continuous linear operator. It should be noted that when X is not a second category normed linear space or Y is not a Banach space, the closed graph theorem may not hold. First example: The case where X is not a second category normed linear space. Let $X=\left(C^{1}[0,1],\|x\|=\max_{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1} \mid x(t) \|\right), Y=C[0,1]$, for $x \in X$, let $T x(t)=x^{\prime}(t)$, then T is a linear operator from X to Y and T is closed. However, T is not continuous because if we take $x_{n}(t)=\sin n \pi t \in X$, we have $\left\|T x_{n}\right\|=\left\|\frac{d}{d t} \sin n \pi t\right\|=n \pi \rightarrow \infty(n \rightarrow \infty)$. Second example: The case where Y is not complete. Let X be any infinite-dimensional Banach space, and $H=\left\{h_{a}\right\}$ be a Hamel basis of X. Without loss of generality, assume that the norms of the elements in H are all 1. For any $x \in X$, x can be uniquely expressed as $x=\sum_{i} a_{i} h_{i}$, where $h_{i} \in H, a_{i}$ are all numbers, and the number of terms in the sum is finite. We take another norm on X, $\|x\|_{1}=\sum_{i}\left|a_{i}\right|$, and denote this space as Y. It is not difficult to prove that space Y is not complete. In fact, let $\left\{y_{n}\right\}$ be any infinite sequence in H, and let $s_{n}=\sum_{k=1}^{n} k^{-2} y_{k}$, it is easy to verify that $\left\{s_{n}\right\}$ is a Cauchy sequence in Y, but it does not converge in Y. Let T be the identity operator from X to Y, then T is a closed operator, and since $\|x\|=\left\|\sum_{i} a_{i} h_{i}\right\| \leqslant \sum_{i}\left|a_{i}\right|=\|x\|_{1}$, T has a continuous inverse operator. However, the closed operator T is not continuous because if T were continuous, T would be a linear isomorphism from X to Y, hence both X and Y would be either complete or incomplete, which is a contradiction.
chinese_rationale:
闭图象定理:设  T  是由第二纲的赋范线性 空间  X  到 Banach 空间  Y  内的线性算子。 那么， 当  T  是闭算子时， 它就是连续线性算子。应当注意，当  X  不是第二纲的赋范线性空间或  Y  不是 Banach 空间时，闭图象定理未必成立。第一例: X  不是第二纲赋范线性空间的情形。设  $X=\left(C^{1}[0，1]，\|x\|=\max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1} \mid x(t) \|\right)， Y=C[0，1]$ ， 对  $x \in X$ ，令  $T x(t)=x^{\prime}(t)$ ， 则  T  是由  X  到  Y  内的线性算子， 且  T  是闭的 。 但  T  并不连续， 因为若取  $x_{n}(t)=\sin n \pi t \in X$ ，就有$\left\|T x_{n}\right\|=\left\|\frac{d}{d t} \sin n \pi t\right\|=n \pi \rightarrow \infty(n \rightarrow \infty)$ 。
第二例: Y  不完备的情形。设  X  是任一无穷维 Banach 空 间，  $H=\left\{h_{a}\right\}$  是  X  的一个 Hamel 基。 不妨假定  H  中的元素的范数均为 1 。 对任一  $x \in X$， x 可唯一地表成$x=\sum_{i} a_{i} h_{i}$，这里  $h_{i} \in H， a_{i}$  均为数， 且和式中的项数是有限的。 我们在  X  上取另一范数$\|x\|_{1}=\sum_{i}\left|a_{i}\right|$，记此空间为  Y 。 不难证明， 空间  Y  不完备。 事实上， 设  $\left\{y_{n}\right\}$  是  H  中的任一无穷点列， 令$s_{n}=\sum_{k=1}^{n} k^{-2} y_{k}$，容易验证，  $\left\{s_{n}\right\}$  是  Y  中的 Cauchy 点列， 它在  Y  中并不收敛。设  T  是由  X  到  Y  上的恒等算子， 则  T  是闭算子， 且因  $\|x\|=   \left\|\sum_{i} a_{i} h_{i}\right\| \leqslant \sum_{i}\left|a_{i}\right|=\|x\|_{1}$ ， 可见  T  有连续的逆算子。 然而闭算子  T  并不连续， 因为如果  T  连续， 则  T  将是由  X  到  Y  上的线性同胚映射， 从而  X  与  Y  或者都是完备的，或者都是不完备的， 此为矛盾。

statement: Given a non-zero continuous linear functional f on an infinite-dimensional normed linear space, a countable bounded closed set S can be constructed such that $f(S)$ is not closed.
chinese_statement: 任给无穷维赋范线性空间上的非零连续线性泛函  f ， 可构造一个可数有界闭集  S ， 使  $f(S)$  不闭。
rationale: Let f be a non-zero continuous linear functional on an infinite-dimensional normed linear space X. Let $N=\{x: x \in X, f(x)=0\}$, then N is an infinite-dimensional closed linear subspace of X. Therefore, there exists a sequence of points $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ in the unit closed ball of N, such that $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ has no convergent subsequence. For $y \notin N, S=\left\{x_{n}+\frac{y}{n}: n=1,2, \cdots\right\}$ is a countable bounded closed set in X, but $f(S)=\left\{\frac{f(y)}{n}: n=1,2, \cdots\right\}$ is not closed in the real number space $\mathbf{R}^{1}$.
chinese_rationale: 设  f  是无穷维赋范线性空间  X  上的非零连续线性泛函。 令$N=\{x: x \in X， f(x)=0\}$，则  N  是  X  的一个无穷维的闭线性子空间。 于是， 在  N  的单位闭球中存在点列  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ ， 使  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  中不存在收敛子列。 对于  $y \notin N， S=\left\{x_{n}+\frac{y}{n}: n=1，2， \cdots\right\}$  是  X  中的可数 有界闭集， 但  $f(S)=\left\{\frac{f(y)}{n}: n=1，2， \cdots\right\}$  在实数空间  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  中不是闭的。

statement: A weak Schauder basis for a certain normed linear space, which is not necessarily a basis.
chinese_statement: 某个赋范线性空间的弱 Schauder 基， 它不是基。
rationale: Let X be such a subspace of the real Banach space c, consisting of real sequences that become constant from some term onwards, with the norm of c. Clearly, both c and the conjugate space of X are l. It is easy to see that the sequence of unit vectors $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is a weak Schauder basis for X. Since $x = (1, 1, \cdots) \in X$, which does not belong to the closed linear subspace spanned by $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ in the norm topology, $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ is not a basis for X.
chinese_rationale: 设  X  是实Banach 空间  c  的这样的子空间， 它由从某项开始为常数的实数列所组成， 并用  c  的范数。 显然，  c  和  X  的共轭空间均为  l 。容易看出， 单位向量列  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是  X  的 弱 Schauder 基. 由于  $x   =(1，1， \cdots) \in X$ ， 它不属于  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  按范数拓扑张成的闭线性子空间， 故  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  不是  X  的基。

statement: There exists a basis of a Banach space that is not an unconditional basis.
chinese_statement: 一个 Banach 空间的基, 它不是无条件基。
rationale: Let $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ represent the natural basis in the Banach space $c_{0}$. Define $x_{n}=e_{1}+\cdots+e_{n}=(1, \cdots, 1,0, \cdots)$. Clearly, $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ is a basis of $c_{0}$. On the other hand, since $\begin{aligned}\sum_{i=m}^{m + p} \alpha_{i} x_{i}= & \sum_{i=m}^{m+p} \alpha_{i}\left(\sum_{j=1}^{i} e_{i}\right) \\= & \left(\sum_{i=m}^{m+p} a_{i}\right)\left(\sum_{j=1}^{m} e_{j}\right)+\left(\sum_{i=m+1}^{m+p} \alpha_{i}\right) e_{m+1} \\& +\cdots+\alpha_{m+p} e_{m+p},\end{aligned}$ so $\left\|\sum_{i=m}^{m+p} \alpha_{i} x_{i}\right\|=\sup _{m \leqslant k \leqslant m+p} \left |  \sum_{i=k}^{m+p} a_{i}  \right |$. Therefore, the series $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{i} x_{i}$ converges if and only if the series $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{i}$ converges. If we choose the sequence $\left\{\varepsilon_{i}\right\}$, where $\varepsilon_{i}= \pm 1$, such that $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \varepsilon_{i} \alpha_{i}$ does not converge, then $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \varepsilon_{i} \alpha_{i} x_{i}$ also does not converge. Therefore, the series $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{i} x_{i}$ is not unconditionally convergent, and thus $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ is not an unconditional basis in $c_{0}$.
chinese_rationale: 以  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  代表 Banach 空间  $c_{0}$  中的自然基。 令$x_{n}=e_{1}+\cdots+e_{n}=(1, \cdots, 1,0, \cdots)$ 。 显然,  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  是  $c_{0}$  的基。另 一方面, 因为$\begin{aligned}\sum_{i=m}^{m + p} \alpha_{i} x_{i}= & \sum_{i=m}^{m+p} \alpha_{i}\left(\sum_{j=1}^{i} e_{i}\right) \\= & \left(\sum_{i=m}^{m+p} a_{i}\right)\left(\sum_{j=1}^{m} e_{j}\right)+\left(\sum_{i=m+1}^{m+p} \alpha_{i}\right) e_{m+1} \\& +\cdots+\alpha_{m+p} e_{m+p},\end{aligned}$所以  $\left\|\sum_{i=m}^{m+p} \alpha_{i} x_{i}\right\|=\sup _{m \leqslant k \leqslant m+p} \left |  \sum_{i=k}^{m+p} a_{i}  \right |$ 。于是，级数  $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{i} x_{i}$  收敛当且仅当级数  $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{i}$  收敛。 若取数列  $\left\{\varepsilon_{i}\right\} ,  \varepsilon_{i}= \pm 1$ , 使  $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \varepsilon_{i} \alpha_{i}$  不收敛, 则  $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \varepsilon_{i} \alpha_{i} x_{i}$  也不收敛。 因此, 级数  $\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{i} x_{i}$  并非无条件收敛, 从而  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  不是  $c_{0}$  中的无条件基。

statement: Given a cardinality K, a K-dimensional Hilbert space can be constructed.
chinese_statement: 任给势  K , 可构造一个  K  维的 Hilbert 空间。
rationale: Let Q be a set with cardinality K, then $l^{2}(Q)$ is a Hilbert space. For each $p \in Q$, let $x_{p}$ be a function defined as follows: when $p \neq q$, $x_{p}(q)=0$, and $x_{p}(p)=1$. The set of all $x_{p}$ is an orthonormal basis. Clearly, its cardinality is the same as the cardinality of the set Q. Secondly, the orthonormal set formed by all $x_{\mathrm{p}}$ is complete because if $x \in l^{2}(Q)$, then by the inner product $\langle x, y\rangle=\sum_{q \in Q} x(q) \overline{y(q)}$, we have $\left\langle x, x_{p}\right\rangle=x(p)$, thus by the definition of norm we get $\|x\|^{2}=\sum_{p \in Q}\left|\left\langle x, x_{p}\right\rangle\right|^{2}$.
