Therefore, the orthonormal set $\left\{x_{p}: p \in Q\right\}$ is complete, and thus complete. Hence, $l^{2}(Q)$ is a K-dimensional Hilbert space.
chinese_rationale: 设  Q  为一集，其势为  K , 则  $l^{2}(Q)$  为Hilbert空间。 对每一  $p \in Q$ ,设  $x_{p}$ 是这样定义的函数, 当  $p \neq q$  时,  $x_{p}(q)=0$ , 而  $x_{p}(p)=1$ 。所有  $x_{p}$  的集是一个就范直交集。 显然,它的势与集  Q  的势是相同的。 其次,由所有  $x_{\mathrm{p}}$  构成的就范直交集是完全的，这是因为如果  $x \in l^{2}(Q)$ , 则由内积$\langle x, y\rangle=\sum_{q \in Q} x(q) \overline{y(q)}$可知,  $\left\langle x, x_{p}\right\rangle=x(p)$ , 于是由范数的定义得到$\|x\|^{2}=\sum_{p \in Q}\left|\left\langle x, x_{p}\right\rangle\right|^{2}$ 。因此就范直交集  $\left\{x_{p}: p \in Q\right\}$  是完备的, 从而也是完全的。于 是,  $l^{2}(Q)$  是  K  维的Hilbert 空间。

statement: Riesz operator is necessarily a compact operator.
chinese_statement: Riesz算子一定是紧算子。
rationale: Let $X=l^{2},\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ be an orthonormal basis in X. Define operators A and B on X as follows: $A e_{n}=n^{-1} e_{n}, B e_{2 n-1}=e_{2 n}, B e_{2 n}=0, n=1,2, \cdots$. Clearly, $A \in K(X), B^{2}=0$. Let $T=A+B$, then $T^{2}$ is a compact operator, so T is a Riesz operator. However, T is not a compact operator because $T e_{2 n-1}=(2 n-1)^{-1} e_{2 n-1}+e_{2 n}$, hence $\{T  \left.e_{2 n-1}\right\}$ does not contain a convergent subsequence. This example was given by Gillespie and West.
chinese_rationale: 设  $X=l^{2},\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是  X  中的就范直交系, 定义  X  上的算子  A  与  B 如次:  $A e_{n}=n^{-1} e_{n}, B e_{2 n-1}=e_{2 n}, B e_{2 n}=0, n=1,2, \cdots$ 。 显然,  $A \in K(X), B^{2}=0$ 。 令  $T=A+B$ , 则  $T^{2}$  是紧算子, 因而  T  是 Riesz算子。然而  T  不是紧算子, 这是因为$T e_{2 n-1}=(2 n-1)^{-1} e_{2 n-1}+e_{2 n}$,故$\{T  \left.e_{2 n-1}\right\}$  中不含有收敛子列。这个例子是的 Gillespie 和 West  作出的。

statement: There exists an incomplete second category space.
chinese_statement: 存在不完备的第二纲空间。
rationale: A complete metric space must be of the second category, but the converse is not true. For example, let X be the set of all irrational numbers, and for $ x, y ∈ X$, let $d(x, y) = |x-y|$, then$ (X, d)$ is an incomplete second category metric space. Using a Hamel basis, one can create an incomplete second category linear subspace in any infinite-dimensional Banach space $X$. In fact, let $H$ be a Hamel basis of X, take a countable proper subset $\{h_n\}\subset H$, and let $\begin{array}{c}X_{0}=\operatorname{span}\left\{H \backslash\left\{h_{n}\right\}\right\}, \\X_{n}=\operatorname{span}\left\{H \backslash\left\{h_{k}: k \geqslant n+1\right\}\right\}, n=1,2, \cdots .\end{array}$ Then, it is obvious that $X=\bigcup_{n=0}^{\infty} X_{n}$, and from the completeness of X, it can be known that X is of the second category. Therefore, $X_{n}(n \geqslant 0)$ cannot all be of the first category (since it is clear from the definition that the union of countably many first category sets is still of the first category), so we may assume $X_{n_{0}}$ is a second category linear subspace, and by noticing the definition of second category sets, it can be seen that $\bar{X}_{n_{0}}$ must have an interior point in X, i.e., there exists a ball in X, $B[x_{0}, \delta] \subset \bar{X}_{n_{0}}$. Therefore, the linearity of $\bar{X}_{n_{0}}$ implies $\bar{X}_{n_{0}}=X$. On the other hand, from the definition, it is evident that$ X_{n_{0}} \subset X, X_{n_{0}} \neq X$, so $X_{n} $is not closed, thus $X_{n_{0}}$ is not a complete space. Therefore, the linear subspace $X_{n_{0}} $ of X is as required.
chinese_rationale: 完备度量空间必为第二纲的，其逆不真。例如， 设  X  为无理数全体， 对  x， $y \in X$ ， 令  $d(x， y)=|x-y|$ ， 则  $(X， d)$  就是一个不完备的第二纲的度量空间。利用Hamel基， 可以在任意无穷维 Banach空间  X  内作出不完备的第二纲线性子空间，事实上，设  $H$  是  $X$  的 Hamel 基， 从  $H$ 中取一可数真子集  $\left\{h_{n}\right\} \subset H$ ， 并令$\begin{array}{c}X_{0}=\operatorname{span}\left\{H \backslash\left\{h_{n}\right\}\right\}， \\X_{n}=\operatorname{span}\left\{H \backslash\left\{h_{k}: k \geqslant n+1\right\}\right\}， n=1，2， \cdots 。\end{array}$那么， 显然有  $X=\bigcup_{n=0}^{\infty} X_{n}$ ， 并且由  X  的完备性可知  X  是第二纲的。因此，  $X_{n}(n \geqslant 0)$  不能全为第一纲的 (因为由定义显然可知， 可数个第一纲集之并仍为第一纲的)， 因而不妨设  $X_{n_{0}}$  为第二纲的线性子空间， 并且， 当注意到第二纲集的定义时， 可知  $\bar{X}_{n_{0}}$  在  X  中 必有内点， 即有  X  中一球  $B\left[x_{0}， \delta\right] \subset \bar{X}_{n_{0}}$  。于是， 由  $\bar{X}_{n_{0}} $ 是线性的可 推出  $\bar{X}_{n_{\mathrm{0}}}=X$ 。 另一方面， 由定义我们显然可知  $X_{n_{0}} \subset X， X_{n_{0}} \neq X$ ， 即  $X_{n}$ 不是闭的， 从而  $X_{n_{0}}$  不会是完备空间。 因此，  X  的线性子空间  $X_{n_{0}}$  即为所要求的。

statement: $\left(L^{\infty}[a, b]\right)^{*}$ is not isometrically isomorphic to $L[a, b]$.
chinese_statement: $\left(L^{\infty}[a， b]\right)^{*}  与  L[a， b]$  是等距同构的。
rationale: We know that when $1 \leqslant p < +\infty$, $\left(L^{p}[a, b]\right)^{*}$ is isometrically isomorphic to $L^{q}[a, b]$, where when p > 1, $\frac{1}{p}+\frac{1}{q}=1$, and when p=1, $g=+\infty$. It should be noted that when $p=+\infty$, q=1, this proposition does not hold. To illustrate this fact, we only need to prove that there exists $f \in\left(L^{\infty}[a, b]\right)^{*}$ such that f cannot be represented as an integral of the form $f(x)=\int_{a}^{b} x(t) y(t) dt$ with a fixed $y \in L[a, b]$, where $x \in L^{\infty}[a, b]$. For this purpose, fix a point $t_{0}$ in the interval [a, b], and we can define the functional f for bounded function x(t) by the formula $f(x)=x\left(t_{0}\right)$. Obviously, f is a bounded linear functional on the subspace $C[a, b]$ of $L^{\infty}[a, b]$. Then extend f to a bounded linear functional on the entire space $L^{\infty}[a, b]$. The functional obtained in this way cannot be represented in the required form, even for continuous functions x(t) this is impossible.
chinese_rationale: 我们知道， 当  $1 \leqslant p<+\infty$  时，  $\left(L^{p}[a， b]\right)^{*}$  与  $L^{q}[a， b]$  是等距同构的， 这里， 当  p>1  时，  $\frac{1}{p}+\frac{1}{q}=1$ ， 而 当  p=1  时，  $g=+\infty$ .应当注意的是当  $p=+\infty$， q==1  时，这一命题不 再 成 立。 为说明这一事实， 我们只要证明存在  $f \in\left(L^{\infty}[a， b]\right)^{*}$ ， 使  f  不能表成带有一个固定的  $y \in L[a， b]$  的积分$f(x)=\int_{a}^{b} x(t) y(t) d t$的形式， 其中  $x \in L^{\infty}[a， b]$ . 为此， 在区间  [a， b]  上固定一点  $t_{0}$ ， 我们即可首先对有界函数  x(t)  用公式  $f(x)=x\left(t_{0}\right)$  来定义泛函  f 。显然，  f  是  $L^{\infty}[a， b]$  的子空间  C[a， b]  上的有界 线性泛函。 然后把  f  扩张到整个空间  $L^{\infty}[a， b]$  上的有界线性泛函。 这样 得到的泛函就不可能表成所要求的形式， 甚至仅仅对连续函数  x(t)  来说这也是不可能的。

statement: There exists a bounded closed convex subset in a normed linear space that does not have the fixed point property.
chinese_statement: 存在某个赋范线性空间中的有界闭凸子集, 它没有不动 点性质。
rationale: Consider the Hilbert space $l^{2}(Z)$, where Z is the set of integers. Let $y_{n}=(\cdots, 0,0,1,0,0, \cdots)$, where 1 is at the n-th position. For a point x in $l^{2}(Z)$, it can be written as $\begin{aligned}x & =\left(\cdots, x_{-1}, x_{0}, x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right) \\& =\sum x_{n} y_{n .}\end{aligned}$ Let A be the right shift operator: $A x=\sum x_{n} y_{n+1}$. To construct the required example, first prove the following lemma: the vector $x-A x$ is a multiple of $y_{0}$ only when $x=0$. Proof: the relation $x-A x=\sum\left(x_{n}-x_{n-1}\right) y_{n}=c y_{0}$ requires that for all $n>0$ we have $x_{n}=x_{0}$, and for all $n<0$ we have $x_{n}=x_{-1}$; for an element x in $l^{2}(Z)$, this is only possible when $x_{0}=x_{-1}=0$ and thus $x=0$. Lemma is proved. Now prove that the unit closed ball $B[0,1]$ in $l^{2}(Z)$ does not have the fixed point property. For this, we define the required mapping by $T_{x}=(1-\|x\|) y_{0}+A x$. T is evidently continuous, and since when $\|x\| \leqslant 1$ we have $\begin{aligned}\|T x\| & \leqslant(1-\|x\|)\left\|y_{0}\right\|+\|A x\| \\& =(1-\|x\|)+\|x\|=1,\end{aligned}$, hence T maps $B[0,1]$ into $B[0,1]$. And because if $x=T x=(1-\|x\|) y_{0}+A x$, then $x-A x=(1-\|x\|) y_{0}$. However, this equation is clearly not possible when $x=0$, and by the lemma, it is also impossible when $x \neq 0$. Thus, it is concluded that T has no fixed point.
chinese_rationale: 考虑 Hilbert 空间  $l^{2}(Z)$ ,其中  Z  为整数集。 令$y_{n}=(\cdots, 0,0,1,0,0, \cdots)$,其中 1 在第  n  个位置上。 对于  $l^{2}(Z)$  中的点  x , 可写成$\begin{aligned}x & =\left(\cdots, x_{-1}, x_{0}, x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right) \\& =\sum x_{n} y_{n .}\end{aligned}$记  A  为右移算子:  $A x=\sum x_{n} y_{n+1}$ 。 为构造所需的例子, 先证明下面的引理 向量  $x-A x$  仅当  $x=0$  时才是  $y_{0}$  的倍量。证 关系式$x-A x=\sum\left(x_{n}-x_{n-1}\right) y_{n}=c y_{0}$要求对一切  $n>0$  有  $x_{n}=x_{0}$ , 而对一切  $n<0$  有  $x_{n}=x_{-1}$ ; 对于  $l^{2}(Z)$ 中的元  x , 这只有在  $x_{0}=x_{-1}=0$  从而  $x=0$  时才是可能的, 引理得证。兹证  $l^{2}(Z)$  中的单位闭球  $B[0,1]$  不具有不动点性质。为此,我们通过$T_{x}=(1 \cdots\|x\|) y_{0}+A x$来定义所要的映射。  T  显然是连续的, 且因当  $\|x\| \leqslant 1$  时有$\begin{aligned}\|T x\| & \leqslant(1-\|x\|)\left\|y_{0}\right\|+\|A x\| \\& =(1-\|x\|)+\|x\|=1,\end{aligned}$故  T  映  $B[0,1]$  到  $B[0,1]$  内。 又因若$x=T x=(1-\|x\|) y_{0}+A x$,则  $x-A x=(1-\|x\|) y_{0}$ 。 但此式在  $x=0$  时显然不可 能, 而在  $x \neq 0$  时依引理也是不同能的。 于是断定  T  没有不动点.

statement: There exists a non-strictly convex Banach space X and a closed subspace M, such that the quotient space $X / M$ is uniformly convex.
chinese_statement: 存在一个非严格凸的 Banach空间  X  及闭子空间  M , 使商空间  $X / M$ 是一致凸的。
rationale: Example: Let $X=\mathbf{R}^{3}, M=\left\{m=\left(m_{1}, m_{2}, 0\right): m_{1}, m_{2} \in \mathbf{R}^{1}\right\}$. For $x=\begin{array}{l}\left(x_{1}, x_{2}, x_{3}\right) \in X, \text { define } \\\quad \| x \|=\max \left\{\left|x_{1}\right|,\left|x_{2}\right|,\left|x_{3}\right|\right\},\end{array}$ then $\|x+m\|=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\left|x_{3}\right|, & \left|x_{1}+m_{1}\right|,\left|x_{2}+m_{2}\right| \leqslant\left|x_{3}\right|, \\\max \left\{\left|x_{1}+m_{1}\right|,\left|x_{2}+m_{2}\right|\right\}, & \left|x_{1}+m_{1}\right| \text { or } \\& \left|x_{2}+m_{2}\right|>\left|x_{3}\right| .\end{array}\right.$ Therefore, $\|\tilde{x}\|=\inf \{\|x-m\|: m \in M\}=\left\{x_{3} \mid\right.$. The unit sphere of $X/M$ only has two elements $\tilde{x}_{0}=(0,0,1)+M, \tilde{y}_{0}=(0,0,-1)+M$. Clearly, $\left\|\tilde{x}_{0}+\tilde{y}_{0}\right\|<2$, so $X / M$ is strictly convex. Because in finite-dimensional normed spaces, strict convexity is equivalent to uniform convexity, $X/M$ is also uniformly convex. However, X is not strictly convex, because if $a=(0,0,-1), b=(1,0,1)$, then $\|a\|=\|b\|=1$, but $\|a+b\|=2$.
chinese_rationale: 例:设  $X=\mathbf{R}^{3}, M=\left\{m=\left(m_{1}, m_{2}, 0\right): m_{1}, m_{2} \in \mathbf{R}^{1}\right\}$  。 对  $x=\begin{array}{l}\left(x_{1}, x_{2}, x_{3}\right) \in X, \text { 令 } \\\quad \| x \|=\max \left\{\left|x_{1}\right|,\left|x_{2}\right|,\left|x_{3}\right|\right\},\end{array}$则$\|x+m\|=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\left|x_{3}\right|, & \left|x_{1}+m_{1}\right|,\left|x_{2}+m_{2}\right| \leqslant\left|x_{3}\right|, \\\max \left\{\left|x_{1}+m_{1}\right|,\left|x_{2}+m_{2}\right|\right\}, & \left|x_{1}+m_{1}\right| \text { 或 } \\& \left|x_{2}+m_{2}\right|>\left|x_{3}\right| .\end{array}\right.$因此,  $\|\tilde{x}\|=\inf \{\|x-m\|: m \in M\}=\left\{x_{3} \mid\right.$ 。 $X/M$ 的单位球面上仅有两个元素  $\tilde{x}_{0}=(0,0,1)+M, \tilde{y}_{0}=(0,0,-1)+M$ . 显然,  $\left\|\tilde{x}_{0}+\tilde{y}_{0}\right\|<2$ , 所以  $X / M$  是严格 凸  的。 因为 对于有限维赋范线空间而言，严格凸与一致凸是等价的，所以 $X/M$ 也是一致凸的。但是  X  并不严格凸  ，这是因为若取  $a=(0,0,-1), b=(1,0,1)$ ,则  $\|a\|=\|b\|=1 $, 而  $\|a+b\|=2$  。

statement: There exists a subset A of a metric linear space X, such that for every $f \in X^{*}$, $f(x)=0$ (for any $x \in A$) implies $f(x)=0$ (for any $x \in X$), but $\operatorname{span} A$ is not dense in X.
chinese_statement: 存在某个度量线性空间  X  的子集  A , 使对每一  $f \in X^{*}$ , 都能由  $f(x)=0$(  任意  $x \in A $ )推出  $f(x)=0$(  任意  $x \in X$) , 但  $\operatorname{span} A$  在  X  中并不稠密。
rationale: Example: Take $X=L^{p}[0,1](0<p<1)$, then $X^{*}=\{0\}$, so $A=\{0\}$ has the desired property.

statement: There exists a complete metric space where any subset is both open and closed.
chinese_statement: 任何子集都是既开又闭的完备度量空间。
rationale: Let X be a non-empty set, and define a metric on X: $d(x, y)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1, & x \neq y, \\0, & x=y。\end{array}\right.$ Consider any Cauchy sequence $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset X$. When n is sufficiently large, all $x_{n}$ are the same, so $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ is a convergent sequence in X, meaning X is complete. For any $x \in X$, the open ball centered at x with radius $\frac{1}{2}$ contains only the point x, so every singleton set in Y is an open set. Therefore, from the properties of open sets and the relationship between open and closed sets, we know every subset of X is both open and closed.
chinese_rationale: 设  X  为一非空集合，在  X  上取距离:$d(x, y)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1, & x \neq y, \\0, & x=y。\end{array}\right.$任取 Cauchy 点列  $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset X$ , 则当  n  充分大后各个  x_{n}  均相同, 故  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  是  X  中的收敛点列，即  X  是完备的。任取  $x \in X$ , 因以  x  为球心  $\frac{1}{2}$  为半径的开球只含有点  x , 故  Y 中每一单元素集皆为开集。 于是由开集的性质以及开集与闭集的关系可知,  X  中的每个子集都是既开又闭的。

statement: There exist weakly compactly generated spaces that are neither separable nor reflexive. That is, reflexive spaces are WCG spaces, separable spaces are also WCG spaces, but WCG spaces are neither necessarily reflexive nor separable.
chinese_statement: 存在既不可分也不自反的弱紧生成空间。即自反空间是 WCG 空间，可分空间也是 WCG 空间，而 WCG 空间既不必自反，也不必可分。
rationale: Example: Let $\Gamma$ be an uncountable infinite set, then the Banach space $c_{0}(\Gamma)$ is neither separable nor reflexive since the unit vector set $\left\{e_{r}\right. : r \in \Gamma\}$ is weakly compact and the linear subspace it spans is dense in $c_{0}(\Gamma)$; thus, $c_{0}(\Gamma)$ is a $\mathrm{WCG}$ space.
chinese_rationale: 例：设  $\Gamma$  为一不可数的无限集，则 Banach 空间  $c_{0}(\Gamma)$  既不可分也不自反，由于单位向量集  $\left\{e_{r}\right.  ：  r \in \Gamma\}$  是弱紧的, 且它张成的线性子空间在  $c_{0}(\Gamma)$  中是稠密的, 故  $c_{0}(\Gamma)$  是一个  $\mathrm{WCG}$  空间。

statement: The numerical range $ W(T) = \{\langle T x, x\rangle: \|x\|=1\} $ of a bounded linear operator T in an infinite-dimensional Hilbert space is always closed.
chinese_statement: 无穷维 Hilbert 空间中的有界线性算子  T  的数值值域$  W(T)   =\{\langle T x， x\rangle:\|x\|=1\} $一定是闭的.
rationale: If $ \lambda \in \overline{W(T)}$, such that $|\lambda|=\|T\|$ and $\lambda $ is not an eigenvalue of T (particularly, if T has no eigenvalues), then $\lambda \notin W(T)$. Now, we set out to construct a bounded linear operator T so that W(T) is not closed. First, note that for each operator T, the eigenvalue $ \lambda \in W(T)$, which is because if $T x = \lambda x$ (with \|x\|=1), then $\langle T x, x\rangle=\lambda$, i.e., $ \lambda \in W(T)$. Secondly, let $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$ be a bounded sequence such that for each $ n, \left|a_{n}\right|<\alpha=\sup_{n} \left|\alpha_{n}\right|$. Also, let T be a diagonal operator with diagonal $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$, then each $ \alpha_{n} $ is an eigenvalue of $T^{n}$. Also, since $\|T\|=\sup_{n} \left|\alpha_{n}\right|=\alpha $, and $\alpha_{n} \in W(T) $, it follows that $\alpha \in \overline{W(T)}$. Since $\alpha$ is not an eigenvalue of T, it follows that $\alpha \in W(T) $, i.e., $W\left(T^{P}\right) $ is not a closed set.
chinese_rationale: 若 $ \lambda \in \overline{W(T)}$ ， 使  $|\lambda|=\|T\|$  且  $\lambda $ 不是  T  的特征值 (特别， 若  T  没有特征值)， 则  $\lambda \notin W(T)$ 。现在我们着手构造一个有界线性算子  T ，使  W(T)  不闭。首先注意， 每个算子  T  的特征值$  \lambda \in W(T)$ ， 这是因为若  $T x   =\lambda x$  (具有  \|x\|=1) ， 则  $\langle T x， x\rangle=\lambda$ ， 即 $ \lambda \in W(T)$ 。 其次， 设  $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$ 是有界数列， 使对每一$  n，\left|a_{n}\right|<\alpha=\sup_{n} \left|\alpha_{n}\right|$ 。 又设  T  是具有对角线 $ \left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$  的对角算子， 则每个 $ \alpha_{n} $ 均为 $ T^{n} $ 的特征值。 又由  $\|T\|=\sup_{n}   \left|\alpha_{n}\right|=\alpha $， 而  $\alpha_{n} \in W(T) $， 故  $\alpha \in \overline{W(T)} $。 由于  $\alpha$  不是  T  的特 征值，故  $\alpha \in W(T) $ ，即  $W\left(T^{P}\right) $ 不是闭集。

statement: There exists an infinite matrix, each row and column of which is square-summable, yet it does not correspond to any bounded linear operator on a Hilbert space.
chinese_statement: 存在某个无穷矩阵, 其每一行和每一列都是平方可和的, 但却没有一个 Hilbert 空间上的有界线性算子与之对应。
rationale: Example: For a diagonal matrix where the nth diagonal entry is n, there is no bounded linear operator on a Hilbert space corresponding to it.
chinese_rationale: 例: 对于第  n  对角项是  n  的对角矩阵，就没有一个 Hilbert 空间上的有界线性算子与之对应。

statement: There exists a non-convex set A in some linear space that satisfies $\boldsymbol{A}+\boldsymbol{A}=2 \boldsymbol{A}$.
chinese_statement: 存在某个线性空间中的非凸集 A ，适合 $\boldsymbol{A}+\boldsymbol{A}=2 \boldsymbol{A}$ 。
rationale: It is easy to prove that if A is convex, then it must hold that $A+A=2 A$. However, the equation $A+\boldsymbol{A}=2 A$ does not imply that A is convex. For example, let $\begin{aligned}A= & \left\{(x, y):(x, y) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}, x^{2}+y^{2} \leqslant 1\right\} \\& \backslash\left\{(x, y):(x, y) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}, 0<x \leqslant 1, y=0\right\}. \end{aligned}$ It is easy to see that $A+A=2 A$, but A is not convex.
chinese_rationale: 容易证明， 若  A  是凸集， 则必有  $A+A=2 A$ 。 然而等式  $A+   \boldsymbol{A}=2 A $ 并不蕴涵  A  是凸集。 例如，设$\begin{aligned}A= & \left\{(x， y):(x， y) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}， x^{2}+y^{2} \leqslant 1\right\} \\& \backslash\left\{(x， y):(x， y) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}， 0<x \leqslant 1， y=0\right\}. \end{aligned}$易见，  $A+A=2 A$ ， 但  A  不是凸集。

statement: There exists a subset A of a certain linear space such that $A+A \neq 2A$.
chinese_statement: 存在某个线性空间的子集  A ， 使  $A+A \neq 2 A$ 。
rationale: It is easy to prove that for any subset A of a linear space and numbers $\alpha, \beta$, it always holds that $(\alpha+\beta)A \subset \alpha A + \beta A$. Generally speaking, this inclusion is strict. For example, in $\mathbf{R}^{2}$, let $\begin{array}{l}X=\left\{(x, 0): x \in \mathbf{R}^{1}\right\}, \\Y=\left\{(0, y): y \in \mathbf{R}^{1}\right\},\end{array}$ $A=X \cup Y$, then $A+A=\mathbf{R}^{2}$, while $2A=A$, hence $A+A \neq 2A$.
chinese_rationale: 容易证明，对任何线性空间的子集  A  和数  $\alpha， \beta$ ， 恒有  $(\alpha+\beta)   A \subset \alpha A+\beta A$ 。 一般说来， 这个包含关系是严格的。 例如， 在  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  中，令$\begin{array}{l}X=\left\{(x， 0): x \in \mathbf{R}^{1}\right\}， \\Y=\left\{(0， y): y \in \mathbf{R}^{1}\right\}，\end{array}$ $A=X \cup Y$ ， 则  $A+A=\mathbf{R}^{2}$ ， 而  $2 A=A$ ， 故  $A+A \neq 2 A$ 。

statement: There exists an indecomposable Banach space such that each of its closed subspaces is a weakly compactly generated space.
chinese_statement: 存在某个不可分 Banach 空间， 它的每个闭子空间都是弱紧生成空间。
rationale: John and Zizler proved that if a Banach space X is a WCG space and X has an equivalent Fréchet differentiable norm, then every closed subspace of X is a WCG space. Because $c_{0}(\Gamma)$ is a WCG space and has an equivalent Fréchet norm, every closed subspace of $c_{0}(\Gamma)$ is also a WCG space.
chinese_rationale: John 和 Zizler 证明了， 若 Banach 空间  X  是 WCG 空间，且  X  上具有等价的 Fréchet 可微范数， 则  X  的每个闭子空间都是 WCG 空间。 因为  $c_{0}(\Gamma)$  是 WCG 空间， 且具有等价的 Fréchet 范数， 故  $c_{0}(\Gamma)$  的每个闭子空间都 是 WCG 空间。

statement: There exists a quasi-nilpotent operator T such that 0 does not belong to the numerical range of T.
chinese_statement: 存在某个拟幂零算子  T ， 使 0 不属于  T  的数值值域。
rationale: Let V be the Volterra integral operator on $ L^{2}[0, 1]$: $(V x)(t)=\int_{0}^{t} x(s) d s$. Let $\quad T=I-(I+V)^{-1}=V(I+V)^{-1} $. It can be shown that V is a quasi-nilpotent operator, thus T is also a quasi-nilpotent operator. It is shown that $0 ∉ W(T)$ . To prove this, it is sufficient to show that if x is a vector making $\langle T x, x\rangle=0$, then x=0. In fact, if $\langle T x, x\rangle=0 $, then $\langle x, x\rangle=\left\langle(I+V)^{-1} x, x\right\rangle$. Thus, from $\left\|(I+V)^{-1}\right\|=1 $, we have $\begin{aligned}\|x\|^{2} & =\left\langle(I+V)^{-1} x, x\right\rangle \leqslant\left\|(I+V)^{-1}\right\|\|x\|^{2} \\& =\|x\|^{2} .\end{aligned}$ Therefore, $\|x\|^{2}=\left\langle(I+V)^{-1} x, x\right\rangle=\left\|(I+V)^{-1}\right\|\|x\|^{2}$. From this, we know that x must be an eigenvector of $(I+V)^{-1}$. Since $ \sigma\left((I+V)^{-1}\right)=\{1\} $, it is evident that $(I+V)^{-1} x=x$, or $x=(I+V) x$, i.e., V x=0, therefore x=0.
chinese_rationale: 设  V  是 $ L^{2}[0，1]$  上的 Volterra 积分算子:$(V x)(t)=\int_{0}^{t} x(s) d s$，令  $\quad T=I-(I+V)^{-1}=V(I+V)^{-1} $。可证  V  是拟幂零算子， 故  T  也是拟幂零算子。兹证  $0 ∉ W(T)$ . 为此只要证明， 若  x  是使  $\langle T x， x\rangle=0$  的向量， 则  x=0 。 事实上， 若  $\langle T x， x\rangle=0 $， 则  $\langle x， x\rangle=\left\langle(I+V)^{-1} x， x\right\rangle$ .于是由  $\left\|(I+V)^{-1}\right\|=1 $ (参看例 12 )得到$\begin{aligned}\|x\|^{2} & =\left\langle(I+V)^{-1} x， x\right\rangle \leqslant\left\|(I+V)^{-1}\right\|\|x\|^{2} \\& =\|x\|^{2} .\end{aligned}$因此，  $\|x\|^{2}=\left\langle(I+V)^{-1} x， x\right\rangle=\left\|(I+V)^{-1}\right\|\|x\|^{2}$ 。由此可知，  x  必是  $(I+V)^{-1}$  的特征向量。 由于 $ \sigma\left((I+V)^{-1}\right)=\{1\}$  ， 可见  $(I+V)^{-1} x=x$ ， 或  $x=(I+V) x $， 即  V x=0 ， 故  x=0 。。

statement: If two weighted shift operators $\boldsymbol{A}$ and B with weights $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$ and $\left\{\beta_{n}\right\}$ are unitarily equivalent, then for all n we have $\left|\alpha_{n}\right|=\left|\beta_{n}\right|$.
chinese_statement: 若两个带有权  $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$  和  $\left\{\beta_{n}\right\}$  的加权移位算子  $\boldsymbol{A}$  和  B ，它们酉等价，那么对所有的  n  都有  $\left|\alpha_{n}\right|=\left|\beta_{n}\right|$ 。
rationale: Let $\left\{\varphi_{n}\right\}$ be a complete orthonormal system of the separable sequence Hilbert space H. An operator P on H is called a diagonal operator if there exist real (or complex) numbers $\alpha_{n}$ such that $P \varphi_{n}=\alpha_{n} \varphi_{n}, n=1,2, \cdots$, $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$ is called the diagonal of operator P. A weighted shift operator is the product SP of the right shift operator $\left(S \varphi_{n}=\varphi_{n+1}\right)$ and the diagonal operator P (with diagonal $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$). That is, if we let $A=S P$, then $A \varphi_{n}=a_{n+1} \varphi_{n+1}$. It can be proven that if P and Q are diagonal operators with diagonals $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$ and $\left\{\beta_{n}\right\}$ respectively, and for all n $\left|\alpha_{n}\right|=\left|\beta_{n}\right|$, then the weighted shift operators $A=S P$ and $B=S Q$ are unitarily equivalent, where S is the right shift operator. However, if weighted shift operators A and B have weights $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$ and $\left\{\beta_{n}\right\}$ respectively, their equivalence does not imply that for all n $\left|\alpha_{n}\right|=\left|\beta_{n}\right|$. In other words, the converse of the above proposition does not hold. For example, let H be the set of elements $\left(\cdots, x_{-2}, x_{-1},\left(x_{0}\right), x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right)$ such that $\sum_{k=-\infty}^{\infty}\left|x_{k}\right|^{2}<+\infty$. Define usual linear operations and inner product, then H is a Hilbert space. Let $\begin{array}{l}W\left(\cdots, x_{-2}, x_{-1},\left(x_{0}\right), x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right) \\\quad=\left(\cdots, x_{-3}, x_{-2},\left(x_{-1}\right), x_{0}, x_{1}, \cdots\right).\end{array}$ Let $\left\{\varphi_{n}\right\}$ be a complete orthonormal system of H, and define $A \varphi_{n}=a_{n} \varphi_{n+1}, B \varphi_{n}= \alpha_{n+1} \varphi_{n+1}, n=0, \pm 1, \pm 2, \cdots$, then A and B are both weighted shift operators and they are unitarily equivalent, because W $\varphi_{n}=\varphi_{n+1}(n=0, \pm 1, \pm 2, \cdots)$, hence $W^{*} A W=B$. However, if $\left\{\left|\alpha_{n}\right|\right\}$ is not a constant sequence, then there is at least some n such that $\left|\alpha_{n}\right|\ne \left|\alpha_{n+1}\right|$.
chinese_rationale: 设  $\left\{\varphi_{n}\right\}$  是可分序列 Hilbert 空间  H  的完全的就范直交系,  H 上的算子  P  称为对角算子，是指存在实(或复)数  $\alpha_{n}$  使$P \varphi_{n}=\alpha_{n} \varphi_{n}, n=1,2, \cdots$, $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$  称为算子  P  的对角线。加权移位算子是右移算子  $\left(S \varphi_{n}=\varphi_{n+1}\right)$  与对角算子  P  (具有对角线  $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$  )的乘积  S P , 即若令  $A=S P$ , 则  $A \varphi_{n}=a_{n+1} \varphi_{n+1}$ 。可以证明, 假如  P  与  Q  分别是具有对角线  $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$  与  $\left\{\beta_{n}\right\}$  的对角算子, 且对一切  n  都有  $\left|\alpha_{n}\right|=\left|\beta_{n}\right|$ , 那么沿权移位算子  $A=S P$  与  $B=S Q$  必定是酉等价的,其中  S  是右移算子。然而分别带有权  $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$  与  $\left\{\beta_{n}\right\}$  的加权移位算子  A  与  B , 由它们的等价性不能推出对一切  n  都有  $\left|\alpha_{n}\right|=\left|\beta_{n}\right|$ 。 也就是说, 上述命题之逆并不成立。 例如,设  H  是元素  $\left(\cdots, x_{-2}, x_{-1},\left(x_{0}\right), x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right)$ 的全体, 使  $\sum_{k=-\infty}^{\infty}\left|x_{k}\right|^{2}<+\infty$ 。 定义通常的线性运算及内积, 则  H 为 Hilbert 空间。 令$\begin{array}{l}W\left(\cdots, x_{-2}, x_{-1},\left(x_{0}\right), x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots\right) \\\quad=\left(\cdots, x_{-3}, x_{-2},\left(x_{-1}\right), x_{0}, x_{1}, \cdots\right) .\end{array}$设  $\left\{\varphi_{n}\right\}$  是  H  的完全的 就范直交系, 而令  $A \varphi_{n}=a_{n} \varphi_{n+1}, B \varphi_{n}=   \alpha_{n+1} \varphi_{n+1}, n=0, \pm 1, \pm 2, \cdots$ , 则  A  与  B  都是加权移位算子, 而且它们是酉等价的, 这是因为  W $\varphi_{n}=\varphi_{n+1}(n=0, \pm 1, \pm 2, \cdots)$ , 故  $W^{*} A W=B$ 。 但是, 如果  $\left\{\left|\alpha_{n}\right|\right\}$  不是常数列, 那么至少存在某个  n ,使  $\left|\alpha_{n}\right|\ne \left|\alpha_{n+1}\right|$ 。

statement: There exists an incomplete metric space where any subset is both open and closed.
chinese_statement: 任何子集都是既开又闭的不完备的度量空间。
rationale: Let X be the set of all positive integers, and let $d(m, n)=\frac{|m-n|}{m n}$, then (X, d) is a metric space. Since $\{n\}_{n=1}^{\infty}$ is a Cauchy sequence in (X, d), which does not converge, (X, d) is incomplete. To prove that any subset of X is both open and closed, it suffices to show that any single-element set $\{n\}$ in X is open. If m>n, then $f(m)=d(m, n)=\frac{(m-n)}{m n}$ is an increasing function with respect to m, hence $d(m, n) \geqslant \frac{1}{n(n+1)} \quad(m>n)$ (1). If $0<m<n$, then $f(m)=d(m, n)=\frac{(n-m)}{m n}$ is a decreasing function with respect to m, hence $d(m, n) \geqslant \frac{1}{n(n-1)} \quad(n>m>0)$ (2). From (1) and (2), we know for any positive integer $m(m \neq n)$, $d(m, n) \geqslant \frac{1}{n(n+1)}$. Take $r=\frac{1}{n(n+1)}$, then the open ball with center n and radius r is the singleton set $\{n\}$, thus $\{n\}$ is an open set.
chinese_rationale: 设  X  为一切正整数所成之集， 令  $d(m， n)=\frac{|m-n|}{m n}$ ， 则  (X， d) 为一度量空间。 因  $\{n\}_{n=1}^{\infty}$  是  (X， d)  中的一个 Cauchy 序列， 而它并不收敛， 故  (X， d)  不完备。兹证  X  中的任何子集都是既开又闭的， 为此， 只要证明  X  中任一单元素集  $\{n\}$  都是开集即可。 若  m>n ， 则$f(m)=d(m， n)=\frac{(m-n)}{m n}$是关于  m  的递增函数，因而$d(m， n) \geqslant \frac{1}{n(n+1)} \quad(m>n)$(1) 。若  $0<m<n$ ，  则$f(m)=d(m， n)=\frac{(n-m)}{m n}$是关于  m  的递减函数，因而$d(m， n) \geqslant \frac{1}{n(n-1)} \quad(n>m>0)$ (2)。由 (1)， (2) 可知对任何正整数  $m(m \neq n)$ ， 都有  $d(m， n) \geqslant \frac{1}{n(n+1)}$ 。取  $r=\frac{1}{n(n+1)}$ ， 则以  n  为球心  r  为半径的开球就是单点集  $\{n\}$ ，故  $\{n\}$  是开集。

statement: There exists a Banach space that is linearly homeomorphic to a uniformly convex space in the weakly compactly generated direction, but one of its quotient spaces is not linearly homeomorphic to any space that is uniformly convex in the weakly compactly generated direction.
chinese_statement: 存在一个线性同胚于弱紧集方向一致凸空间的 Banach 空间， 它的某个商空间不线性同胚于任何弱紧集方向一致凸空间。
rationale: For the Banach space $l(I)$, the necessary and sufficient condition for an equivalent norm on it to be uniformly convex is that the norm is uniformly convex in the weakly compact direction. Thus, $l(I)$ is linearly homeomorphic to a space that is uniformly convex in the weakly compactly generated direction. On the other hand, one of the quotient spaces of $l(I)$ is not linearly homeomorphic to any uniformly convex space, so it is also not linearly homeomorphic to any space that is uniformly convex in the weakly compactly generated direction.
chinese_rationale: 对于 Banach 空间  $l(I)$  而言，在它上面的等价范数为各向一致凸的充要条件是， 这个范数为弱紧 集方向一致 的， 于是，  $l(I)$  线性同胚于某个弱紧集方向一致凸空间，另一方面，  $l(I)$  的某个商空间不线性 同 胚于任何各向一致凸空间，因而它也不线性同胚于任何弱紧集方向一致凸空间。

statement: Given any two points x and y on the unit sphere S of a metric linear space, there exists some $z \in S$ such that $d(x, z) = d(z, y)$.
chinese_statement: 给定度量线性空间单位球面  S  上的某两个点  x  与  y , 一定存在  $z \in S$  使  $d(x, z)   =d(z, y)$  。
rationale: For example: In the linear space $\mathbf{R}^2$, let $d(x, y) = \frac{\left|\xi_{1}-\eta_{1}\right|}{1+\left|\xi_{1}-\eta_{1}\right|}+\frac{\left|\xi_{2}-\eta_{2}\right|}{1+\left|\xi_{2}-\eta_{2}\right|}$, where $x = \left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}\right), y = \left(\eta_{1}, \eta_{2}\right) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$. It is easy to see that $\left(\mathbf{R}^{2}, d\right)$ is a metric linear space. Let $x = (1,1), y = (1,-1)$, then $d(x, 0) = d(y, 0) = 1$, meaning that x and y are both on the unit sphere S in $\left(\mathbf{R}^{2}, d\right)$. We now prove that there does not exist $z \in S$ such that $d(x, z) = d(y, z)$. Suppose such $z = \left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}\right) \in \left(\mathbf{R}^{2}, d\right)$ exists, making $d(x, z) = d(y, z)$, i.e. $\frac{\left|1-\xi_{1}\right|}{1+\left|1-\xi_{1}\right|}+\frac{\left|1-\xi_{2}\right|}{1+\left|1-\xi_{2}\right|}=\frac{\left|1-\xi_{1}\right|}{1+\left|1-\xi_{1}\right|}+\frac{\left|1+\xi_{2}\right|}{1+\left|1+\xi_{2}\right|}$, then we get that $\left|1-\xi_{2}\right|=\left|1+\xi_{2}\right|$. Thus $\xi_{2} = 0$, which means $d(z, 0) = \frac{\left|\xi_{1}\right|}{\left(1-\left|\xi_{1}\right|\right)}<1$, contradicting $z \in S$. Therefore, there does not exist $z \in S$ such that $d(x, z) = d(y, z)$.
chinese_rationale: 例如：在线性空间  $R^{2}$  中，令$d(x, y)=\frac{\left|\xi_{1}-\eta_{1}\right|}{1+\left|\xi_{1}-\eta_{1}\right|}+\frac{\left|\xi_{2}-\eta_{2}\right|}{1+\left|\xi_{2}-\eta_{2}\right|}$,其中  $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}\right), y=\left(\eta_{1}, \eta_{2}\right) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$ 。 易见,  $\left(\mathbf{R}^{2}, d\right)$  为一度量线性空间。 取  $x=(1,1), y=(1,-1)$ , 则  $d(x, 0)=d(y, 0)=1$ , 即  x, y  都落在  $\left(\mathbf{R}^{2}, d\right)$  的单位球面  S 。 兹证不存在  $z \in S $ 而有  $d(x, z)=   d(y, z)$ 。 反设存在  $z=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}\right) \in\left(\mathbf{R}^{2}, d\right)$ , 使  $d(x, z)=d(y, z)$ ,即$\frac{\left|1-\xi_{1}\right|}{1+\left|1-\xi_{1}\right|}+\frac{\left|1-\xi_{2}\right|}{1+\left|1-\xi_{2}\right|}=\frac{\left|1-\xi_{1}\right|}{1+\left|1-\xi_{1}\right|}+\frac{\left|1+\xi_{2}\right|}{1+\left|1+\xi_{2}\right|}$,那么就得到  $\left|1-\xi_{2}\right|=\left|1+\xi_{2}\right|$ 。 因此  $\xi_{2}=0$ , 从而$d(z, 0)=\frac{\left|\xi_{1}\right|}{\left(1-\left|\xi_{1}\right|\right)}<1$,这与  $z \in S$  相矛盾。 因此, 不存在  $z \in S$  使  $d(x, z)=d(y, z)$ 。

statement: A compact metric space without the fixed point property, where there does not exist a dense subset with the fixed point property.
chinese_statement: 一个没有不动点性质的紧度量空间, 其中不存在有不动点性质的稠密子空间。
rationale: Let A be the square in the real plane with vertices at $(0,-2),(4,-2),(4,2),(0,2)$ (excluding the interior). Let $B=\left\{(x, y): 0<x \leqslant 1, y=\sin \frac{1}{x}\right\}$. Let $X=A \cup B$, with the usual Euclidean distance on X, then X is a compact metric space without the fixed point property. Let $A_{0}$ be A minus the vertical open interval determined by (0,-1) to (0,1), and let $Y=A_{0} \cup B$, then Y is dense in X and has the fixed point property.
chinese_rationale: 设  A  是实平面上以  $(0,-2),(4,-2),(4,2),(0,2)$  为顶点的正方形(不包括内部)。 又设$B=\left\{(x, y): 0<x \leqslant 1, y=\sin \frac{1}{x}\right\}$ 。令  $X=A \cup B$ , 并在  X  上取实平面的通常距离, 则  X  为一紧度量空间, 且  X  没有不动点性质。设  $A_{0}$  是  A  减去由  (0,-1)  到  (0,1)  确定的垂直开区间，并令  $Y=A_{0} \cup B$ , 则  Y  在  X  中稠密, 且  Y  具有不动点性质。

statement: There exists a Riesz operator whose range is not separable.
chinese_statement: 存在某个 Riesz 算子，其值域不可分。
rationale: The following example was created by Yang Zongpan: let $X=l^{\infty}$, for $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in X$, let $T x=\left(0, \xi_{3}, 0, \xi_{5}, 0, \cdots\right)$, then T is a Riesz operator. Because $R(T)=\left\{\left(0, \xi_{3}, 0, \xi_{5}, 0, \cdots\right): x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in \mathrm{X}\right\}$, it is clear that $R(T)$ is not separable. Note: Since the range of a compact operator must be separable, the operator T in this example must not be compact.
chinese_rationale: 下面的例子是由杨宗磐作出的：设  $X=l^{\infty}$ , 对  $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in X$ , 令$T x=\left(0, \xi_{3}, 0, \xi_{5}, 0, \cdots\right)$,则  T  是 Riesz 算子。 因为$R(T)=\left\{\left(0, \xi_{3}, 0, \xi_{5}, 0, \cdots\right): x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in \mathrm{X}\right\}$,可见  $R(T)$  不可分。注： 因为紧算子的值域必定可分，故本例中的算子  T  必定不是紧算子。

statement: A first Baire class subspace in a Banach space, which itself is not a first Baire space.
chinese_statement: 一个 Banach 空间中的第一纲子空间， 它本身并非第一纲空间。
rationale: A one-dimensional subspace $\mathbf{R}^{1}$ in the two-dimensional Euclidean space $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ is clearly a first Baire class subspace in $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ (because the closure of $\mathbf{R}^{1}$ does not contain any interior points of $\mathbf{R}^{2} \backslash \mathbf{R}^{1}$, hence it is nowhere dense in $\mathbf{R}^{2}$). However, $\mathbf{R}^{1}$ itself forms a complete metric space, thus making it a second Baire class space.
chinese_rationale: 二维欧氏空间  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ 中的一维子空间 $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  显然是 $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  内的一个第一 纲子空间（因  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  的闭包不含有  $\mathbf{R}^{2} \backslash \mathbf{R}^{1}$  的内点， 故其自身就是  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  内的一个无处稠密集)，然而，  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  自身却构成了一个 完备度量空间，因而是第二纲空间。

statement: There exists a reflexive but not strictly convex Banach space.
chinese_statement: 存在自反而不严格凸的 Banach 空间.
rationale: For $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}\right) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$, let $\|i \omega=\left|\xi_{1}\right|+\left|\xi_{2}\right|$, then the Banach space $(\mathbf{R}^{2},\|\cdot\|)$ is reflexive, but it is not strictly convex.
chinese_rationale:
对  $x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}\right) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$ , 令  $\| i \omega=\left|\xi_{1}\right|+\left|\xi_{2}\right|$ , 则 Banach 空间 $(  \mathbf{R}^{2} ,
\|\cdot\|)$  是自反的,但它不是严格凸的.

statement: Let X be a Banach space, and let $B=\left\{\left(x_{a}, y_{a}\right): a \in A\right\} \subset X \times X^{*}$, where $\left(x_{a}, y_{a}\right)$ satisfies the condition: $y_{\beta}\left(x_{\alpha}\right)=\delta_{\alpha \beta}$. (1) Arsove and Edwards call B a generalized basis, meaning $\left\{x_{a}: \alpha \in A\right\}$ is linearly dense in X. (2) Davis calls B a conjugate generalized basis, meaning $\left\{y_{a}: \alpha \in A\right\}$ is linearly dense in $X^{*}$. Proposition: In Hilbert space, generalized basis and conjugate generalized basis do not contain each other.
chinese_statement: 设  X  为 Banach 空间, 令  $B=\left\{\left(x_{a}, y_{a}\right): a \in A\right\} \subset X \times X^{*}$ ,其中  $\left(x_{a}, y_{a}\right)$  适合条件:$y_{\beta}\left(x_{\alpha}\right)=\delta_{\alpha \beta}$ 。（1）Arsove 和 Edwards 称  B  为广义基，是指  $\left\{x_{a}: \alpha \in A\right\}$  在  X  中线性稠密。 （2）     Davis称  B  为共轭广义基,是指 $\left\{y_{a}: \alpha \in A\right\}$  在  $X^{*}$  中线性稠密。 命题：Hiibert 空间中广义基与共轭广义基互不包含。
rationale: Tapia provided an example in 1971 as follows: In the Hilbert space $l^{2}$, let $x_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0, \underset{(n+1) \text {th position}}{1}, 0, \cdots), y_{n}=(1,0, \cdots, 0, \underset{(n+1) \text {th position}}{1}, 0, \cdots)$. Since the conjugate space of $l^{2}$ is itself, $B=\left\{\left(x_{n}, y_{n}\right): n=1,2, \cdots\right\}$ meets condition (1) but not (2), because $(1,0,0, \cdots)$ is orthogonal to all $x_{n}$, so $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ is not linearly dense in $l^{2}$. Also, if $b=\left(b_{1}, b_{2}, \cdots\right)$ is orthogonal to all $y_{n}$, then $b_{n}=-b_{1}(n=2,3, \cdots)$, and $b_{n} \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$, hence $b=(0,0, \cdots)$, i.e., (3) holds. Therefore, B is a conjugate generalized basis in $l^{2}$ but not a generalized basis. Furthermore, from the discussion above, $B^{\prime}=\left\{\left(y_{n}, x_{n}\right): n=1,2, \cdots\right\}$ is a generalized basis in $l^{2}$, but not a conjugate generalized basis.
chinese_rationale: Tapia  于 1971 年提出例子如下:在 Hilbert 空间  $l^{2}$  中, 令  $x_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0, \underset{(n+1) \text { 位 }}{1}, 0, \cdots), y_{n}=   (1,0, \cdots, 0, \underset{(n+1) \text { 位 }}{1}, 0, \cdots)$ 。 由于  $l^{2}$  的共轭空间就是它本身, 故  $B=\left\{\left(x_{n}, y_{n}\right): n=1,2, \cdots\right\}$  满足条件 (1), 但 (2) 不成立, 这是因为  $(1,0,0, \cdots)$  与所有的  $x_{n}$  直交, 从而  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  在  $l^{2}$  中并不线性稠密。 又因为若  $b=\left(b_{1}, b_{2}, \cdots\right)$  与所有的  $y_{n}$  直交, 则  $b_{n}=-b_{1}(n=2,3 ,  \cdots)$ , 而  $b_{n} \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$ , 从而  $b=(0,0, \cdots)$ , 即 (3) 成立。 因 此,  B 是  $l^{2}$  的共轭广义基,但不是广义基。其次, 由上面的讨论可知,  $B^{\prime}=\left\{\left(y_{n}, x_{n}\right): n=1,2, \cdots\right\}$  是  $l^{2}$ 的广义基,而不是共轭广义基。

statement: There exists a basis of a certain conjugate space $\boldsymbol{X}{ }^{*}$ does not have a biorthogonal sequence in X.
chinese_statement: 某个共轭空间  $\boldsymbol{X}{ }^{*}$  的基， 它在  X  中没有双直交列。
rationale: If $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ is a basis of a Banach space X, then for every $x \in X$, there exists a unique sequence $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$ such that $x=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{n} x_{n}$. Let $\alpha_{n}=f_{n}(x)$, then $f_{n}$ is a bounded linear functional on X, and $f_{n}\left(x_{m}\right)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1, & n=m, \\0, & n \neq m.\end{array}\right.$ In other words, for every basis $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset X$, there exists $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ in $X^{*}$ such that $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ and $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ form a biorthogonal sequence. It should be noted that for a basis $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ in $X^{*}$, there does not necessarily exist $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ in X such that $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ and $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ form a biorthogonal sequence. For example, let $X=c_{0}$, then $X^{*}=l$. Let $f_{1}=e_{1}, f_{n}=e_{n}-(-1)^{n-1} e_{1}, n=2,3, \cdots$. Also, for any $f=\left\{\eta_{n}\right\} \in l$, let $\begin{array}{l}\alpha_{1}=\eta_{1}, \alpha_{2}=\eta_{2}+\eta_{1}, \alpha_{3}=\eta_{3}-\eta_{1}, \cdots, \\alpha_{n}=\eta_{n}+(-1)^{n} \eta_{1}, \cdots\end{array}$ Then $f=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{n} f_{n}$ is unique, and thus, $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ is a basis of $X^{*}=l$. However, there is no sequence $\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{n}\right\}$ in $X=c_{0}$ biorthogonal to $\left\{f_{n}\right\}.$
chinese_rationale: 如果  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  是 Banach 空间  X  的基， 那么对每一  $x \in X$ ， 存在唯一的数列  $\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}$ ， 使$x=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{n} x_{n}$ 。令  $\alpha_{n}=f_{n}(x)$ ， 则  $f_{n}$  是  X  上的有界线性泛函， 且$f_{n}\left(x_{m}\right)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}1， & n=m， \\0， & n \neq m .\end{array}\right.$也就是说， 对于每个基  $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset X$ ， 在  $X^{*}$  中 都存在  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ ， 使  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  与  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  成双直交列。应当注意， 对于  $X^{*}$  中的基  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ ， 在  X  中不必存在  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ ， 使  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  与  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  成双直交列。 例 如， 取  $X=c_{0}$ ， 则  $X^{*}=l$ 。令  $f_{1}=e_{1}， f_{n}=e_{n}-(-1)^{n-1} e_{1}， n=2，3， \cdots$ 。又对任一  $f=\left\{\eta_{n}\right\} \in   l$ ， 令$\begin{array}{l}\alpha_{1}=\eta_{1}， \alpha_{2}=\eta_{2}+\eta_{1}， \alpha_{3}=\eta_{3}-\eta_{1}， \cdots， \\\alpha_{n}=\eta_{n}+(-1)^{n} \eta_{1}， \cdots\end{array}$则$f=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \alpha_{n} f_{n}$易见， 这个表示法是唯一的， 因此，  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  是  $X^{*}=l$  的一个基。然而，在  $X=c_{0}$  中不存在与  $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$  成双直交的点列  $\left\{\boldsymbol{x}_{n}\right\} .$

statement: There exists a Banach space Hilbert basis, which is not a Bessel basis.
chinese_statement: 一个 Banach 空间的 Hilbert 基, 它不是 Bessel 基。
rationale: The natural basis $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$ in the Banach space $c_{0}$ is a Hilbert basis, but it is not a Bessel basis.
chinese_rationale: Banach 空间  $c_{0}$  中 的 自然基  $\left\{e_{n}\right\}$  是 Hilbert 基, 但它不是 Bessel 基。

statement: There exists a separable Banach space with an inseparable dual space.
chinese_statement: 一个分 Banach 空间， 其共轭空间不可分。
rationale: The Banach space $l$ is separable, but its dual space $l^{\infty}$ is not separable.
chinese_rationale: Banach 空间  $l$  是可分的，但其共轭空间  $l^{\infty}$  并不可分。

statement: There exists a continuous one-to-one closed linear operator whose inverse operator is a closed discontinuous operator.
chinese_statement: 存在某个连续的一对一的闭线性算子， 其逆算子是闭的不连续算子。
rationale: Let X and Y be the real linear spaces of all real-valued polynomials defined on the interval $[0, 1]$. I is the identity operator from Y to X. Because for any $x \in Y$, we have $\begin{aligned} \|I x\|_{X} & =\max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}|x(t)| \leqslant \max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}|x(t)|+\max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}\left|x^{\prime}(t)\right| \\& =\|x\|_{Y}, \end{aligned}$ thus I is continuous. It is also easy to see that I is closed, and there exists an inverse operator $I^{-1}: I^{-1} x=x$. Since there is no constant $M>0$, such that for all $x \in X$, we have $\begin{array}{l} \left\|I^{-1} x\right\|_{Y}=\max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}|x(t)|+\max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}\left|x^{\prime}(t)\right| \\\leqslant M \max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}|x(t)|=M\|x\|_{x}, \\\end{array}$ so $I^{-1}$ is discontinuous. Furthermore, if $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left\|x_{n}-x\right\|_{X}=0, \lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left\|I^{-1} x_{n}-y\right\|_{Y}=0$, then $\begin{array}{l} \lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \max _{0 \leqslant t _{1}}\left|x_{n}(t)-x(t)\right| \\=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}\left|x_{n}(t)-y(t)\right|=0. \end{array}$ Therefore, $I^{-1} x=x=y$, i.e., $I^{-1}$ is a closed linear operator.
chinese_rationale: 设  X  与  Y  都是定义在区间 $[0，1]$  上的一切实值多项式所成的实线性空间。  I  是  Y  到  X  上的恒等算子。 因对任意  $x \in Y$ ， 都有$\begin{aligned}\|I x\|_{X} & =\max _{0 \leqslant 1 \leqslant 1}|x(t)| \leqslant \max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}|x(t)|+\max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}\left|x^{\prime}(t)\right| \\& =\|x\|_{Y}，\end{aligned}$故  I  连续。 又易见  I  是闭的， 且存在逆算子  $I^{-1}: I^{-1} x=x$ 。 由于不存在常数  $M>0$ ， 使对一切  $x \in X$ ， 都有$\begin{array}{l}\left\|I^{-1} x\right\|_{Y}=\max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}|x(t)|+\max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}\left|x^{\prime}(t)\right| \\\leqslant M \max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}|x(t)|=M\|x\|_{x}， \\\end{array}$所以  $I^{-1}$  不连续。 此外， 若$\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left\|x_{n}-x\right\|_{X}=0， \lim _{n \rightarrow \infty}\left\|I^{-1} x_{n}-y\right\|_{Y}=0$，则$\begin{array}{l}\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \max _{0 \leqslant t 1}\left|x_{n}(t)-x(t)\right| \\=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \max _{0 \leqslant t \leqslant 1}\left|x_{n}(t)-y(t)\right|=0 .\end{array}$因此，  $I^{-1} x=x=y$ ， 即  $I^{-1}$  是闭线性算子。

statement: For two positive operators S, T, if $S \leqslant T$, then it must hold that $S^{2} \leqslant T^{2}$.
chinese_statement: 对于两个正算子  S, T , 若有 $S \leqslant T$ , 则必有  $S^{2} \leqslant T^{2}$  成立。
rationale: Let $S=3\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 1 \\1 & 1\end{array}\right), T=4\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 0 \\0 & 3\end{array}\right)$ then for $x=\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right) \in \mathbb{R}^{2}$, it holds that $S x=3\left(x_{1}+x_{2}, x_{1}+x_{2}\right), T x=  4(  \left.x_{1}, 3 x_{2}\right)$, thus $\begin{array}{l}\langle S x, x\rangle=3\left(x_{1}+x_{2}\right)^{2} \geqslant 0, \\\langle T x, x\rangle=4\left(x_{1}^{2}+3 x_{2}^{2}\right) \geqslant 0,\end{array}$ i.e., both S and T are positive operators. Furthermore, because $\begin{aligned}\langle(T-S) x, x\rangle & =\left\langle\left(x_{1}-3 x_{2}, 9 x_{2}-3 x_{1}\right),\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right)\right\rangle \\& =\left(x_{1}-3 x_{2}\right)^{2} \geqslant 0,\end{aligned}$ it follows that $S \leqslant T$. On the other hand, we have $S^{2} x=18\left(x_{1}+x_{2}, x_{1}+x_{2}\right),T^{2} x=16\left(x_{1}, 9 x_{2}\right)$ therefore $\left\langle\left(S^{2}-T^{2}\right) x, x\right\rangle=2\left(x_{1}^{2}+18 x_{1} x_{2}-63 x_{2}^{2}\right)$. Therefore, $S^{2} \leqslant T^{2}$ does not hold. Note: It can be proven that if $0 \leqslant S \leqslant T$ and S and T commute, then $S^{2} \leqslant T^{2}$.
chinese_rationale: 设$S=3\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 1 \\1 & 1\end{array}\right), T=4\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 0 \\0 & 3\end{array}\right)$则 对  $x=\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right) \in \mathbb{R}^{2}$ , 有  $S x=3\left(x_{1}+x_{2}, x_{1}+x_{2}\right), T x=  4(  \left.x_{1}, 3 x_{2}\right)$ ,故$\begin{array}{l}\langle S x, x\rangle=3\left(x_{1}+x_{2}\right)^{2} \geqslant 0, \\\langle T x, x\rangle=4\left(x_{1}^{2}+3 x_{2}^{2}\right) \geqslant 0,\end{array}$即  S ， T  均为正算子。 又因为$\begin{aligned}\langle(T-S) x, x\rangle & =\left\langle\left(x_{1}-3 x_{2}, 9 x_{2}-3 x_{1}\right),\left(x_{1}, x_{2}\right)\right\rangle \\& =\left(x_{1}-3 x_{2}\right)^{2} \geqslant 0,\end{aligned}$故  $S \leqslant T$ 。 另一方面, 我们有$S^{2} x=18\left(x_{1}+x_{2}, x_{1}+x_{2}\right),T^{2} x=16\left(x_{1}, 9 x_{2}\right)$因此$\left\langle\left(S^{2}-T^{2}\right) x, x\right\rangle=2\left(x_{1}^{2}+18 x_{1} x_{2}-63 x_{2}^{2}\right)$ 。由此可知,  $S^{2} \leqslant T^{2}$  并不成立。注： 可以证明, 若  $0 \leqslant S \leqslant T$  且  S  与  T  可换, 则  $S^{2} \leqslant T^{2}$ 。

statement: There exists a discontinuous bilinear functional, which is continuous with respect to each variable individually.
chinese_statement: 存在不连续的双线性泛函， 它对各个变元分别连续。
rationale: Let X be the normed linear space of all real univariate polynomials with the norm $\|p\|=\int_{0}^{1}|p(t)| dt$ and let $B(p, q)=\int_{0}^{1} p(t) q(t) dt$. It is clear that B is a bilinear functional on $X \times X$. Assume $p_{n} \rightarrow p(n \rightarrow \infty)$, i.e., $\int_{0}^{1}\left|p_{n}(t)-p(t)\right| dt \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$, then $\left|B\left(p_{n}, q\right)-B(p, q)\right| \leqslant \int_{0}^{1}\left|p_{n}(t)-p(t)\right||q(t)| dt \leqslant M \int_{0}^{1}\left|p_{n}(t)-p(t)\right| dt \rightarrow 0 \quad(n \rightarrow \infty)$, therefore B is continuous with respect to the variable p. Similarly, it can be proved that B is also continuous with respect to the variable q. Take $p(t)=q(t)=0, p_{n}(t)=q_{n}(t)=n t^{n}$, then $\begin{aligned} \quad\left|B\left(p_{n}, q_{n}\right)-B(p, q)\right| & =\int_{0}^{1} n^{2} t^{2 n} dt \\& =\frac{n^{2}}{2 n+1} \rightarrow \infty(n \rightarrow \infty),\end{aligned}$ thus B is not continuous.
chinese_rationale: 设  X  是一切实一元多项式所成的赋范线性空间， 范数为$\|p\|=\int_{0}^{1}|p(t)| d t$并设$B(p， q)=\int_{0}^{1} p(t) q(t) d t$ .易见，  B  是  $X \times X$  上的双线性泛函。设  $p_{n} \rightarrow p(n \rightarrow \infty)$ ， 即$\int_{0}^{1}\left|p_{n}(t)-p(t)\right| d t \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty)$，则  $\left|B\left(p_{n}， q\right)-B(p， q)\right| \leqslant \int_{0}^{1}\left|p_{n}(t)-p(t)\right||q(t)| d t \leqslant M \int_{0}^{1}\left|p_{n}(t)-p(t)\right| d t \rightarrow 0 \quad(n \rightarrow \infty)$，所以  B  关于变元  p  连续。 同理可证，  B  关于变元  q  也连续.取  $p(t)=q(t)=0， p_{n}(t)=q_{n}(t)=n t^{n}$ ， 则$\begin{aligned}\therefore \quad\left|B\left(p_{n}， q_{n}\right)-B(p， q)\right| & =\int_{0}^{1} n^{2} t^{2 n} d t \\& =\frac{n^{2}}{2 n+1} \rightarrow \infty(n \rightarrow \infty)，\end{aligned}$故  B  不连续。

statement: A Banach space X with a basis, where there exists a subspace $\boldsymbol{G}$ with a basis, such that no basis in G can be extended to become a basis for $\boldsymbol{X}$.
chinese_statement: 一个有基的 Banach 空间  X ， 其中存在有基的子空间  $\boldsymbol{G}$ ， 使  G 中没有一个基可以扩张成为  $\boldsymbol{X}$  的基。
rationale: Singer obtained the following general result: There exists a Banach space $\mathrm{X}$ with a basis, which contains a subspace G with a basis, such that no basis in G can be extended to become a basis for $\mathrm{I}$. For those interested, the reader may refer to the original work by the author.
chinese_rationale: Singer获得了如下的一般结果: 存在具有基的 Banacr 空间  $\mathrm{X}$ ， 它含有具有基的子空间  G ， 使  G  中没有一个基可以扩张 成为  $\mathrm{I}$  的基。 读者如有兴趣， 可参看作者原文。

statement: There exists a Banach space that is not weakly sequentially complete.
chinese_statement: 存在某个 Banach 空间， 它并不弱序列完备。
rationale: Let X be an infinite-dimensional Banach space. Consider the weak topology $\sigma\left(X, X^{*}\right)$ on X, then $\left(X, \sigma\left(X, X^{*}\right)\right)$ is a non-metrizable topological vector space. It can be proven that it is not complete. When X is reflexive, $\left(X, \sigma\left(X, X^{*}\right)\right)$ is sequentially complete. Note that when X is not reflexive, $\left(X, \sigma\left(X, X^{*}\right)\right)$ need not be sequentially complete, i.e., the Banach space X need not be weakly sequentially complete. For example, the Banach space $c_{0}$ is not weakly sequentially complete. In fact, since $c_{0}^{*}=l$, and for each $f \in c_{0}^{*}$, there exists an $a=\left\{a_{n}\right\} \in l$ such that $f(x)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_{n} \xi_{n}$, $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c_{0}$. Let $x_{n}=(1,1, \cdots, 1,0,0, \cdots)$, then $x_{n} \in c_{0}$, and $\begin{aligned}\left|f\left(x_{n}\right)-f\left(x_{m}\right)\right| & =\left|\sum_{i=1}^{n} a_{i}-\sum_{i=1}^{m} a_{i}\right| \\& =\left|\sum_{i=m+1}^{n} a_{i} \right| \le  \sum_{i=m+1}^{n}\left|a_{i} \right| .\end{aligned}$ Since $a=\left\{a_{n}\right\} \in l$, so $\sum_{i=m+1}^{n}\left|a_{i}\right| \rightarrow 0(n, m \rightarrow \infty) \text {。 }$ Therefore, $\left\{f\left(x_{n}\right)\right\}$ is a Cauchy sequence, i.e., $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ is a weak Cauchy sequence in the space $c_{0}$. However, $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ does not weakly converge in $c_{0}$. Because if there exists $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c_{0}$, such that $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ weakly converges to x, then $\begin{aligned}\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} a_{k} \xi_{k} & =f(x)=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} f\left(x_{n}\right) \\& =\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \sum_{k=1}^{n} a_{k}=\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} a_{k} .\end{aligned}$ Take $f_{n} \in c_{0}^{*}$, $f_{n}=(0,0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots)$, from equation (1) we obtain $\xi_{k}=1, k=  1,2, \cdots$, thus $\lim _{k \rightarrow \infty} \xi_{k} \neq 0$, which contradicts $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c_{0}$.
chinese_rationale: 设  X  是无穷维 Banach 空间， 在  X  上取弱拓扑  $\sigma\left(X， X^{*}\right)$ ， 则  $\left(X， \sigma\left(X， X^{*}\right)\right)$  为一不可度量化的拓扑线性空间。 可以证明， 它不是完备的。 而当  X  自反时，  $\left(X， \sigma\left(X， X^{*}\right)\right)$  是序列完备的。 应当注意， 当  X  不自反时，  $\left(X， \sigma\left(X， X^{*}\right)\right)$  不必是序列完备的， 亦即 Banach 空间  X  不必是弱序列完备的。 例如， Banach 空间  $c_{0}$ 不是弱序列完备的。 事实上， 因为  $c_{0}^{*}=l$ ， 并且对每个  $f \in c_{0}^{*}$ ， 存在一个  $a=\left\{a_{n}\right\} \in l$ ， 使$f(x)=\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} a_{n} \xi_{n}， x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c_{0}$ 。令  $x_{n}=(1，1， \cdots， 1，0，0， \cdots)$ ， 则  $x_{n} \in c_{0}$ ， 并且 $\begin{aligned}\left|f\left(x_{n}\right)-f\left(x_{m}\right)\right| & =\left|\sum_{i=1}^{n} a_{i}-\sum_{i=1}^{m} a_{i}\right| \\& =\left|\sum_{i=m+1}^{n} a_{i} \right| \le  \sum_{i=m+1}^{n}\left|a_{i} \right| .\end{aligned}$由于  $a=\left\{a_{n}\right\} \in l$ ， 所以$\sum_{i=m+1}^{n}\left|a_{i}\right| \rightarrow 0(n， m \rightarrow \infty) \text {。 }$因此，  $\left\{f\left(x_{n}\right)\right\}$  为 Cauchy 数列，即  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  是空间  $c_{0}$  中的弱 Cauchy 列。 然而，  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  在  $c_{0}$  中并不弱收敛。因为若有  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c_{0}$ ， 使  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  弱收敛于  x ， 那么就有$\begin{aligned}\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} a_{k} \xi_{k} & =f(x)=\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} f\left(x_{n}\right) \\& =\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} \sum_{k=1}^{n} a_{k}=\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} a_{k} .\end{aligned}$取  $f_{n} \in c_{0}^{*}， f_{n}=(0，0， \cdots， 0，1，0， \cdots)$ ， 由  (1)  式得到  $\xi_{k}=1， k=  1，2， \cdots$ ， 于是  $\lim _{k \rightarrow \infty} \xi_{k} \neq 0$ ， 此与  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\} \in c_{0}$  相矛盾。

statement: There exist two linearly independent elements x and y in $l$(or $l^{\infty}$) such that $\|x-y\| \cdot\|x+y\| =\left|\|\boldsymbol{x}\|^{2}-\|\boldsymbol{y}\|^{2}\right|$.
chinese_statement: $l$(或  $l^{\infty}$  ) 中存在两个线性无关元  x  与  y ， 适合  $\|x-y\| \cdot\|x+y\|   =\left|\|\boldsymbol{x}\|^{2}-\|\boldsymbol{y}\|^{2}\right|$ 。
rationale: For example, take $x=\left(\frac{1}{2}, 1, 0, 0, \cdots\right), y=\left(0, \frac{1}{2}, 0, 0, \cdots\right)$, then $\|x-y\| \cdot\|x+y\|=|\| x\left\|^{2}-\right\| y \|^{2} \mid$, yet x and y are linearly independent.
chinese_rationale: 例如，取  $x=\left(\frac{1}{2}， 1，0，0， \cdots\right)， y=\left(0， \frac{1}{2}， 0，0， \cdots\right)$ ， 则  $\|x-y\| \cdot\|x+y\|=|\| x\left\|^{2}-\right\| y \|^{2} \mid$ ， 然而  x  与  y  是线性无关的。

statement: There exist a compact set $F_{1}$ and a closed set $F_{2}$ in a complete metric space, such that for any $\boldsymbol{x} \in \boldsymbol{F}_{1}, \boldsymbol{y} \in \boldsymbol{F}_{2}$ we always have $\boldsymbol{d}(\boldsymbol{x}, \boldsymbol{y})>\boldsymbol{d}\left(\boldsymbol{F}_{1}, \boldsymbol{F}_{2}\right)$.
chinese_statement: 存在一个完备度量空间中的紧集  $F_{1}$  与闭集  $F_{2}$ ， 使对任意  $\boldsymbol{x} \in \boldsymbol{F}_{1}， \boldsymbol{y} \in \boldsymbol{F}_{2}$  恒有  $\boldsymbol{d}(\boldsymbol{x}， \boldsymbol{y})>\boldsymbol{d}\left(\boldsymbol{F}_{1}， \boldsymbol{F}_{2}\right)$ 。
rationale: Counterexample is as follows: Let $l ^{2}$ be the set of sequences $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}$ that satisfy the condition $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{2}<+\infty$. For $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}, y=\left\{\eta_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}$, let $d(x, y)=\left(\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n} - \eta_{n}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}$, then $l^{2}$ is a complete metric space. In $l^{2}$, take $F_{1}=\{0\}, F_{2}=\left\{x_{n}\right\}^{\infty}{ }_{n=1}$, where $\begin{aligned}0 & =(0, 0, \cdots), \\x_{n} & =\left(0, \cdots, 0, \frac{n+1}{n}, 0, \cdots\right).\end{aligned}$ It is easy to see that $F_{1}$ is compact. Also, for any $x_{m}, x_{n} \in F_{2}, m \neq n$, we have $d\left(x_{m}, x_{n}\right)=\sqrt{\frac{(m+1)^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{(n+1)^{2}}{n^{2}}}>\sqrt{2}$. Thus, $F_{2}$ is a closed set. Moreover, for any $x \in F_{1}, y \in F_{2}$, by the definition of $F_{1}$ and $F_{2}$, $x=0, y=x_{n}$ (for some n), so $d(x, y)=\sqrt{\left(1+\frac{1}{n}\right)^{2}}>1=d\left(F_{1}, F_{2}\right)$.
chinese_rationale: 反例如下:设 $l  ^{2}$  是满足条件  $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n}\right|^{2}<+\infty$  的数列  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}$  的 全 体。 对  $x=\left\{\xi_{n}\right\}， y=\left\{\eta_{n}\right\} \in l^{2}$ ， 令$d(x， y)=\left(\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\left|\xi_{n} - \eta_{n}\right|^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}$，则  $l^{2}$  为一完备的度量空间。 在  $l^{2}$  中取  $F_{1}=\{0\}， F_{2}=\left\{x_{n}\right\}^{\infty}{ }_{n=1}$ ，其中$\begin{aligned}0 & =(0，0， \cdots)， \\x_{n} & =\left(0， \cdots， 0， \frac{n+1}{n}， 0， \cdots\right) 。\end{aligned}$易见，  $F_{1}$  是紧集．又对任意  $x_{m}， x_{n} \in F_{2}， m \neq n$  ，有$d\left(x_{m}， x_{n}\right)=\sqrt{\frac{(m+1)^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{(n+1)^{2}}{n^{2}}}>\sqrt{2}$ 。因此，  $F_{2}$  是一个闭集。但对任意  $x \in F_{1}， y \in F_{2}$  ，按  $F_{1}$  与  $F_{2}$  的定义，  $x=0， y=x_{n}$(  对某个  n) ， 因而$d(x， y)=\sqrt{\left(1+\frac{1}{n}\right)^{2}}>1=d\left(F_{1}， F_{2}\right)$.

statement: There exists a strictly singular operator whose conjugate operator is not strictly singular.
chinese_statement: 存在某个严格奇异算子，其共轭算子不是严格奇异算子。
rationale: Let $X=l, Y=l^{2}$, then there exists a continuous linear operator T from X to Y. The existence of such an operator is according to the Banach-Mazur theorem: given any separable Banach space Y, there exists a continuous linear operator from l to Y. Here we prove that T is a strictly singular operator. If not, then X contains an infinite-dimensional closed subspace N which is linearly isomorphic to a closed subspace M of Y. Since Y is reflexive, M is reflexive, and hence N is also reflexive. However, we know that X does not contain an infinite-dimensional reflexive subspace. Therefore, T is a strictly singular operator. Secondly, it is easy to see that T is a closed operator, and since $R(T)=Y$, $T^{*}$ has a bounded inverse operator. Therefore, $T^{*}$ is not a strictly singular operator.
chinese_rationale: 设  $X=l, Y=l^{2}$ , 则存在  X  到  Y  上的连续线性算子  T 。 这种算子的存在性是据 Banach-Mazur  定理：任给可分 Banach 空间  Y  ，存在  l  到  Y  上的连续线性算子。兹证  T  是严格奇异算子。 假如不然, 则  X  包含一个无穷维闭子空间  N , 它线性同胚于  Y  的某个闭子空间  M 。 由于  Y  自反, 故  M 自反, 从而  N  也是自反的。 然而, 我们知道  X  并不含有无穷维的自反子空间。 因此,  T  是严格奇异算子。其次, 容易看出  T  是闭算子, 且因  $R(T)=Y$ , 故 $ T^{*}$ 有有界的逆算子。 因此,  $T^{*}$  不是严格奇异算子。

statement: If g is a continuous one-to-one mapping on a subset of $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ to $\mathbf{R}^{2}$, and for any $p \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$, $d(p, g(p))=1$, then g must be an isometry from $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ to this subset.
chinese_statement: 如果  g  是  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  到  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  的某个子集上的一对一的连续映射， 便对任意  $p \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$  均有  $d(p， g(p))=1$ ， 那么  g 必为  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  到该子集上的一个等距映射。
rationale: Let f be a strictly increasing continuous function on $\mathbf{R}^{1}$, and for any $x \in \mathbf{R}^{1}$, $|f(x)| \leqslant 1$. For example, consider $f(x)=\frac{x}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)}^{\frac{1}{2}}$. For each $(x, y) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$, let $g(x, y)=\left(x+f(x), y+\left(1-f^{2}(x)^{\frac{1}{2}}\right)\right)$. The mapping g is clearly continuous, and because f is strictly increasing, for any $\left(x_{0}, y_{0}\right) \in g\left(\mathbf{R}^{2}\right)$, there exists a unique $\left(x_{1}, y_{1}\right) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$ such that $x_{0}=x_{1}+f\left(x_{1}\right), y_{0}=y_{1}+\left(1-f^{2}\left(x_{1}\right)\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}$. This means g is a one-to-one continuous mapping from $\mathbf{R}^{2}$ to $g\left(\mathbf{R}^{2}\right)$, and for any $p=(x, y) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$, $d(p, g(p))=1$. However, g is not an isometry, because $d(g(0,0), g(1,0)) > 1+f(1) > 1 = d((0,0),(1,0))$.
chinese_rationale: 设  f  是  $\mathbf{R}^{1}$  上严格递增的连续函数， 且 对任 意  $x \in \mathbf{R}^{1}$  均 有  $|f(x)| \leqslant 1$ 。 例如， 可取  $f(x)=\frac{x}{\left(1+x^{2}\right)}^{\frac{1}{2}}$ 。 对每一$(x， y) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$ ，令$g(x， y)=\left(x+f(x)， y+\left(1-f^{2}(x)^{\frac{1}{2}}\right) 。\right.$映射  g  显然是阵续的，又因为  f  是严格递 增的，所以对任意的  $\left(x_{0}， y_{0}\right) \in g\left(\mathbf{R}^{2}\right)$ ， 存在唯一的  $\left(x_{1}， y_{1}\right) \in \mathbf{R}^{2} $， 使$x_{0}=x_{1}+f\left(x_{1}\right)， y_{0}=y_{1}+\left(1-f^{2}\left(x_{1}\right)\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}$ 。也就是说，  g  是由  $\mathbf{R}^{2}$  到  $g\left(\mathbf{R}^{2}\right)$  上的一对一的连续映射， 且对任意  $p=(x， y) \in \mathbf{R}^{2}$ ， 都有  $d(p， g(p))=1$ 。 然而  g  不是等距映射， 这是因为$\begin{aligned}d(g(0，0)， g(1，0)) & >1+f(1)>1 \\= & d((0，0)，(1，0)) 。\end{aligned}$

statement: There exist infinite-dimensional locally convex spaces where bounded closed sets are compact.
chinese_statement: 存在有界闭集都是紧的无穷维局部凸空间。
rationale: As is well known, in finite-dimensional normed linear spaces, bounded closed sets must be compact. In infinite-dimensional normed linear spaces, bounded closed sets are not necessarily compact. In fact, in any infinite-dimensional normed linear space, there always exist bounded closed sets that are not compact. However, it should be noted that there indeed exist locally convex spaces where every bounded closed set is compact. For example, let $X^{*}$ be the conjugate space of a normed linear space X. Considering the $weak^{*}$ topology $\sigma\left(X^{*}, X\right)$ on $X^{*}$, every $weak^{*}$ bounded and $weak^{*}$ closed subset in $X^{*}$ must be $weak^{*}$ compact.
chinese_rationale: 如所周知，对于有限维赋范线性空间，其中的有界闭集必是紧的。 对于无穷维赋范线性空间, 有界闭集不必是紧的。 其实, 在任何一个无穷维赋范线性空间中总存在非紧的有界闭集。 但应注意,确实存在这样的局部凸空间, 其中的每个有界闭集都是紧的。 例如, 设  $X^{*}$是赋范线性空间  X  的共轭空间, 在  $X ^{*}$  上考虑$弱^{*}$拓扑  $\sigma\left(X^{*}, X\right)$ , 则  $X^{*}$  中每个$弱^{*}$有界且是$弱^{*}$闭的子集必是$弱^{*}$紧的。

statement: There exist Banach spaces that are locally uniformly convex but not uniformly convex.
chinese_statement: 存在局部一致凸而非一致凸的 Banach 空间。
rationale: For every $u \in c_{0}(\Gamma),\{r \in \Gamma: u(r) \neq 0\}$ is at most countable, denoted as the countable set $E(u)=\left\{a_{k}\right\}$. Let $\|u\|=\sup _{r \in \Gamma}|u(r)|$, then $c_{0}(\Gamma)$ is a Banach space under this norm. Define the mapping $D: c_{0}(\Gamma) \rightarrow l^{2}(\Gamma)$ as follows: $(D u)(r)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\frac{u\left(\alpha_{k}\right)}{2^{k}}, & r=\alpha_{k} \in E(u), \\0, & r \notin E(u). \end{array}\right.$ Let $\left |\|u\|\right |=\|D u\|_{2},\left |\|\cdot\|\right |$ be an equivalent norm on $c_{0}(\Gamma)$ that is locally uniformly convex. $\begin{array}{l}\text{For } x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}, \text{ let } \\ u=(\frac{\|x\|_{2}}{2}, \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \overbrace{\xi_{i}, \cdots, \xi_{j}}^{j \uparrow}, \cdots),\end{array}$ and call u the element associated with x. Clearly, $u \in c_{0}$. Define the norm $\|\cdot\|_{L}$ on $l^{2}$ as $\|x\|_{L}=\|u\|$. It is easy to see that $\|\cdot\|_{L}$ is an equivalent norm on $l^{2}$. We now indicate that $\|\cdot\|_{L}$ is locally uniformly convex. To this end, take $x \in l^{2}, x_{n} \in l^{2}, n=1, 2, \cdots$, such that $\|x\|_{L}=1,\left\|x_{n}\right\|_{L} \rightarrow 1,\left\|x+x_{n}\right\|_{L} \rightarrow 2$, and let u and $u_{n}$ be the elements associated with x and $x_{n}$ respectively, then it is easy to see $\left \| \left | u \right |  \right \|= 1, \left \| \left | u_{n} \right |  \right \|\rightarrow 1,\left \| \left | u+u_{n} \right |  \right \|\rightarrow 2 $. Since $\left \| \left | \cdot  \right |  \right \|$ is locally uniformly convex, we have $u_{n} \rightarrow u$, thus $ \left\|x_{n}\right\|_{2} \rightarrow\|x\|_{2}$, and for each j, $\xi_{j}^{(n)} \rightarrow \xi_{j}$. Therefore, $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$ converges strongly to x, hence from $\left\|x_{n}\right\|_{2} \rightarrow\|x\|_{2}$, we know $x_{n} \rightarrow x$, i.e., $\|\cdot\|_{L}$ is locally uniformly convex. Finally, we prove that $\|\cdot\|_{L}$ is not uniformly convex in all directions, and therefore it is not uniformly convex. In fact, for every n, let $x_{n}=e_{1}+\sqrt{3} e_{n}, y_{n}=\sqrt{3} e_{n}$, then $\left\|x_{n}\right\|_{L} \rightarrow 1,  \left\|y_{n}\right\|_{L} \rightarrow 1,\left\|x_{n}+y_{n}\right\|_{L} \rightarrow 2$. But for every n, $x_{n}-y_{n}=e_{1}$, thus $ \|\cdot\|_{L}$ is not uniformly convex in all directions.
chinese_rationale: 对每个  $u \in c_{0}(\Gamma),\{r \in \Gamma: u(r) \neq 0\}$  至多为可数集, 记此可数集为  $E(u)=\left\{a_{k}\right\}$ 。 令$\|u\|=\sup _{r \in \Gamma}|u(r)|$,则  $c_{0}(\Gamma)$  在此范数下为 Banach 空间。定义映射  $D: c_{0}(\Gamma) \rightarrow l^{2}(\Gamma)$ 如下:$(D u)(r)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\frac{u\left(\alpha_{k}\right)}{2^{k}}, & r=\alpha_{k} \in E(u), \\0, & r \notin E(u) . \end{array}\right.$令  $\left |\|u\|\right |=\|D u\|_{2},\left |\|\cdot\|\right |$   是  $c_{0}(\Gamma)$  上 的等价的且是局部一致凸的范数 。$\begin{array}{l}\text { 对 } x=\left(\xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \cdots\right) \in l^{2}, \text { 令 } \\u=(\frac{\|x\|_{2}}{2}, \xi_{1}, \xi_{2}, \xi_{2}, \cdots, \overbrace{\xi_{i}, \cdots, \xi_{j}}^{j \uparrow}, \cdots),\end{array}$并称  u  是相伴于  x  的元素。 显然,  $u \in c_{0}$ 。 在  $l^{2}$  上定义范数  $\|\cdot\|_{L}$  如下:$\|x\|_{L}=\|u\|$ 。易见,  $\|\cdot\|_{L}$  是  $l^{2}$  上的一个等价范数。现指出,  $\|\cdot\|_{L}$  是局部一致凸的。 为此取  $x \in l^{2}, x_{n} \in l^{2}, n=1 ,  2, \cdots $, 使  $\|x\|_{L}=1,\left\|x_{n}\right\|_{L} \rightarrow 1,\left\|x+x_{n}\right\|_{L} \rightarrow 2$ , 并设  u  与  $u_{n}$  分别是相伴于 x 与 x_{n} 的元素，则易见$\left \| \left | u \right |  \right \|= 1, \left \| \left | u_{n} \right |  \right \|\rightarrow 1,\left \| \left | u+u_{n} \right |  \right \|\rightarrow 2 $。由于$\left \| \left | \cdot  \right |  \right \|$是局部一致凸的, 故  $u_{n} \rightarrow u$ , 于是 $ \left\|x_{n}\right\|_{2} \rightarrow\|x\|_{2}$ , 且对每一  j , 有  $\xi_{\xi}^{(n)} \rightarrow   \xi_{j}$ 。 因此,  $\left\{x_{n}\right\}$  强收敛于  x , 从而再由  $\left\|x_{n}\right\|_{2} \rightarrow\|x\|_{2}$  可知  $x_{n} \rightarrow x$ , 即  $\|\cdot\|_{L}$  是局部一致凸的。最后证明,  $\|\cdot\|_{L}$  不是各向一致凸的, 从而他不是一致凸的。 事实上,对每一  n , 令  $x_{n}=e_{1}+\sqrt{3} e_{n}, y_{n}=\sqrt{3} e_{n} $, 则  $\left\|x_{n}\right\|_{L} \rightarrow 1 ,  \left\|y_{n}\right\|_{L} \rightarrow 1,\left\|x_{n}+y_{n}\right\|_{L} \rightarrow 2 $。 但对每一  n , 有  $x_{n}-y_{n}=e_{1}$ , 故 $ \|\cdot\|_{L}$  不是各向一致凸的。

statement: There exist two operators such that the spectral radius of their sum is greater than the sum of their spectral radii.
chinese_statement: 存在两个算子， 其和的谱半径大于它们的谱半径之和。
rationale: Let $\begin{array}{c}S=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 0 \\1 & 0\end{array}\right), T=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 1 \\0 & 0\end{array}\right), \\\text { then } r(S)=r(T)=0 \text {, but } r(S+T)=1 \text {, hence } r(S+T)>r(S)+r(T) \text {. }\end{array}$
chinese_rationale: 设$\begin{array}{c}S=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 0 \\1 & 0\end{array}\right)， T=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 1 \\0 & 0\end{array}\right)， \\\text { 则 } r(S)=r(T)=0 \text {， 而 } r(S+T)=1 \text {， 故 } r(S+T)>r(S)+r(T) \text {. }\end{array}$

statement: The spectrum of an operator must be a closed set, yet the relative spectrum of an operator may not be closed.
chinese_statement: 算子的谱必是闭集，然而算子的相对谱未必是闭集。
rationale: Let A be a bounded linear operator on a Hilbert space H, $\alpha$ be a non-zero constant, M be an operator matrix:$M=\left(\begin{array}{cc}\alpha I & 0 \\I & A\end{array}\right)$, then a necessary and sufficient condition for A to be relatively invertible is that M is relatively invertible. In fact, assume M is relatively invertible and let $N=\left(\begin{array}{ll}P & Q \\R & S\end{array}\right)$ be a relative inverse of M, i.e., M N M=M. From this, we obtain $\alpha Q A=0$, $Q A+A S A= A$. Since $\alpha \neq 0$, it follows that Q A=0, hence A S A=A, meaning A is relatively invertible. Conversely, if A is relatively invertible, i.e., there exists B such that A B A=A, let $N=\left(\begin{array}{cc}\frac{1}{\alpha} A B & I-A B \\-\frac{1}{\alpha} B & B\end{array}\right)$. It is easy to verify that M N M=M, so M is relatively invertible. Secondly, if $M=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 0 \\ I & A\end{array}\right)$, then for any operator A, M is always relatively invertible, because if we let $N=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & I \\0 & 0\end{array}\right)$, we have M N M=M. From the above, if the operator matrix $M=\left(\begin{array}{ll}I & 0 \\ I & A\end{array}\right)$ and the relative spectrum of operator A are denoted by $\Phi$ and $\Psi$, respectively, then $\Phi=\Psi \backslash\{1\} $. Take A as the right shift operator on $ l^{2} $, then the relative spectrum of A is the unit circle, thus the relative spectrum of M is not closed.
chinese_rationale: 设  A  是 Hilbert 空间  H  上的有界线性算子，  $\alpha $ 为非零常数，  M 是算子矩阵:$M=\left(\begin{array}{cc}\alpha I & 0 \\I & A\end{array}\right)$，则  A  相对可逆的充要条件是  M  为相对可逆的。事实上， 设  M  相对可逆， 并设$N=\left(\begin{array}{ll}P & Q \\R & S\end{array}\right)$是  M  的相对逆， 即  M N M=M 。 由此得到$  \alpha Q A=0， Q A+A S A=   A$ 。 因为$  \alpha \neq 0$ ， 故  Q A=0 ， 从而  A S A=A ， 即  A  是相对可逆的。 反之， 若  A  是相对可逆的， 即存在  B  两有  A B A=A ， 令$N=\left(\begin{array}{cc}\frac{1}{\alpha} A B & I-A B \\-\frac{1}{\alpha} B & B\end{array}\right)$ 。则容易验证，  M N M=M ， 故  M  是相对可逆的。其次， 若  $M=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 0 \\ I & A\end{array}\right) $， 则对任何算子  A， M  总是相对可逆的， 这是因为若令$N=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & I \\0 & 0\end{array}\right)$，则有  M N M=M 。由上可知， 若算子矩阵  $M=\left(\begin{array}{ll}I & 0 \\ I & A\end{array}\right) $ 与算子  A  的相对谱分别记为 $ \Phi $ 和 $ \Psi$ ， 则有 $ \Phi=\Psi \backslash\{1\} $。 兹取  A  为$  l^{2}  $上的右移算子， 则  A 的相对谱是单位圆周 ， 从而  M  的相对谱不是闭的。

statement: The sum and product of two closed linear operators do not have to be closed linear operators.
chinese_statement: 两个闭线性算子的和与积不必是闭线性算子。
rationale: First example: There exist two closed linear operators whose sum is not a closed linear operator. Let $X=Y=l^{\infty}$, define a functional on the Banach space $l^{\infty}$ called the Banach limit if it satisfies the following conditions: (i) $\lim (\alpha x+\beta y)=\alpha \lim (x)+\beta \lim (y)$, (ii) if $\alpha_{n}=1, n=1,2, \cdots, then \lim \left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right)=1$, (iii) if $\alpha_{n} \geqslant 0, n=1,2, \cdots, then \lim \left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right) \geqslant 0$, (iv) $\lim \left(\left\{\alpha_{n+1}\right\}\right)=\lim \left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right)$. It can be proven that there exists a Banach limit within the Banach space $\left(l^{\infty}\right)^{*}$. Let \lim be a Banach limit in $\left(l^{\infty}\right)^{*}$, we define $T_{1}\left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right)=\left\{\beta_{n}\right\}$, where $\beta_{1}=\lim \left\{\sum_{k=1}^{n} \alpha_{k}\right\}, \beta_{n}=\sum_{k=1}^{n-1} \alpha_{k}, n>1 ; \quad T_{2}\left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right)=\left\{\gamma_{n}\right\}$, here $\gamma_{1}=0, \gamma_{n}=-\beta_{n}, n>1$. At this time $D\left(T_{1}\right)=D\left(T_{2}\right)=\left\{\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}:\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\} \in l^{\infty} \text{ and }\left\{\sum_{k=1}^{m} \alpha_{k}\right\} \in l^{\infty}\right\}$. It is easy to prove that $T_{1}$ and $T_{2}$ are both closed linear operators. On the other hand, we have $\begin{array}{c}\left(T_{1}+T_{2}\right)\left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right)=\left\{\delta_{n}\right\}, \\\delta_{1}=\lim \left\{\sum_{k=1}^{n} \alpha_{k}\right\}, \delta_{n}=0, n>1 .\end{array}$ Therefore, $T_{1}+T_{2}$ is not closed. In fact, $T_{1}+T_{2}$ does not even have a closed extension (see example 39). Second example: There exist two closed linear operators whose product is not a closed linear operator. Let $X=Y=C[0,1]$, T is the differentiation operator mapping $C^{1}[0,1] \subset X$ into Y: $(T x)(t)=x^{\prime}(t)$, then T can be proven to be a closed linear operator. In fact, linearity is obvious; we only need to prove that it is closed. For this, let $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset C^{1}[0,1], x_{n} \rightarrow x, T x_{n} \rightarrow y (n \rightarrow \infty)$. Since convergence in C[0,1] is equivalent to uniform convergence, the sequence of functions $\left\{T x_{n}(t)\right\}$ uniformly converges to $y(t)$ on the interval [0,1], and $y(t)$ is a continuous function. From the theorem of term-by-term differentiation of function sequences, it follows that $x(t)$ is also continuously differentiable and $y(t)=x^{\prime}(t)$, i.e., $x \in C^{1}[0,1], T x=y$, hence T is closed. Also let S be the operator from Y to X, defined as $S x(t)=x(0)$, then S is also a closed linear operator. Now take $x_{n}(t)=\frac{e^{-n t}}{n}$, then $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset C^{1}[0,1] \subset X$, and $x_{n} \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty), \operatorname{ST} x_{n}=-1, n=1,2, \cdots$. Thus, $\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} S T x_{n}=-1 \neq S T 0=0$, therefore, ST is not a closed linear operator.
chinese_rationale:
第一例: 存在两个闭线性算子， 其和不是闭线性算子。设  $X=Y=l^{\infty}$ ， 定义在 Banach 空间  $l^{\infty}$  上的一个泛函  $\lim (x)$  称为Banach极限， 如果它满足下列条件:(i)  $\lim (\alpha x+\beta y)=\alpha \lim (x)+\beta \lim (y)$ ，(ii) 如果  $\alpha_{n}=1， n=1，2， \cdots ， 则  \lim \left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right)=1$ ，(iii) 如果  $\alpha_{n} \geqslant 0， n=1，2， \cdots ， 则  \lim \left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right) \geqslant 0$ ，(iv)  $\lim \left(\left\{\alpha_{n+1}\right\}\right)=\lim \left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right)$ 。可以证明， 在 Banach 空间  $\left(l^{\infty}\right)^{*}$  内存在 Banach 极限 。设  \lim  是  $\left(l^{\infty}\right)^{*}$  内的Banach极限， 我们定义  $T_{1}\left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right)=\left\{\beta_{n}\right\}$ ，其中$\beta_{1}=\lim \left\{\sum_{k=1}^{n} \alpha_{k}\right\}， \beta_{n}=\sum_{k=1}^{n-1} \alpha_{k}， n>1 ; \quad T_{2}\left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right)=\left\{\gamma_{n}\right\}， \text { 此处 } \gamma_{1}=0， \gamma_{n}=-\beta_{n}， n>1$ 。 这时$D\left(T_{1}\right)=D\left(T_{2}\right)=\left\{\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}:\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\} \in l^{\infty} \text { 且 }\left\{\sum_{k=1}^{m} \alpha_{k}\right\} \in l^{\infty}\right\}$ 。容易证明，  $T_{1}$  和  $T_{2}$  都是闭线性算子。 另一方面， 我们有$\begin{array}{c}\left(T_{1}+T_{2}\right)\left(\left\{\alpha_{n}\right\}\right)=\left\{\delta_{n}\right\}， \\\delta_{1}=\lim \left\{\sum_{k=1}^{n} \alpha_{k}\right\}， \delta_{n}=0， n>1 .\end{array}$因此，  $T_{1}+T_{2}$  不是闭的。 其实，  $T_{1}+T_{2}$  甚至没有闭的扩张 (参看例  39) 。
第二例: 存在两个闭线性算子，其积不是闭线性算子。设  $X=Y=C[0，1]$， T  是映  $C^{1}[0，1] \subset  X$  到  Y  内的微分算子:  $(T x)(t)=x^{\prime}(t)$ ， 则可证  T  为闭线性算子。 事实上， 线性是显然的，我们只要证明它是闭的。 为此， 设  $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset C^{1}[0，1]， x_{n} \rightarrow x， T x_{n} \rightarrow y   (n \rightarrow \infty)$ 。 因空间  C[0，1]  中点列的收敛性等价于一致收敛，故函数列  $\left\{T x_{n}(t)\right\}$  在区间  [0，1]  上一致收敛于  $y(t)$ ， 而且  $y(t)$  是连续函数。这时从函数列的逐项微分定理可知，  $x(t)$  亦是连续可微函数，而且  $y(t)=x^{\prime}(t)$ ， 即  $x \in C^{1}[0，1]， T x=y$ ， 可见  T  是闭的。又设  S  是  Y  到  X  内的算子， 其定义为  $S x(t)=x(0)$ ， 则  S  也是闭线性算子。今取  $x_{n}(t)=\frac{e^{-n t}}{n}$ ， 则  $\left\{x_{n}\right\} \subset C^{1}[0，1] \subset X$ ， 且  $x_{n} \rightarrow 0(n \rightarrow \infty) ，  \operatorname{ST} x_{n}=-1， n=1，2， \cdots$ 。 于是$\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} S T x_{n}=-1 \neq S T 0=0$，因此， ST不是闭线性算子。

statement: There exist Banach spaces that cannot be endowed with an equivalent uniformly convex norm.
chinese_statement: 存在不能赋予等价的各向一致凸范数的Banach空间。
rationale: Let $\Gamma$ be an uncountable set, and let $X=c_{0}(\Gamma)$, then no equivalent uniformly convex norm exists on X. In fact, if $\left | \|\cdot\|  \right |$ is an equivalent norm on X, let $\mu=\sup \{\left | \|x:\| \right |:\|x\| \leqslant 1, x \in X\}$, and suppose $\left \{ \mu_{n} \right \}$ is a sequence in X such that $\left \| \mu_{n} \right \| =1, \left | \left \| \mu_{n} \right \| \right | \to \mu$, then because $\Gamma$ is uncountable, there exists a non-zero element $z\in X$ (without loss of generality, suppose $\left | \left \| \ z \right \| \right |\le \mu$), such that for all n and any $t \in \Gamma$, we have $z(t) u_{n}(t)=0$, meaning for each n and $t \in \Gamma$, either $z(t)=0$, or $u_{n}(t)=0$. For $0<\varepsilon<1$ and any $\delta>0$, select $u_{n}$ such that $\left | \left \| \ u_{n} \right \| \right |> \mu(1-\delta)$. Then, let $x=u_{n}+\frac{z}{2}, y=u_{n}-\frac{z}{2}$, so $\left | \left \| \ x \right \| \right | \leqslant \mu , \left | \left \| y \right \| \right | \leqslant \mu$. Furthermore, $\left |\left\|\frac{(x+y)}{2}\right\|\right | >\mu(1-\delta)$, but $x-y=z$. Thus, $\left | \left \| \cdot  \right \| \right | $ is not uniformly convex.
chinese_rationale: 设  $\Gamma$  为一不可数集, 令  $X=c_{0}(\Gamma)$ , 则  X  上不存在等价的各向一致 凸 的范数。事实上, 如果  $\left | \|\cdot\|  \right |$  是  X  上的等价范数, 令$\mu=\sup \{\left | \|x:\| \right |:\|x\| \leqslant 1, x \in X\}$,并设$\left \{ \mu_{n} \right \}$ 是X中的一个点列，使$\left \| \mu_{n} \right \| =1，\left | \left \| \mu_{n} \right \| \right | \to \mu$，则因 $\Gamma$ 不可数, 故存在 非零元$z\in X$（不妨设 $\left | \left \| \ z \right \| \right |\le \mu$ ），使对一切n及任何 $t \in \Gamma$ , 都有  $z(t) u_{n}(t)=0$ , 即对每 一 n  及  $t \in \Gamma$ , 或者  $z(t)=0$ ,或者  $u_{n}(t)=0$ 。 对  $0<\varepsilon<1$  及任意  $\delta>0$ , 选取  $u_{n}$  使  $\left | \left \| \ u_{n} \right \| \right |>   \mu(1-\delta)$ 。 于是, 令  $x=u_{n}+\frac{z}{2}, y=u_{n}-\frac{z}{2}$ , 则  $\left | \left \| \ x \right \| \right | \leqslant \mu ,  \left | \left \| y \right \| \right | \leqslant \mu$ 。 又,  $\left |\left\|\frac{(x+y)}{2}\right\|\right | >\mu(1-\delta)$ , 但  $x-y=z$ 。 由此可知,  $\left | \left \| \cdot  \right \|  \right | $  不是各向一致凸的。

statement: There exists a Banach space that is not the dual space of any Banach space.
chinese_statement: 存在一个 Banach 空间， 它不是某个 Banach 空间的共轭空间。
rationale: Because the unit closed ball of the dual space $ X^{*}$ of a Banach space X is $weak^{*}$ compact, by the Krein-Milman theorem, the unit closed ball of $X^{*}$ must have extreme points. Since the unit closed ball of the Banach space $L[0,1]$ has no extreme points, $L[0,1]$ is not the dual space of any Banach space and is not linearly homeomorphic to a dual space (because $weak^{*}$ compactness is preserved under linear homeomorphism). The unit closed ball of the Banach space $c_{0}$ also has no extreme points, so it is not linearly homeomorphic to a dual space either. Note: Klee in 1950 pointed out that an equivalent norm $|\|\cdot\||$ can be given on the Banach space $l^{\infty}$, such that $\left(l^{\infty},\left|\|\cdot\|\right|\right)$ is not linearly homeomorphic to any dual space. William, J. D and William, J. B. further noted that for each non-reflexive Banach space, such an equivalent norm can be given on it. Wojtaszczyk pointed out that if X is a separable Banach space such that every separable reflexive Banach space is linearly homeomorphic to a subspace of X, then X is not linearly homeomorphic to any dual space.
chinese_rationale: 因为 Banach 空间  X  的共轭空间 $ X^{*}$  的单位闭球是$弱^{*}$紧的，故由 Krein-Milman 定理，  $X^{*}$ 的单位闭球必有端点。 由 Banach 空间  $L[0，1]$  的单位闭球没有端点， 因而  $L[0，1]$  不是某个 Banach 空间的共轭空间，并且也不线性同胚于一个共轭空间 (因为$弱^{*}$紧性在线性同胚下不变)。Banach 空间  $c_{0}$  的单位闭球也是没有端点的， 故它也不线性同胚于一个共轭空间。注： Klee 1950 年指出，在 Banach 空间  $l^{\infty}$  上可以赋予等价范数  $|\|\cdot\|| $， 使  $\left(l^{\infty}，\left |  \| \cdot  \|\right |\right)$  不与任何一个共轭空间线性同胚。 William， J. D 和 William，J. B.  进一步指出，对于每个非自反的 Banach 空间， 都可以在它上面赋予这种等价范数。Wojtaszczyk   指出，若  X  是可分的 Banach 空间，使每个可分自反 Banach 空间都线性同胚于  X  的某个子空间，则  X  不与任何一个共轭空间线性同胚。

statement: The sum of two hyponormal operators is still a hyponormal operator.
chinese_statement: 两个双正规算子之和仍是双正规算子。
rationale: It is easy to prove that if T is a hyponormal operator, then (i) for any complex number $\alpha, \alpha T$ is a hyponormal operator. (ii) $T^{*}$ is a hyponormal operator. (iii) If $ T^{-1}$ exists, then $ T^{-1}$ is also a hyponormal operator. However, the sum of two hyponormal operators need not be a hyponormal operator. For example: let $T_{1}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 0 \\ 0 & 1\end{array}\right), T_{2}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1\end{array}\right)$ then $ T_{1}, T_{2}$ are both hyponormal operators. Since $T=T_{1}+T_{2}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 1 \\ 0 & 1\end{array}\right)$, it follows that $\begin{array}{c}T^{*}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 0 \\ 1 & 1\end{array}\right), T^{*}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 1 \\ 1 & 2\end{array}\right), T T^{*}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}2 & 1 \\ 1 & 1\end{array}\right), \\\left(T T^{*}\right)\left(T^{*} T\right)=\left(\begin{array}{ll}3 & 4 \\ 2 & 3\end{array}\right),\left(T^{*} T\right)\left(T T^{*}\right)=\left(\begin{array}{ll}3 & 2 \\ 4 & 3\end{array}\right).\end{array}$ Therefore, $\left(T T^{*}\right)\left(T^{*} T\right) \neq\left(T^{*} T\right)\left(T T^{*}\right)$, meaning $ T $ is not a hyponormal operator.
chinese_rationale: 容易证明， 若  T  是双正规算子， 则(i) 对任意复数  $\alpha， \alpha T$  是双正规算子。(ii)  $T^{*}$  是双正规算子。（iii）若 $ T^{-1}$  存在， 则 $ T^{-1}$  也是双正规算子。然而两个双正规算子之和不必是双正规算子。例如：令$T_{1}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}0 & 0 \\0 & 1\end{array}\right)， T_{2}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 0 \\0 & 1\end{array}\right)$则 $ T_{1}， T_{2}$  均为双正规算子。 因为$T=T_{1}+T_{2}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 1 \\0 & 1\end{array}\right)$，故$\begin{array}{c}T^{*}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 0 \\1 & 1\end{array}\right)， T^{*}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}1 & 1 \\1 & 2\end{array}\right)， T T^{*}=\left(\begin{array}{ll}2 & 1 \\1 & 1\end{array}\right)， \\\left(T T^{*}\right)\left(T^{*} T\right)=\left(\begin{array}{ll}3 & 4 \\2 & 3\end{array}\right)，\left(T^{*} T\right)\left(T T^{*}\right)=\left(\begin{array}{ll}3 & 2 \\4 & 3\end{array}\right)。\end{array}$ 因此， $\left(T T^{*}\right)\left(T^{*} T\right) \neq\left(T^{*} T\right)\left(T T^{*}\right) $， 即 $ T $不是双正规算子。

statement: There exists a set that is bounded but not totally bounded.
chinese_statement: 有界而非全有界的集合。
rationale: Consider the sequence of points $e_{n}=(0, \cdots, 0,1,0, \cdots)$, where $n=1,2, \cdots$ in the space $l^{2}$. Since $d\left(e_{n}, 0\right)=1$, $M=\left\{e_{n}\right\}_{n=1}^{\infty}$ is a bounded set in $l^{2}$. However, for $\varepsilon=\frac{1}{2}$, there is no finite $\varepsilon$-net for $M$, so $M$ is not totally bounded.
chinese_rationale: 在空间  $l^{2}$  中取点列  $e_{n}=(0， \cdots， 0，1，0， \cdots)， n=1，2， \cdots$ 。 因  $d\left(e_{n}， 0\right)=1$ ， 故  $M=\left\{e_{n}\right\}_{n=1}^{\infty}$  是  $l^{2}$  中的有界集。 但是， 对于  $\varepsilon=\frac{1}{2}$  而言，  M  不存在有限  $\varepsilon$  网， 故  M  不是全有界的。

statement: There exists a strongly closed but not $weakly^*$ sequentially closed subspace in a conjugate space.
chinese_statement: 某个共轭空间中强闭而不弱^{*}序列闭的子空间。
rationale: For example, take X=L[0,1], $X^{*}=L^{\infty}[0,1]$. Clearly, C[0,1] is a closed proper subspace of $L^{\infty}[0,1]$. C[0,1] is $weakly^*$ sequentially dense in $L^{\infty}[0,1]$, because for any $f \in L^{\infty}[0,1]$, by Luzin's theorem, there exists $\left\{f_{n}\right\} \subset C[0,1]$ such that $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ converges in measure to f, hence for any $x \in L[0,1]$, we have $f_{n}(x)=\int_{0}^{1} f_{n}(t) x(i) d t \rightarrow \int_{0}^{1} f(t) x(t) d t=f(x)$. That is, $\left\{f_{n}\right\}$ $weakly^*$ converges to $f$. $C[0,1]$ is not $weakly^*$ sequentially closed. Otherwise, $C[0,1]$ would be $L^{\infty}[0,1]$, which is impossible.
